review_title: in and out, smooth as silk!
good_review:
staff, from valet, to check-in, to desk personel, to lobby bar crew were all fantastic. Was in for the Dead & Co. show on a Sunday at Oracle Park. as to the room: spacious, sparking clean; perfect!

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles y sofá cama
good_review: La ubicación y el personal. El diseño de la habitación está bien sin embargo tiene muchos contras. No recomendaría este hotel.
bad_review: Los colchones están muy viejos y se hunden, las almohadas también viejas tienen un montón de bultos nada cómodos y huelen mal, el cuarto olía a humedad como si llevara mucho tiempo cerrado, había un trozo de lo que parecía pepperoni en la alfombra cerca del sofá y la bañera estaba rota. Elegí esta habitación porque Hyatt siempre ha sido bueno en otros países que he estado, pero de este sólo puedo decir que es el más caro y peor en el que me he hospedado. Lo único bueno fue la ubicación y el personal que es amable.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles y sofá cama
review_title: Un precio muy alto, para el pésimo servicio y mala experiencia
bad_review:
El personal de recepción tomó una actitud muy poco amable y demasiado ilógica.
Llegué al hotel justo las 10 pm y hice el pago de mi reservación , la cual es la más alta en todas las demás opciones, me solicita además una tarjeta de crédito.
Al indicarle que no andaba ninguna, me dice que me va cobrar un depósito de “garantía”, por lo cual me indica que si no ando la tarjeta de crédito, que le haga un depósito en efectivo.
Le indicó nuevamente que solo dispongo de mis tarjetas y la misma con la cual acaba de pagar, por lo cual me indica que vaya a un cajero automático a sacar el dinero, lo cual es lo más absurdo y ofensivo que he tenido en todo mi tiempo de acceder a los hoteles, porque la “solución” de ella era lo más absurda, dado que la restricción era a las 10 pm y los cajeros automáticos no funcionan después de ese momento.
Solicite hablar con algún superior, con lo cual ella me indica que no hay nadie y solo sería con ella.
Me parece absurdo la actitud y falta de sentido común que tuvo conmigo, además de sentirme ofendido, dado que yo recurro a los hoteles, primero en busca de reactivar la economía nacional y la facilidad de utilizar este tipo de aplicaciones en la misma.
Pero esta actitud me pareció súper ofensiva, cero adecuado y sobretodo sin ninguna aplicación del sentido común, dado que nunca he tenido esta situación en todos los hoteles que he accedido y teniendo en cuenta que mi estatus como usuario tanto en los hoteles, como en estas aplicaciones de reserva siempre es alta.
Por esta razón no recomendaría este hotel, ni sería una opción que considere oportuna, dado que el precio que pague vs el servicio que recibí fue desproporcionado y muy ofensivo para mi y sobretodo para mi compañía que buscaba un descanso físico como mental.
Como bien dije, una pésima experiencia.

beds and rooms are super comfortable!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: At +/- 75 minutes from the airport, this is an ideal one-night stop off if you're heading towards the east on your arrival to Costa Rica or coming in from the east prior to leaving the country. It's your typical modern, clean upper quality chain hotel as you would find pretty much in the U.S or Canada. The king bed is perfect as are all the other room amenities. Security is good (you need to tap your room key to reach your floor) and there's ample free indoor parking with elevator access to the lobby. Good buffet breakfast.
bad_review: The hotel restaurant is pretty basic and cold although they do serve a good buffet breakfast. Since the hotel is in a shopping complex, there are a number of restaurants below the hotel. Note that there's not much to see in this area of San Jose; use this place a comfortable overnight stop.

acommodation: Habitación Doble Club con 2 camas dobles
good_review: No dudaría en volver a alojarme en el Hyatt Regency SOMA al volver a San Francisco. Es un hotel nuevo, de amplias habitaciones, con buenas vistas, buena cama y buen lavabo: todo precioso, confortable y funcional. Aunque el hotel no se encuentre situado exactamente en Union Square, está a tan solo 5 minutos andando de la plaza, y al lado de lineas de bus, tranvia y metro, incluso para ir al aeropuerto. El personal atento y servicial, el desayuno buenísimo ... una tienda dentro del hotel, por si necesitas bebida o comida de última hora. Para nuestra familia de 4, supuso una excelente última parada de un viaje de 16 días por los EEUU. Gracias!
bad_review: Únicamente apuntar que el sistema de ventilación del lavabo era un poco ruidoso.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
Habitación con 2 camas grandes
review_title: PERFECTO HOTEL CON BUENA UBICACIÓN. UN POCO CARO COMO TODO SAN FRANCISCO
good_review:
El hotel tiene todo los servicios necesarios. Muy nuevo, todo perfecto en cuanto a limpieza y trato del personal de recepción, limpieza o guardaequipaje. Nada que reprochar a un hotel moderno, elegante, limpio y céntrico.
La ubicación me parecio excepcional para llegar rápidamente a todos los sitios turisticos, ya que tiene acceso a todos los medios de transportes a muy poca distancia.
bad_review: Quizás el precio es algo caro ya que no incluye el desayuno (y tanto este servicio como el parking son excesivamente caros), pero también hay que tener en cuenta que los precios son similares o incluso algo más bajos a otros hoteles de su categoría y ubicación.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes y vistas a la ciudad
review_title: Vivencia especial de tres generaciones en SFCO
good_review: La amplitud del espacio, las fantásticas vistas al SFMOMA y ciudad. Así como también la comodidad de los colchones y almohadas. Además estaba muy bien situado para coger todo tipo de transporte y con bastantes servicios por los alrededores.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a la ciudad
review_title: Fabuloso hotel con vistas impresionantes a la ciudad!
good_review: Lo que nos encantó sobretodo, fueron las vistas desde la habitación. Reservamos una habitación con vistas a la ciudad y nos dieron la nuestra en la planta 30, IMPRESIONANTE! Tanto el hotel como las habitaciones son de estilo moderno, muy confortables (cama espectacular) y la logística en general es bastante dinámica. Muy buen ubicado, a pocos minutos andando de Union Square.
bad_review: Si le tenemos que sacar un pero al hotel, diríamos que en general el servicio de comida es bastante caro (sin embargo es la media de los precios que se paga en esa zona de California.) Buffet libre desayuno de 39$ sin impuestos que estuvo bien, pero en cualquier otro sitio lo pagarías máximo a 25€.

Tuve suerte y mi habitación hacía esquina y era muy grande ,la de la otra pareja que vino con nosotros no era tan grande pero estaba muy bien ,estaba todo muy limpio y cómodo 
La ubicación genial 
La gente del hotel súper amables 
Lo recomiendo
bad_review: El precio del garaje carísimo , nos aconsejaron uno que valía la mitad y esta muy cerca y también las copas del hotel muy cara una copa de champán 20 dólares nos tomamos 2 copas un gintonic ( pequeño)y una margarita y nos costó unos 100dolares

good_review:
Si entrenas, el gimnasio de este hotel es increíble. Amplio y maquinas de ultima generación. El desayuno bufete (que lo tenes que pagar extra) es muy completo y vale la pena. Es caro, pero si sos de desayunar mucho vale la pena. 
El hotel es muy prolijo y esta bien ubicado.
bad_review: La heladera de mi habitación no funcionaba. Si vas en Auto, no tiene valet parking incluido. Te recomiendo ir a la cochera de la esquina del hotel. Si le preguntas a los guardias del hotel ellos te van a indicar como llegar. Sale 35 USD por dia completo en lugar de 65 USD.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
good_review: La comodidad de las camas, la limpieza, el servicio de café y agua en la habitacion.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes y vistas a la ciudad
review_title: Hotel espectacular con vistas geniales desde la habitacion, en zona muy segura.
good_review:
Lo mejor de todo es la ubicación. Está en en centro, en una zona muy segura. Nos dieron la habitación en un piso 27 con una cristalera hasta el suelo en la habitación con unas vistas espectaculares a la ciudad. Es un hotel muy bueno, todo muy nuevo y cuidado y limpio. Los baños nuevos. El parking muy caro, unos 65$ al día. Puedes meter y sacar el coche las veces que quieras. Hay un parking cerca, pero si tu coche es muy alto no cabrá, y creo que no puedes meter y sacar el coche durante el día.
No había desayunos ni room service (solo una pequeña tienda dentro del hotel), tal vez por el COVID. Pero a pocos metros hay varios sitios para desayunar.
Repetiríamos por supuesto.
bad_review: El precio del parking. La falta de servicio de habitaciones.

acommodation: Habitación Doble Club con 2 camas dobles
good_review:
We had the best time at Hyatt Regency SOMA! 
The hotel is beautiful, very clean and offers spectacular views over San Francisco downtown.
The rooms are spacious, the beds are big very comfortable and we really appreciated the fact that everything was spotless. 
The breakfast was amazing- there was everything for everyone, and the service was absolutely impeccable. The restaurant staff went above and beyond to provide the best customer experience. 
Everyone at the hotel was lovely but one of the receptionists really stood out to us. Estefhani was absolutely brilliant. She was always nice and helpful and gave us good tips on our sightseeing days. 
I cannot recommend this hotel more and many thanks to everyone who provided us with such an unforgettable experience.
bad_review: Nothing. Everything was great!

After speaking with the manager on duty Micheal Gonzales, he did his investigation and found that I was in fact charged the $826 in error which he then advised it would be refunded immediately. I’m not sure why I was targeted and why my card was charged. It’s since been a week and I have yet to have the $826 returned to my card. The staff also was not friendly at all especially the front desk. I hope It wasn’t because I was one of the few and only people of color that you’d see there, but no smiles or greeting when I arrived at the front desk. I greeted them and was ignored and quickly asked for reservation info.

review_title: Gran decepción, incomodo y mal servicio
good_review: El edificio moderno y bonito pero muy incomodas las habitaciones sobre todo el baño. Pequeñísimo y sin espacio para apoyar o colgar nada. Piscina en el roof top pero mal atendida, las toallas sucias por ahí tiradas y los platos de comida de la gente sin recoger. Muy caro para el servicio que ofrece. Nos llevamos una gran decepción
bad_review:
Además uno de los días no nos hicieron la habitación fuimos a reclamar a las 7 de la tarde cuando llegamos y nos dijeron que ya no había servicio de housekeeping, al insistir y decir que quería la habitación limpia, llamaron y mandaron a una persona (José) encantador y muy amable para hacer la habitación. Me pareció muy feo el detalle de
No mandar una persona hasta que no insistí. A la hora del check out comente mi descontento con el tema de la limpieza y me hicieron un pequeño descuento, pero vamos que no me pareció nada bien.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
good_review: Está bien ubicado y la persona de recepción del último día nos escuchó las quejas y nos aplicó un descuento
bad_review:
La habitación será muy de diseño pero es incomodísima. No habia donde dejar nada apoyado, era oscura, no había casi ni luz artificial. Fuimos a la piscina y estaba mal descuidada.
Comida y platos y vasos usados. Las toallas usadas por todos lados…
Incluso un par no nos hicieron la habitación! Mal

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Hotel bien ubicado y limpio. habitación cómoda y de buen tamaño.
bad_review:
Peor servicio experimentado en un hotel.
El día de mi check in me hicieron el cargo a la tarjeta que tenía asociada a la cuenta de Booking.
Al llegar, solicitaron pasar la tarjeta para un depósito de garantía… Usé una tarjeta diferente e hicieron otro cargo temporal. Hasta ahí, todo bien. El día de mi check out hicieron un segundo cargo por el total de la reserva. Bajé a la recepción para informarles sobre el cargo doble, y me pidieron esperar, por que ellos solo tenían un cobro realizado. Esperé muy educadamente, hasta que empezaron a hacer otros cargos (5 totales) en un lapso de 3 semanas. Trato soberbio por parte del personal que atendió el asunto, tratándome como si ellos no hubieran cometido todos estos errores. después de involucrar a Booking, mil largas llamadas y mucho estrés, logré recuperar 2 cargos en su totalidad y 2 parcialmente. Por el cambio del valor del dólar, la estructura me debe aún un reembolso (pequeño), pero no entiendo por qué consideran que yo tenga que pagar por sus errores. En ningún momento me ofrecieron siquiera una disculpa. En situaciones cómo estás, las buenas compañías se disculpan y tratan de compensar el Huesped de alguna manera. Thompson no se portó al altura, así que háganse un favor y evítenlos. Gasten su dinero en un alojamiento que valga la pena.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y bañera adaptada - Adaptada para personas de movilidad reducida
review_title: Un hotel con una discoteca que no te deja dormir
good_review: La decoración del hotel y las camas de las habitaciones
bad_review:
La discoteca que tienen montada en el propio hotel. Una vergüenza que no lo adviertan antes de hacer check in. Fuimos con nuestras hijas pequeñas y no pudimos pegar ojo hasta las 2am que la discoteca cerraba....habitaciones sin insonorizar, parecía que la fiesta la tenias en tu propia habitación. Una vergüenza para lo que se paga por este hotel. Además la localización está apartada y por la noche no es recomendable salir por la zona porque es una calle poco transitada, con poca iluminación y con bastantes vagabundos alrededor. 
Sinceramente no volveremos porque la atención recibida por parte del hotel cuando llamamos a decir que no podíamos dormir por el ruido, fue nefasta y no han tenido el más mínimo gesto para intentar solventar la noche en vela que hemos pasado.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: The rooftop bar and the breakfast was very nice with a breathtaking view. The breakfast was very delicious although it was not included in the price. The swimming pool was also very nice. The hotel was very well decorated and the room was very spacious. The housekeeping staff was very polite especially Carmen and the Italian guy in the lobby. There were also some great Halloween parties at the rooftop during our stay at the hotel.
bad_review: The location was good but there were many homeless people in West Hollywood and it was not always safe to walk around the neighbourhood, especially during the night . Although the staff was polite they did not know how to answer most of our simple touristic questions. They should be more informed about simple things like directions to the closest Metro station or how far are some important and well known sightseeings. Also on the receptionist in the first day charged us 600 dollars deposit during our arrival without explaining to us that this was a deposit and it would be returned after the last day of staying in the hotel.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
good_review:
Eating breakfast at the poolside cafe and - tasty food and great views.
The rooftop swimming pool
Lovely fluffy dressing gowns
Cool communal areas downstairs
Handy location for Universal Studios
bad_review:
We were a family of four staying for 4 nights but the drawer space was minimal and we were only provided with 3 towels.
No hooks for towels in the bathroom because the door is a sliding door
The long concrete bench under the TV looks cool I am sure but it's a waste of space.
No iron/ironing board. No bedside lights. 
We couldn't work out how to dim the aircon panel which was very bright at night.
Food a bit pricey and the portion sizes weren't very generous.
The surrounding area was seedy - lots of homeless people just up the road next to the 7 Eleven convenience shop

good_review: Comfortable beds & wonderful soft bathropes! Housekeeping & valet service staff was kind.

Valet service way too expensive (when we booked it was 45 dollar per night now 55 & tax). 
No complementary coffee, tea & water in lobby in the morning at 9.30. 
Kids are not allowed in the restaurant, other restaurant at pool closes at 6pm. 
At breakfast I ordered a fruit bowl for 10 dollar that was a tiny portion and it didn’t look fresh. NO gluten free bread available so we went somewhere else. Missed chance because rooftop is nice. 
Didn’t like the neighborhood, lots of homeless on streets did not feel safe at night. 
Not very friendly staff member at check out. Would not go back here for the location and these things.

Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles y sofá cama
good_review: Esta muy bien ubicado, si bien parece alejado la zona es divina, a media cuadra esta el Oracle Park de los Giant y un embarcadero con muchas marinas. Las instalciones son exteremadamente prolija, todo. El parking es caro 80dlrs por noche, por que no tienen espacio pero a media cuadra se puede guardar el auto por 30 la noche muy buen lugar. La habitacion es silenciosa, las camas todo muy comodo. El desayuno es excelente super completo y variado, con alimentos saludables a eleccion. De la zona por lo que vi y por el precio es de lo mejor. A pocas cuadras esta la Market y la estacion del Cablecar con muchas tiendas, tambien una pista de patinaje donde entrenan los equipos de jockey sobre hielo. Excelente. Ademas es una zona segura.
bad_review: Tiene un restaurante en la azotea en el rooftop, pero no molesta para nada en el funcionamiento, solo ocupa uno de los asensores. Pero esta lindo poder subir y tomar algo.

good_review: La ubicación excelente para el plan que tratamos, el tamaño de la habitación muy bien. El desayuno incluido estuvo aceptable.
bad_review:
Estuvimos 5 días y en ninguno de esos días fueron a hacer la limpieza o a cambiar toallas y sábanas, la excusa que me dieron fue que eran medidas de seguridad por el Covid para proteger a su personal, lo cual se me hizo fuera de lugar, ya que podían haber entrado cuando uno no estaba en la habitación con las medidas de prevención necesarias, el costo de la habitación no es nada barato para tener que estar yendo por toallas, papel sanitario y jabones a la recepción.
El precio de su estacionamiento carisimo...!! Tuve que dejar mi carro en un estacionamiento externo donde pague más barato.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles y sofá cama
good_review:
No hay parqueo para vehículos grandes (7 pasajeros) y eso no lo indican, cuando llegamos al hotel (11pm) por la hora en la que llegue tarde más de 1 hora buscando donde parquear, para al final tener que dejar el vehículo en la calle frente al hotel, sin más opción.
El joven de la recepción si fue bastante amable y se veía angustiado por la situación, ya que no tenía manera de resolverlo.
Pague dos noches de las cuales una se me haría devolución, y aún sigo esperando la devolución.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
good_review:
Primero, la tarifa aumento cuando llegue al hotel de 1721 a 2,003 dólares sin previo aviso.
Segundo, el hotel me hizo un cargo provisional de 80 Dólares DIARIOS
Tercero, contrate con desayuno y el comedor estaba cancelado, no hubo ninguna cortesía ni compensación.
Y finalmente contrate un taxi en booking para la llegada al aeropuerto, me cobraron 56 dolares y me notificaron que no podían dar el servicio por el horario, pero si se cobro.
CONCLUSIÓN EL SERVICIO DE BOOKING ES DEFICIENTE, ABUSIVO Y MENTIROSO.
ESPERO RESUELVAN ESTO

review_title: An excellent stay at a wonderful San Diego hotel
good_review: This is an excellent hotel, and I had a wonderful stay here. The staff was nice, especially the head bartender and the receptionist who handled my evening check in. The room was clean and comfortable, and it is clear the whole property is renovated and superbly maintained. The lobby was nicely decorated for the holidays as well. I also had breakfast from the à la carte menu at the restaurant (no buffet option was offered, but no matter), ordered room service once which was very good, and visited the full coffee shop in the lobby. The hotel also took care of some laundry during my stay, which was done impeccably. There is also a bottle-filling water fountain on the lower level that was very handy. All in all, I would highly recommend this excellent hotel in San Diego/La Jolla.
bad_review: Upon check in, I was told I would not be billed for my stay until I checked out, and my charge card would only be held on file just in case. However, on the second day of my stay, I found that I had already been billed in full, plus an incidentals fee that is automatically applied as a precaution. After a few days, I noticed this charge had been removed, and I wasn't billed again until a few days after I had checked out. I wish I had not had this initial charge on my card, and could have varied my payment method, but this did not seem possible. I also found the miscellaneous/precautious incidentals fee to be somewhat ambiguous. While this is a minor detail, it is worth mentioning, as it is the only negative aspect of my stay. I also found the cost to be a bit high, but it was SoCal during the holidays at a prime hotel, so that's to be expected.

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio con 2 camas grandes y sofá cama
review_title: Very good - unusual location but ultimately very good.
good_review: This is a new facility so it is well-presented and clean. Rooms were well-sized and appointed and great to have a kitchen area. It is a different location because there is not too much in the immediate vicinity (one chain restaurant and a coffee shop I think) and there is a quiet university vibe. However we found the place to be incredibly well located to all of LA's awesome attractions with a car and very very safe and good value for money. It is close to motorway access so very easy to get around LA - we got to Santa Monica in 25 minutes on a Sunday, 10 minutes from Dodger Stadium, 20 minutes from Universal Studious, 20 minutes to Hollywood, 10-15 minutes to Downtown. Value for money was really good, a great hotel that provides easy access to everything in LA. The sacrifice is that there are not too many shops etc in walking distance but the reality is that you need a car to get around LA anyway. And it felt very very safe, I'm glad I didn't stay in some of the downtown locations I had also been looking at because I saw some of these on my travels and while the buildings looked fine - what they don't show is the surrounding neighbourhoods - unfortunately there are too many spots in LA with homeless issues.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
good_review: The closeness to Keck USC clinic….the hotel is on campus. Direct and quick access to the campus shuttle bus. Lovely clean room with great bed and bath linens. And unbelievably nice kitchen furnished with good quality dishes and pans. I did not know this was available so did not bring something to cook or warm up. There are no restaurants near the campus open after 5:00 so definitely will do so the next time I stay here. A great if simple a new healthy breakfast that was easily enough to carry us to lunch. And great coffee…..that especially was appreciated.
bad_review: The location of USC KECK makes finding a restaurant or store difficult. East LA has some fine authentic Mexican restaurants but if you are looking for something else, forget it. Also there is no shopping close….forgot my bed socks and had to drive 20 minutes to find a store that carried them…..it was a dollar store …but it worked.

bad_review: It was $40 to park our car, we had to use valet and weren’t given a choice. Rather than wait 40 minutes for someone to go retrieve our car we had to walk to the adjacent parking structure and find it ourselves. Breakfast was supposed to be until 10 but they ran out Of everything at 8:30, and when I asked the staff if they were going to refill any of the breakfast items there rudely said no. The hallway to our room was never ending and piled with trash outside multiple hotel rooms so the hallway smelled like everyone’s rotting room service food.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y ducha a ras de suelo - Adaptada para personas con movilidad reducida
good_review:
I booked a room that was supposed to be large enough for 4 adults and 3 children (according to the add on booking.com), but in reality was only enough for 3 adults.
I had no problem booking another room, but I was charged more than twice of what I paid for the first room. In addition, I have a conformation about having a room on the main floor, when the hotel doesn’t even have a main floor. Our rooms were a block away from the elevators, and the stairs (that were closer to our rooms) were locked. Some of the receptacles in the room did not work, and you can hear every noise or tv from rooms all around. booking.com should make it clear that Parking is not included and that pets are an extra cost.
I ended up paying close to a $1,000USD for 2 nights in noisy 2-3 stars hotel. 
That’s definitely the last time I book through booking.com

l'hotel se trouve a quelque mètre d'un chemin de fer (trains de marchandises), qui fait énormément de bruit la nuit et qui peut parfois bloquer la route, vous empéchant de passer la rue principale
le petit déjeuner de l'hotel ne vaut clairement pas la peine
l'hotel a une structure en U, si on vous donne la dernière chambre de l'étage, vous êtes partis pour un long marche entre l'ascenseur et la chambre

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
le parking payant et cher 36$ la nuit 
établissement prêt d’une voix ferrée avec le train qui klaxonne à toute heure du jour et de la nuit

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y ducha a ras de suelo - Adaptada para personas con movilidad reducida
review_title: Hôtel assez proche de downtown, chambres modernes et propres, mais service très minimaliste
bad_review:
Le bruit des trains de marchandise H24
Les chambres et le réapprovisionnement en shampooing ne sont faits que sur demande, avec un jour de préavis 
Le parking payant (environ $40 par jour) en supplément du prix de la réservation 
La Clim/chauffage fait un bruit infernal (à couper la nuit)

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio con 2 camas grandes y sofá cama
review_title: Trevligt hotell men ingen service eller sevärdheter i närheten
good_review: Relativt nybyggt med pool och fräscha rum.
bad_review: Heltäckningsmattor samt att det inte fanns någon service som affärer eller ett centrum i närheten.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: On a adorer cet hôtel, on y reviendra c’est certain!
good_review: La propreté, grande chambre, le fait que tout est neuf, petit coin dépanneur à l’accueil, plusieurs zones de causette ou idéal pour ordi, piscine, coin détente à l’extérieur, quartier neuf et sécuritaire.
bad_review: Le lit et oreillers trop mou pour nous et la proximité du chemin de fer. Le train (commercial) s’arrête et peu y rester pendant des heures empêchant complètement de passer. Piétons doivent traverser par dessus le train si veut avoir accès au parc ou à la rue. Si en voiture, s’assurer de demander au gps un chemin alternatif.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
bad_review:
Reggeli nem volt elég változatos, elvárás alatti volt.
A megfelelő számú törölköző hiányzott, azt kérni kellett.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: établissement neuf avec chambre spacieuse et excellente literie
good_review:
propreté et confort de la chambre
bon wifi
bad_review:
pas de surveillance de l utilisation de la piscine : personnes toute habillées dans la piscine, enfants tout habillés y compris avec chaussures : inadmissible !!
petit-déjeuners identiques tous les jours et salle de petit-déjeuner très bruyante

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
good_review: Tolles Haus, Zimmer gut ausgestattet, Frühstück ausreichend, Pool, Gehörschutz zum Schlafen
bad_review:
Liegt an einer Bahnlinie, wo auch nachts die Züge sehr laut hupen
Self-parking kostet pro Tag $34, Valetparking kostet pro Tag $40

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y ducha a ras de suelo - Adaptada para personas con movilidad reducida
bad_review: Il costo eccessivo del parcheggio

acommodation: King Studio Suite with Kitchen and Accessible Tub - Disability Access

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande

good_review: מלון מצויין!! מותאם מאוד למשפחות. החדרים גדולים ומרוווחים. המטבח מאובזר בכל שנדרש.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
bad_review: bruit du train

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Bardzo wygodne łóżko, dobre jedzenie w restauracji miły personel.
bad_review: Zbyt blisko torów kolejowych w nocy może to być uciążliwe

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
bad_review: a pronúncia teria ter pessoa que fale mais a lingua Brasi

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
bad_review: no hay servicio de limpieza de habitaciones y el estacionamiento muy caro

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
good_review:
Personnel très gentil et serviable
Chambres très propres et bien équipées
Literie bien confortable
bad_review: Le bruit du train qui passe sous les fenêtres avec Klaxons (car passage à niveau à 50m de l’hôtel) plusieurs fois par nuit…

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Facilidade de sair e chegar ao hotel. Atendimento atencioso. Organização da equipe.
bad_review: Não tenho do que reclamar. Foi tudo muito bom.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
good_review:
Praticamente um quarto e cozinha!
Ótimo pra quem quer cozinhar

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: Die Klimaanlage war so laut das man nicht schlafen konnte. Das Frühstück war für ein Hyatt hotel ehrlich gesagt peinlich. Essen in der lobby und nicht wirklich abwechslungsreich.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Tout, seul bémol la voie ferrée qu’on entends beaucoup surtout avant de dormir…
bad_review: Je dirai seulement le petit déjeuner

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
good_review:
Hotel ist geräumig, gut ausgestattet und modern. Das Hotel hat mir besser gefallen als viele andere Hyatt Hotels.
Pool und Whirlpool sauber und gut nutzbar mit Handtüchern und Dusche direkt am Pool.
Gym sehr sauber und modern Tolle Betten und geschmackvolles Zimmerdesign. Die Küchenzeile war auch sehr praktisch.
bad_review:
Die Lage könnte Idyllischer sein, aber das weiß man ja schon beim Buchen ;-) Als wir etwas zu spät zum Frühstück kamen (unser Fehler) bekamen wir 2 Würstchen, was ich doch etwas suspekt fand. Kein Bagel, kein Toast, keine Banane aber ein Würstchen!?! Das war schon eher amüsant. Aber in anderen Hotels (Hyatt, Hilton, etc.) reagierte man in der Vergangenheit da schon etwas souveräner und oft bekam man sogar ein Daypack. Na ja, lustig wars auf alle Fälle :-D 
In Summe gab es wirklich nichts zu beanstanden!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Ottima sistemazione a Los Angeles fuori dal caos!
good_review: Colazione ottima con ampia proposta. Stanza curata e pulita. Staff estremamente disponibile!
bad_review: Prospicenza ad un passaggio a livello.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
review_title: Excellent hôtel avec un bon rapport qualité-prix
good_review: Hotel bien situé. Personnel très accueillant. Chambre très propre avec coin salon et cuisinette. Excellent petit déjeuner avec un accent sur une offre santé, fruits frais. Possibilité de se garer proche, mais stationnement payant.
bad_review: J'ai tout aimé de mon séjour.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
good_review:
Suite pour 5 personnes hyper spacieuse.
Lits ultra confortables.
La télé qui tourne à 360 degrés est géniale.
Plats à réchauffer disponibles à l’accueil.
Bon petit déjeuner dans l’ensemble.
bad_review: Parking payant ultra cher !!! 34$ par nuit sans les taxes !!!!

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
bad_review: Le ragazze alla reception non ci hanno aiutato per darci indicazioni per raggiungere Downtown,ne' per un servizio taxi, abbiamo bucato una gomma dell'automobile e per problemi di lingua abbiamo chiesto un aiuto a loro, ma sono state molto passive. Quartiere isolato ma sicuro, però c'è solo un ristorante nel raggio di 2 Km. ,camere con finestre che non si aprono.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y ducha a ras de suelo - Adaptada para personas con movilidad reducida
good_review:
위치나 치안은 매우 만족스럽고
아침식사는 별로였음
bad_review: 기차역 근처라 밤에 시끄러움

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
good_review: Lugar muy limpio buenos servicios y un personal muy amable
bad_review: No tengo comentarios

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
review_title: Très agréable séjour dans un bel hôtel
good_review:
Chambre spacieuse, 
Les + comme piscine ouvert tard, salle de sport 24h/24, billard à disposition, laverie
bad_review: Le parking est payant certes mais très cher 34 $ par nuit

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
good_review:
- Ventilation trop bruyante toute la nuit
- Bruit du train en pleine nuit
- Le prix par rapport au service, le prix du parking

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio con cama extragrande, cocina y sofá cama
good_review:
Úžasný přístup personálu, kdykoliv bylo cokoliv potřeba, pomohli. Skvělá restaurace s vtipným číšníkem a výborným jídlem. Snídaně chudší, chyběla nám zelenina a šunka, ale bylo pravidelně doplňováno, a vše výborné. Ubytování čisté.
Dokonalý bazén a vířivka!!!
bad_review: Nákladní vlak přímo pod okny. Houkání pod okny v 4.30, 5.30, 6.30... a nekonečné šoupání vlaků přes přejezd, díky tomu člověk proměnlivá jedno Metro za druhým.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y ducha a ras de suelo - Adaptada para personas con movilidad reducida
good_review: közvetlen a vasút mellett volt, ez éjszaka nagyon zavaró volt.

acommodation: One-Bedroom Specialty Suite with Two Queen Beds, Sofa Bed and Kitchen
bad_review: el tren qué pasa cerca

acommodation: King Studio Suite with Kitchen and Accessible Tub - Disability Access
bad_review: No hicieron limpieza ningún día, no tuvimos toallas suficientes

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
good_review: las instalaciones están nuevas y limpias
bad_review: un poco alejado del downtown

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: OK na pierwszy raz jako punkt wyskoku w trasę, ale następne pobyty to będzie hotel w Venice Beach
good_review: Przestronny pokój. Przestronna jadalnia na śniadanie.
bad_review: Dziwna obsługa płatności kartą chyba w całej sieci Hyatt. Dwa tygodnie po pobycie mam nadal podwójne obciążenie na karcie kredytowej, podobnie w innym hotelu sieci Hyatt w Las Vegas.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Gravi carenze in una bella struttura
good_review: La struttura è bella, così come le stanze
bad_review:
E' vergognoso che si sia provveduto a pulire le nostre stanze solo dopo la quarta notte, adducendo come scusa la carenza di personale e la necessità di prenotare la pulizia dal giorno prima.
La colazione è di scarsa qualità, quantità e varietà e la si deve consumare nella hall, peraltro grande, ma inadeguata alla bisogna, per numero di tavoli e di sedie, per cui si è costretti ad adattarsi sulle poltrone.
Il parcheggio è carissimo: 40 dollari a notte! 
La notte non si riposa bene a causa dei rumorosissimi condizionatori e a causa del passaggio di treni nel vicino passaggio a livello, che spesso è chiuso, il che comporta l'effettuazione di un ulteriore giro prima di arrivare all'hotel.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
review_title: Das nächste Mal werden wir uns ein anderes Hotel suchen.
good_review: Das Frühstück ist für amerikanische Verhältnisse sehr gut.
bad_review:
Das Parken ist sehr teuer (40$ pro Tag).
Unser Zimmer war für 4 Personen gebucht, aber nur für zwei Personen fertiggestellt. Sofa ausziehen, Bett machen etc. war unser Job. Für $ 300/Nacht hätten wir da mehr erwartet.
Das Zimmer war sauber, aber das Hotel selber hätte einen Frühjahrsputz verdient. 
Der Zug ist wirklich laut.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review: Las instalaciones son de primera calidad, el personal fue muy atento y amable, la ubicación es increíble, unión Square a una cuadra y todo lo que se necesite está cerca, las habitaciones están aisladas de sonido, por lo que se descansa súper bien.
bad_review: La habitación y las camas son pequeñas, por lo que dormir dos personas en una sola cama no es del todo cómodo, además las camas son un poco aguadas, sin embargo eso no opaca la estancia de calidad que se recibe. Por lo demás lo recomiendo, ya que la calidad de servicio y las instalaciones es increíble.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Excelente hotel en Union Square. Habitaciones super amplias, excelente personal, muy buen gimnasio y ubicación perfecta si quieres estar por la zona de US.
bad_review: Lo unico que tendrán que mejorar es el servicio de estacionamiento, es realmente MUY caro y sin sentido, te cobran cerca de USD80 x noche cuando hay estacionamientos en la calle cercanos por la mitad de precio. Si ofrecieran a un precio razonable ese servicio seria un 10! Tampoco incluye desayuno en la tarifa.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y vistas a la bahía
bad_review: Llegamos al hotel, después de 13 horas de viaje y nos dijeron que tenían overbooking y que no nos podíamos alojar allí. Después de quejarnos, de recibir un desprecio brutal, de pedir responsabilidades, de que nos tratasen como si fuésemos nadie y de insistir en que nos dieran una habitación en el hotel, la cual teníamos confirmada por ellos mismos, nos llevaron a otro hotel en la calle de atrás y nos recolocaron sin ningún gasto allí. No era el hotel que llevábamos esperando 6 meses con la reserva hecha, ni el hotel que queríamos desde luego. Un trato deleznable, de verdad.

Cuando llegamos preguntamos si al ausentarnos por 4 días y retornar al hotel podían guardar el equipaje y la respuesta fue positiva pero cuando quisimos entregar el equipaje no lo aceptaron y tuvimos que ir a un depósito exterior. Luego de estar por 7 noches con 3 cuartos pedí el último día si nos autorizaban un late check out o pagar la mitad de la tarifa hasta las 19:00, y sólo nos permitieron haata las 14:00, cuando el hotel no estaba lleno.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Good location, union square is right in front. Daily housekeeping. Big and comfortable bed.
bad_review: Bathtub was unstable at the bottom, not too sure if it’s a defect or all rooms are same. There is a mandatory destination fee of $35 per day, even if you don’t use the discount. And we had to pay a $20 fee for upgrade to a high floor. Given Grand Hyatt’s high hotel fee, shouldn’t there be complimentary upgrade where high floors are available?

acommodation: Habitación Doble con vistas a la ciudad - 2 camas dobles
review_title: Standard international hotel in a central location. Great breakfast buffet!
good_review: The best things in this hotel are the staff and the breakfast buffet. Very friendly staff, and great food at the buffet. The location is quite nice too, very close the the main gate into Chinatown, and also close to Union Square and some very nice shopping streets.
bad_review: Valet parking is overpriced ($85) so we did not take it. The room we got was smaller than we expected, and the beds were a lot smaller. Maybe we misunderstood the meaning of "double bed". Anyway we asked for another room and ended up in a suite, with a significant extra price to pay. Furniture in the room was a bit rusty and could use some maintenance. Overall value for money is low as prices are very high.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
review_title: Overall very happy. Location is good.
good_review: We had a twin bed room which was spacious. The Location is perfect for all shopping. The Police presence is good with so many homeless people hanging around.
bad_review: The water pressure in the bathroom is very poor for an expensive Hotel. First time returning to San Francisco in 15 years. The homeless is out of control.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con vistas a la ciudad - 2 camas dobles
review_title: Top class hotel in San Francisco!
good_review:
Top class Hotel! Staff extremely friendly! If we plan to visit San Fran again, this hotel would be our choice!
Located in the center, close to Union Square, you have everything nearby. And if you are lucky enough to get a hotel room in floor 26 (like we did :-)), you can enjoy a breathtaking view! Free Gym in floor 35 makes even the training super easy! 
When it comes to San Francisco, safety is a topic; by choosing this hotel, you don't have to worry about any safety concerns.
bad_review: Parking is way to expensive!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: I really loved the location of the Grand Hyatt San Francisco. Being next to Union Station and restaurants was great. The staff was also very friendly and personable. I also appreciate the cleaning staff being so attentive to my room. They come early but will come back when you give them a time you’re leaving.
bad_review: I was very disappointed that the restaurant didn’t offer a buffet breakfast that included hot breakfast meats that weren’t pork. The first day we ate breakfast they offered chicken sausage. They next day it was bacon and pork sausage. You would think that daily they would have hot breakfast meats that didn’t include pork. That was a huge disappointment. Luckily I walked to a restaurant close by that offered a variety of options.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: The facility and staff were both quite nice but the bathrooms and water issues need work.
good_review: The facility is beautiful and the rooms are comfortable. Public areas were nicely decorated and provided ample seating and space. Having a cafe on site was very helpful.
bad_review: The bathroom setup was pretty poor for a nice hotel. The tub/shower combination was small and the base/floor of the tub was not solid, creating some sort of gap underneath that you could feel when using the shower. The worst part was the water temperature, which would fluctuate from extremely cold to dangerously hot every 20-60 seconds, making it impossible (and potentially dangerous) to shower. The hot temperature that it would suddenly switch to (this is with the temp set at warm and not adjusted) was scalding and had the potential to leave burns.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Lovely city centre hotel in the heart of San Francisco
good_review: We stayed at the Grand Hyatt for one night during our honeymoon and we loved the city centre location. Upon check-in we were upgraded to a bigger room which overlooked Union Square. This was a lovely surprise and a brilliant gesture from the hotel staff! Everything is within easy walking distance and there are plenty of public transport options nearby to make getting around even easier. There are plenty of great shops nearby (Macy’s, Bloomingdales etc) as well as some great late night bars. We went to a speakeasy called Local Edition which is about 0.4 miles from the hotel - can highly recommend. We didn’t have a chance to sample the food or drink at the on site bar/restaurant but it all looked lovely from what we saw. Would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking to do some sight-seeing in San Francisco as it’s a great base!

good_review: Stylish rooms, generally very comfortable and had everything you needed (coffee machine, fancy toiletries, mini fridge). Staff were all friendly and helpful. Overall a very pleasant stay.
bad_review:
Some rooms have doors between them, presumably to accommodate larger groups booking adjoining rooms. These doors aren't particularly soundproof however and we could hear the people next door (not part of our group). 
Also if you're in a room facing the road then you may notice traffic noise as I think the windows are single glazed. Neither of these things bothered us much, or were unexpected for a city centre hotel, but those preferring a quiet room may wish to request a higher floor / not road facing.

acommodation: Habitación con balcón y vistas a la ciudad - 1 cama extragrande
good_review: The hotel location in Japantown was perfect. Parking was easy in the city parking garage attacked to the hotel. The staff was excellent, so attentive and kind. The lobby area was huge and had so many great seating areas for relaxing. There was also a 24/7 coffee/tea station which was great. We spent an afternoon downstairs just reading on a sofa, which was lovely. The room itself was simple and clean. The bathroom was not luxurious, but perfectly adequate. The buffet breakfast (an extra cost) was great. Huge variety and good quality food. Would highly recommend this hotel to others visiting the city, especially anyone hoping to avoid the downtown area which can be very busy.
bad_review: My only slight complaint was that there is no separate light in the toilet and no door to the sink area outside so in the middle of the night the option was either to pee in the dark or turn on a light that would very likely wake up anyone else in the room. Overall this was just a minor inconvenience and the lobby, staff and location of the hotel more than made up for it! We would stay there again for sure!

acommodation: Habitación con balcón y vistas a la ciudad - 1 cama extragrande
good_review: Had to upgrade to get a room on a higher floor with decent view.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y balcón con vistas a la ciudad
good_review: Location was good. Amenities were clean and well appointed
bad_review: The room and beds were quite small. The bathroom without a door and shower exposed was tricky with a family and the lights in the bathroom were all connected so to turn on the light in the toilet would have woken up everyone in the middle of the night. Our toilet overflowed and a crew had to be sent for clean up and repairs. Very inconvenient. Staff could have been friendlier and we were never offered anything complimentary for the toilet situation. We checked out a day early and made sure the evening before checkout that it was ok and no penalty would be incurred only to be met with a different answer in the morning which required a manager to resolve. So that was upsetting on a last note especially with the toilet situation a couple nights prior.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: I'd stay in and recommend the hip, freshly-renovated Hotel Kabuki in safe Japantown over and over.
good_review: Very stylish, unique hotel. And in 2023, it's important to add that it's in a safe neighborhood. Hotel Kabuki is rightly on many lists like the 10 Coolest Hotels in San Francisco and the very Best Boutique Hotels in San Francisco. I agree. I've lived in San Francisco for almost 30 years and know the neighborhoods well. While renovating our apartment, I had to find a room near home last minute. I looked extensively online and found other hip, beautiful hotels in SF, but once I saw the neighborhood or cross streets, I knocked them off the list because of how seedy the areas are now. Hotel Kabuki is the rare gem that is All. The. Things. The aesthetics are a 10 out of 10. The hotel strikes an eyebrow-raising balance between artistic and minimalist. The staff is top-notch, welcoming, warm, professional. The beds, pillows, and sheets are incredibly comfortable. Everything is super clean and fresh. The lounge is so inviting it was impossible not to enjoy my complimentary coffee in it before leaving. Two big thumbs up. I love it. (Photos by Jessica Kay and Aubrie Pick)
bad_review: The parking lot was full when I arrived, albeit it late at night. On the bright side, I found a parking spot right across the street, and because the meter was broken, I ended up getting FREE parking (FYI: it's a metered spot on the northwest side of Post Street near Buchanan in front of Sally's Salon). In a city where hotel parking ranges from $40-$100 per night, that was a fun win. There was lots of open street parking, and the meters start at 9 AM, so it's not a bad idea to park on the street. There's also a Japantown parking lot right down the block. If Hotel Kabuki were in a different neighborhood, I might not recommend street parking, but it's quiet, calm, and safe here.

acommodation: Suite
review_title: great facilities, avoid sofa bed at all costs.
good_review:
The sofa bed was terrible! The cushion is almost obsolete and you can feel the springs just be feeling the cushions with your fingers. I got severe back pain on the second night that has stayed with me throughout my trip so far and really dampened my spirits. I ended up using the couch cushions as a mattress on the floor. 
Our room was spacious and nice, except it was too dark near our bed (the area near the window was nice though!). The facilities were super nice— free coffee and water 24/7, the gym is stunning and spacious— and it was right on the cusp of japantown. Super easy to just walk out and go explore! Parking seems difficult if you have a car with a small lot with limited spaces. My parents thought the actual bed was comfortable, so would be good for 2 people but absolutely not a choice for 3 if you’re counting on the sofa bed.

Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: A great place to stay in San Francisco.
good_review: The hotel staff are really friendly and it was very welcoming after a long road trip. Very clean room and the view from the hotel balcony is beautiful. The shower is spacious and all of the hygiene necessities were provided to us. Large TV with access to streaming services and wifi is provided. Location is close to restaurants (walking distance) and a large Japanese market place. Parking for the hotel itself is small, but it is also clean with a nice aesthetic. There is another parking lot, but from my understanding it was paid parking (I didn't have to use it however, so I am not sure on specifics) The surrounding area is very lively in the day (lots of foot traffic), but quiets down at night. Overall a very safe area and very enjoyable place to stay.
bad_review: A bigger parking lot would be nice. Maybe a few vending machines (unless I didn't see them myself). Otherwise no major complaints, this is seriously a nice hotel.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: We love staying in Japantown. There are good omakase restaurants just a short walk away, and the free parking in front of the hotel was convenient.

acommodation: Habitación Doble adaptada para personas con movilidad reducida
review_title: I've enjoyed staying at Hotel Kabuki and already have my next trip booked there.
good_review: The new decor is beautiful. It really is San Francisco perfect and it's a happy place to be. Some of the room doors have a great black/white/red design. It's so cool I took a picture and made it my iPad wallpaper. There are also great views of SF.
bad_review: The only thing missing is that during covid the restaurant isn't open.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review:
No electric car charged 
Stayed there for 2 days and one car hooked up for two days so weird that charge a lot and centrally located but only 1 charger plus staff said go out and pay charge your car lower floor. I called specifically before book and asked car charger and you guys said yes they have. 
Otherwise I would book somewhere and they charge my car for me. I never worry and don’t even have to ask 
Blanket was smelly, but changed it for us

acommodation: Habitación Doble adaptada para personas con movilidad reducida
bad_review: Breakfast

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: Coffee

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Rooms were clean, roomy, CLEAN, The tv was very nice and big. Like the remodeling. I can see what they were going for. Miss the previous decor.
bad_review: They got rid of the big baths that were so roomy. Worst thing about it is that they are still there but they made it into a seat for the shower which isn’t needed. My gf and I came here for the large baths in our private room. This was very disappointing

acommodation: Habitación - 1 cama grande - Adaptada para personas con discapacidad
review_title: we love to stay here because it is close to anything we want and can walk.
good_review: check in was easy, room was quiet and very clean
bad_review: I really miss the bar and dining room.... the coffee in the room was very weak

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Everything else was awesome!! Close food and mall, clean room, art was cool!!!
bad_review: No microwave in room, not easy to find a bottle of water in hotel

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Huge shower! Funky art, location is great. Walked around japan town reading historical markers.
bad_review: Loved the place would like to come back when there isn't a pandemic.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y balcón con vistas a la ciudad
good_review: I love the Kabuki. It's close walking distance to fantastic restaurants from Pacific Heights to the Fillmore not to mention being in Japan Town. And I feel safe from Covid-19 there.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: We've stayed here many times in the past, great central location, dog-friendly, lovely caring staff and great lobby now. Can't wait until - post-covid to come back and enjoy a cocktail in that lobby. This is still our go-to hotel for SF.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Overpriced, very basic room. not worth the cost
bad_review: Overpriced, very basic room. expensive parking and the area of town was just OK. maybe San Francisco has seen better days

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: everything was great. really liked the hotel
bad_review: the Thai restaurant is a bit of a tourist trap. it’s overly expensive for what it is but the hotel itself is absolutely great!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: We loved the Japanese ambiance that complemented Japantown. We also want to complement Nikolai at the reception, who welcomed us with sincerity, gave us a corner room and perfectly resolved an issue that arose. He represented Hyatt extremely well!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: The other guests are unrespectful but it is understandable.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Lovely service. Great location in Japantown. We really appreciated the precautions in place for staff and guest safety.

acommodation: Habitación con balcón y vistas a la ciudad - 1 cama extragrande
review_title: Hôtel accueillant avec une jolie décoration au cœur de japantown
good_review: Petit déjeuner excellent. Varié avec des saveurs renouvelées chaque jour. Proposé dans le magnifique lobby de l’hôtel. Personnel attentionné.
bad_review: Espace douche pas très pratique. Peu d’attaches pour accrocher les serviettes Bruit perceptible des portes du couloir. Espace laissant passer l’air au niveau des baies vitrées .

acommodation: Habitación Esquinera con cama extragrande
review_title: Solides Zimmer im Herzen von San Francisco!
good_review: Tolles grosses Zimmer mit viel Platz
bad_review: Klimaanlage funktionierte nicht. Es war immer ein wenig zu kalt.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review:
ארוהת הבוקר היא מינימאלית!!!ויקרה!!!!
וכל יום אותו הדבר ...
ללא גבינות,מרקות,יוגורטים,נקניקים..
.יחס מחיר לתמורה...8..בגלל ארוכת הבוקר

good_review:
le fait qu’il soit excentré et que l'environnement n'était qu'asiatique(supermarchés etc..)
salle de bains minuscule

acommodation: Habitación - 1 cama grande - Adaptada para personas con discapacidad
good_review: Hotel très bien placé dans Japan town.
bad_review: Seul bemol: notre chambre donnait sur la rue et donc il y avait énormément de bruit. Et souvent a partir de tôt le matin.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y balcón con vistas a la ciudad
good_review:
Distributeur de boisson chaudes et eau à volonté H24, salle de sport,
Les multiples canapés salon a l'accueil.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y balcón con vistas a la ciudad
bad_review: camere un po’ piccole.

acommodation: Habitación Doble adaptada para personas con movilidad reducida
bad_review: Difficile de trouver un parking gratuit

acommodation: Habitación Doble adaptada para personas con movilidad reducida
review_title: Schönes Hotel direkt in Japantown gelegen.
good_review:
Die Lobby und das Zimmer sind sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet. Man kann sich jederzeit mit Kaffeespezialitäten, Tee, Wasser selbst versorgen.
Richtiges Hotel mit allem Service, den ein Hotel bieten sollte.
bad_review:
Die Zimmer sind relativ klein. Ebenso die Betten (Twin size), wenn man ein Bett mit 2 Personen nutzen will.
Das Frühstück ist überteuert und nicht sehr umfangreich. Besser man geht in der nahegelegenen Fillmore street frühstücken, wo es in zu Fuss Reichweite (5 - 10 min) zahlreiche gute bis sehr gute Frühstücksmöglichkeiten gibt. 
Das Badezimmer lies sich nicht richtig verschliessen, nur mit einer Schiebetüre mit offenem Schlitz.
Kein Wellness-Bereich. Für das kühl San Francisco wäre es abends schön gewesen, in eine Sauna zu können.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y balcón con vistas a la ciudad
review_title: Hip, maar zeer matig hotel op weinig centrale locatie voor een veel te hoge prijs.
good_review: De lobby is mooi en hip ingericht, ook goed licht. onze kamer (een upgrade) was heel ruim, het bed was ook goed.
bad_review: Het hotel was extreem duur voor de kwaliteit die werd geboden. En zeker ook voor de locatie, die niet centraal was. De origineel door ons geboekte kamer was kleiner dan verwacht en er hing een onfrisse geur. Daarom fors bijbetaald voor upgrade, toen werd ons gemeld dat we ook nog bij moesten betalen voor extra bed. Dat vonden we niet ok. Zeker gezien de minder goede locatie van dit hotel zijn dit soort kamerprijzen niet redelijk. Voor deze prijzen kun je echt een veel luxer hotel boeken in SF op een betere locatie. Het ontbijt was ook erg duur, zeker gezien het feit dat je met je bord maar ergens in de lobby moest gaan zitten. Heel raar.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y balcón con vistas a la ciudad
review_title: Hôtel agréable et bien placé et personnel très gentil
good_review: Hôtel très agréable dans un quartier calme et personnel très agréable

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y balcón con vistas a la ciudad
review_title: Bel emplacement mais hôtel peu adapté aux familles
good_review:
La situation de l’hôtel 
La décoration
Le portier et les femmes de ménage
bad_review:
La chambre. Un rideau sépare la chambre de la salle de bain; il n’y a donc pas d’intimité et allumer cette pièce en pleine nuit pose également problème.
Petit-déjeuner non adapté aux enfants européens.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles

good_review:

bad_review: Im Zimmer hat man die Straße ziemlich laut gehört.

dessverre mye matlukt på rommet.
Litt for dårlig lys ved vasken på badet, og litt for mørkt på rommet generelt. veldig kaldt på badet, da vifter stod på for fullt hele tiden.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y balcón con vistas a la ciudad
good_review: Angenehme Athmosphäre, schöne Lobby, allzeit leckerer Kaffee und Tee, Sprudelwasser
bad_review: Keine Regale im Zimmer, um Koffer auszupacken

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y balcón con vistas a la ciudad
good_review: Su ubicación en Japantown, muy limpio y céntrico.
bad_review: Me hubiera gustado que la regadera tuviera puerta de madera o bambú

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Приятный отель с качественным дизайном и удобствами.
good_review: Номер очень чистый, красивый, приятный дизайн. Лобби выше всех похвал, очень светло и уютно. Прекрасная кровать. Вид на центр города! Бесплатная парковка, если найдете место. Отзывчивый персонал.
bad_review: В Сан-Франциско нас ограбили. Не оставляйте никогда вещи в машине. К сожалению, там это частая практика. Только из-за этого факта В Сан-Франциско больше не поедем. Странный город.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
bad_review: Temizliğe biraz daha önem vermelerini isterim...

bad_review:

acommodation: Habitación con balcón y vistas a la ciudad - 1 cama extragrande
review_title: Trop cher pour le niveau de prestation
good_review: Très beau lobby, salle de sport, chambre spacieuse.
bad_review: Très impersonnel, lit très mou et inconfortable (draps housse ne va pas jusqu'au bout du matelas 🤔🫣) salle de sport moyennement propre avec pas de serviette disponible. Le petit déjeuner n'est pas mauvais mais néanmoins moyen).

acommodation: Habitación con balcón y vistas a la ciudad - 1 cama extragrande
good_review: Todo me gusto. Fue una gran sorpresa encontrar este hotel. Amplios espacios en la recepción, una decoración muy bien lograda. Personal eficiente. Tiene un pequeño jardín japonés muy agradable. Arte por todos lados. Habitaciones limpias y amplias. Restaurantes buenos cerca. Japan town a unos minutos. El desayuno ese delicioso.

bad_review: Personale approssimativo, camere sporche, pessima colazione

bad_review: nichts

acommodation: Habitación Esquinera con cama extragrande
review_title: Immer wieder - Oase nicht nur für Japantown
good_review: Zimmer phantastisch mit Blick (hatten ein Eckzimmer); ganzes Hotel stilvoll eingerichtet im Japan-California fusion style; Gym irre groß und exzellent ausgestattet. Restaurant „Nari“ (Thai) ein Muss, „chef‘s picks“ ist das ultimative Erlebnis. Japantown um das Hotel herum bietet viele weitere kulinarische Möglichkeiten. Parken für Hotel am Besten in der Japan Center Tiefgarage.
bad_review: Balkontür schließt nicht.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Gran lugar para conocer San Francisco
good_review: Ubicación inmejorable dentro de Japantown. Muchos lugares deliciosos para comer cerca. Muy cerca de la calle de Fillmore que tiene muchas tiendas y lugares para comer. Nos dieron en el front desk un upgrade en la habitación. Cuartos super limpios, el personal muy amable y atento en todo momento. Café y té complementarios 24/7 en el área del bar.

acommodation: Suite Loft con 2 camas dobles
good_review: Super ambiance, magnifique décoration. Propreté impeccable (rare aux usa). Petit jardin zen agréable. Chambre très spacieuse. Gel douche sent super bon.

acommodation: Suite Loft con 2 camas dobles
bad_review: Es troba a faltar esmorzar mes complet

bad_review:

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande, sofá cama y bañera accesible - Adaptada para personas con discapacidad
bad_review: The eggs taste like plastic

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles y sofá cama
good_review: It’s a new modern hotel situated in a good location. Parking is easy, though there is no shade.
bad_review:
The rooms weren’t very clean. We stayed twice and both times we found stains in the carpets, dust build up on the ice buckets and on other surfaces, kids/dog toys and garbage under the beds, and drips of something (who knows what?) on the desk and nightstand. The cleaning staff regularly pulls down their face masks when in public areas of the hotel, so we could only imagine they didn’t wear them when cleaning the rooms. It seems that the hotel is in need of a rooms manager to conduct thorough cleaning checks (or better training and adherence if that role already exists). During the pandemic, I can’t tell you how much of a turn off a leas than immaculate room feels — especially when you a staying with kids who want to touch everything.
This hotel does not provide luggage valets in the rooms by default — there is a space for them, but it’s empty. So you have nowhere to open your suitcase other than the (dirty) floor. We found out you can call for them to be delivered to your room, but expect to get all kinds of attitude about how they don’t have “room service at this hotel” and expect to wait up yo an hour for this basic hotel equipment to be delivered.
Most staff (except housekeeping staff) wore their masks properly. Though there were signs everywhere requiring face masks to be worn in all public areas of the hotel, this was not enforced by staff at all. At least half of the guests did not wear masks, even when directly in front of the front desk clerk.
The pool area could use some attention — it just looked neglected. Way too much chlorine in the water too.
There are not ice machines in every floor, and they won’t deliver ice to your room… so you’ll have to go hunting for the machines on every other floor.
Breakfast was not so great, though the attendants were friendly. Expect powdered eggs that are watery and overcooked. Bruised bananas were the only fresh fruit option — most of them had broken peels. Orange juice was something akin to Tang.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes y sofá cama - Planta alta
good_review: Everything !!! Will definitely book a stay here every time I’m in town!!!
bad_review: Loved everything!

good_review: We just had travelled from Northern California to Rhode Island and back and this place was by far the best hotel for the price that we stayed at during the whole 2 week trip. It was so comfortable, breakfast was great and the pool was the cherry on the cake! So nice, staff was amazing, the room was clean and no funny smells. The neighborhood also seemed pretty safe. Would highly recommend to anyone traveling through

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles y sofá cama
bad_review: Biggest issue was lack of cleanliness. This is a NEW hotel, so keeping it looking great shouldn’t be hard. The gym was filthy the 1st 4 days of my stay, until I complained! Spillage and hair on floor. The treadmills were moved at some point, and the marks left on the floor with clumps of hair stuck to them should have been addressed immediately, whenever they moved them. Terrible value for money, as I didn’t even use the gym like I wanted to. I also requested a bath tub; it would’ve been nice if they were more accommodating. I needed 2 beds as well and was told the only room with a tub was a king bed. That would’ve been fine, if they had informed me the rooms all come with sofa beds too, fulfilling the need for 2nd bed. Also, why the heck was the lobby so hot? Friends met me and we were sitting there starting to sweat! Seriously? The staff was friendly enough, but I’d never stay here again based on the constant filth everywhere. And if you have a hotel with white tile, you need to commit to frequent moppings in high traffic areas. Gross. I was embarrassed to have booked this for my family.

review_title: My Worst stay in a long time.....
good_review: The location of this place coming off-highway is about a 20-minute drive into the town. Upon arriving and while checking in, I only happened to mention that I have a Hyatt rewards account - the guy at the counter went you booked through a third party site so we don't consider them for rewards - not that I wanted them badly, but the way it was handled was not right. You want the business through a third party but no perks for customers coming through them. It is a general place with an average atmosphere - nothing great about this place.
bad_review: We were driving from CA to Vegas and this was our break overnight, this place was infested with party people and they were making noise merrily throughout the night. I complained around 11.30 and then mid-night - management tried to do something but there were people on the corridor yelling and screaming at 3.30. I wouldn't suggest this place if you want some peace and quiet. Finally when we checked out, I normally get asked in most of the places as to how the stay was and I gett an opportunity to share my feedback in person - I was never asked this question.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles y sofá cama
good_review: The staff was very friendly. Was in a good part of town, close to shopping, restaurants, and a gas station. Lots of parking and very well lit at night, so felt very safe coming in at night. Room was large with a sitting area, and bathroom was a great size too. Beautiful modern design to the room. It had a small refrigerator for a few drinks and some food. Nice large TV.
bad_review: I checked several reviews, and while it was stated the cleaning could have been better, I am sad to say its still not where it should be. Dust, drink stains and the small coffee pot was dirty. I understand covid is an issue and would not want anyone to be at risk, but getting our trash removed from the room and a couple of towels would have been nice. Was going to take my trash bags to the trash container by the elevator, but that one was overflowing. I saw another guest besides myself asking for towels and trash bags. The bathroom door squeak so loud, and for a new hotel one would think that would have been fixed. Our room was above the dumpsters (bad location for all of us that had rooms on that side), so every morning at 6 am there was a racket from that. One fault with the parking lot in the back leads out to another street, so people constantly driving and cutting through the parking lot. The lightning is so bright (cool white LEDs) we had to put dark bags over the lamps. Suggestion, replace the cool white with a warm white LED.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y sofá cama
bad_review:
New hotels should not have mold in and around the shower. They should also advise that they only service rooms every 4 days, so it you want any extra towels, pick them up at the desk. This also means trash is always setting in the halls. 
They advertise breakfast with this room, but out of 3 days, 2 off which had nothing but coffee. The other was a waiting line for a bowl of cereal (after a member of the morning staff on Saturday promised a "Real hot breakfast!" for us Sunday. That was missing. 
The icing on the cake was the trash truck dumping several dumpsters at 5:30 AM. 
Check out was like dealing with a robot. The only thing he said was, " do you need a print out, and there ya go!" and went of to continue his work. 
Thanks would have been customary, "how was your stay? " would have been considerate. Going over the invoice would have been efficient. Eye contact would have possibly given me an opportunity to tell him about my visit and my future visits. 
None of those things happened.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y sofá cama
good_review: Wir auf unsere Rundreise einen Stopp in Bakersfield eingelegt und können das Hotel für Familien als Kurzstop empfehlen. Das Zimmer war gross, bequem, modern eingerichtet und Sauber.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles y sofá cama
review_title: Für 1 Nacht auf der Durchreise empfehlenswert.
good_review: Komfortable, saubere Zimmer, gute Lage, Restaurants und Supermarkt in unmittelbarer Nähe.
bad_review: Frühstück typisch für ein Kettenhotel in dieser Kategorie, einfach und viel Plastikmüll. Keine Überraschungen.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes y bañera accesible - Adaptada para personas con discapacidad
review_title: Bon hôtel rapport qualité prix correct
good_review:
La chambre spacieuse et l’emplacement.
Le petit déjeuner
bad_review:
Le personnel du soir à notre arrivé était très désagréable, elles ont soufflé quand on leur a demandé de la monnaie pour la machine à laver, nous ont invité à aller acheter à manger à la station à côté alors qu’elles vendaient les même produits… 
Le truc handicapé dans la baignoire qui prenait beaucoup de place.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles y sofá cama

good_review:
TOUT! la localisation proche d’une zone commerciale avec de quoi faire des courses et commander à manger. 
l’accueil parfait, très bon petit déjeuner, une chambre avec 2 lits king size et coin salon, piscine, salle de sport et le LUXE du LUXE une machine à laver et un sèche linge au 4 eme etage.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y sofá cama
review_title: Blij dat we dit maar 1 nacht hadden geboekt
good_review: De dame bij receptie was erg aardig
bad_review:
De kamer was vies, leek totaal niet schoongemaakt; haren in badkamer, douche, wastafel. Maar ook haren in het bed, daarnaast lagen er nog kruimels op de grond (geen stofzuiger gebruikt). We hebben zelf ‘schoongemaakt’ voor we onze schoenen uitdeden. 
Ontbijt was inclusief, stelde verder niet veel voor, maar prima voor een yoghurt en wat fruit.

review_title: Hotel impecable y completo a 5 min del aeropuerto
good_review: Ideal para estar cerca del aeropuerto si tenes que tomar un vuelo temprano. Es muy limpio, cómodo. Incluye desayuno. Tiene gym y piscina en la terraza. Tiene traslado gratis al aeropuerto cada 15 minutos

Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Te cobran un depósito totalmente ridículo
good_review: La ubicación, pegado al aeropuerto de Los Ángeles. La habitación es muy linda y la cama muy cómoda. El servicio de transfers al aeropuerto funciona muy bien.
bad_review: El desayuno no me gustó para nada, muy poca variedad. Lo otro que es desastroso es que te retienen en la tarjeta de crédito un depósito equivalente a la cantidad de noches que te quedas, en mi caso fueron dos noches y me retuvieron USD 497!! Tardaron casi un mes en devolverlo, me parece totalmente ridículo. Es la primera vez que me toman un depósito así en un hotel. No volvería simplemente por ese detalle.

Pero realmente no podemos creer que jamás nos devolvieron la suma que te retienen durante la estadía, que fueron 450 dolares, aun a pesar de los reiterados intentos. El personal solo alargaba cada vez más el tiempo en que demorarian en de volver el dinero. Mi fecha de salida fue el 5 de abril. Aún hoy no tenemos respuesta. Aclaro: rompimos nada!

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio con cama extragrande, cocina y sofá cama
good_review: Despite being less than a km from the airport and along West Century Blvd, it is setback from the road by lawn and gardens rendering it ver peaceful. So peaceful in fact as we were sitting having drinks on the terrace by the lawn, a pair of rabbits popped out to feed. Unbelievable in the madness that is LAX, but they had plenty of lush food and great vegetation forming perfect shelter, so long may bunnies rule.
bad_review: The access. Despite a sweeping driveway up to their front doors, access is through a parking garage at the rear. The signage is confusing, as are the directions sent on the day of arrival, and parking, unloading, checking in and moving again is such a hassle, even after you locate the right entrance. Hopefully it is only bureaucracy keeping the front driveway from use. A better restaurant would also be welcome. The current bar and restaurant staff are fantastic, but the menu is basically diner food. We went next door for really great sushi, but in an equally diner like atmosphere.

review_title: We enjoyed our stay and I’ll definitely recommend it. The personnel was very helpful and attentive. Especially, Alexandr

Especially, Alexandra (Sascha) who works at front desk helped with our checking in process very much. I have to say that we chose this hotel because it had breakfast. But I cannot call that breakfast. We stayed there 7 nights and they served the same food every single day. There was no diversity. The last day we talked about this issue with Sergio, he said that they are working on it and he will bring this issue up to the owner and management.

Unfortunately, when I got to that room, it was not cleaned. The bed cover was arranged to make it look like the bedsheets were changed, but it was a bunch of hair on the pillow. The trash was not removed from the kitchen and the bathroom and 2 towels were hanging in the bathroom. After I told them about the situation, they gave me another room, away from elevators.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Very good! Parking was too expensive and should be lowered to affordable rate.
good_review: Great location next to the airport and car rentals. Alfo, quick access to freeways. Breakfast was super nice! Modern elevators was a plus also since kids can't delay ups and downs!
bad_review: Parking fees are definitely a sad situation. We parked across the street for 8 dollars less than at the hotel! Clients shouldn't need to have to park two blocks away. It was worth it to save 8 dollars a day (gas money) but the hotel should be embarrassed at their high priced parking for guests! Seventeen dollars as opposed to 23 dollars is significant! Hotel should at least match that price of 17 dollars and clients would have a less stressful event and better satisfaction!!! Other than that, our stay was very nice!

review_title: convenient quality choice for airport overnighting.
good_review: Proximity to the airport, reliable and frequent shuttle, comfortable and well appointed room, breakfast with fresh fruit, yoghurt, granola, bagels and some hot items. Friendly staff let me check in early.
bad_review: It was hard to get an Uber or Lyft and almost impossible to walk anywhere.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: The supervisor named Destiny, horrible with guest, I witnessed her roll her eyes behind my friends back and made annoying faces until she realized she saw me watching her and our friends walked over to me and my wife, I never write reviews, this is my first because I felt it was necessary to show you how some of your employees treat paying customers. We were a party of 6 (3 couples), We were told at the time of check in, that we all would be on the same Floor, but they put us ALL on different Floors, which I can understand because of availability, but the problem was, that we were told that we would all be together. The Bed and room was very good, but Dean's supervisor, Destiny, very bad hospitality. Dean was nice and very professional. I'm only complaining, myself and my partners who stay at your Hotel, we are All in Law Enforcement, and to be treated like we were is unexcusable.

review_title: Pretty good hotel for the family.
good_review: The hotel was nice. The staff was lovely. The food was pretty good, there should have been a few more options, and it was a little cold.
