acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: 1 night stay at Hyatt house LAX, October.
good_review:
Nice enough room, clean tidy, quiet on ground floor just round from reception which we found weird but was ok. Bed was very comfortable and we had a good night's sleep. Food and drinks at the bar was well priced and very nice and service was excellent from the staff. And breakfast early next morning had a good selection of food to choose from, very enjoyable.
Also iin your room is a coffee percolator only, no kettle for boiling hot water but that's more a kKwi/Aussie / British thing for making a pot of tea so we were disappointed in that but for Americans who drink perc coffee it will tick the box ok.
Bathroom was clean and shower had reasonable pressure and plenty of hot water.
bad_review:
Room was a bit dark we thought, needs more lights as made it a little difficult to see properly as no main light for the room, more mood lighting and bedside lights.
Also Worst thing is though DO NOT LEAVE ANYTHING BEHIND IN THE ROOM. You will NOT get it back. We tried multiple phone calls, emails, going direct to hotel, Main Hyatt reservations, even they could not reach anyone at the hotel. Absolutely useless unfortunately. My partner left 2 jackets behind which she was so peed off with herself for doing so that was our fault, but, even through booking .com, there has not to date been any response from Hyatt House. Left messages on phone of a guy called Corey at Hyatt,. Nothing,! No response to any contacts and good luck trying to get through to reception, they just don't answer the phone. Staff to deal with in person were really good but no one answers the phone if you can get through to the hotel.
We were happy to pay for courier forwarding or return shipping to NZ but NOTHING, ZIP🤐
So do not leave anything behind unless you can actually physically go back to the hotel.
Other than that, nothing really at the hotel is bad.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
Great location, next to the LAX airport. 
Super comfortable bed, felt like sleeping in a cloud. Room was big with a little sofa, desk and a big window facing the airport. We didn't hear the airplanes during the night which was great. 
The rooftop pool was nice, we used at night before closing, which is 10pm.
Breakfast in the morning was ok, don't expect service, but you have everything you need to start your day: coffee, juices, scrambled eggs, different kind of bread, yogurt. 
Parking just behind the hotel, very comfortable with reserved space for hotel guests.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
review_title: Excelente value for money for connecting with Lax.
good_review: Very spacious, practical and comfortable rooms! No noise from the airport as we had an interior room. Nice and helpful staff. Fast shuttle to Lax. Our family used it to chill out/buffer before taking our flight back to Europe after 4 weeks on the road. it worked very well for that as we could drop the car the day before and relax in the pool till flight time. good breakfast.
bad_review: The pool is missing shadows/umbrellas. July sun was too hot and there was not a single shadow in the pool. Also the top/pool bar was closed during all our stay which was a surprise considering we stay during the Summer season. Our room was excellent, spacious and comfortable but without a window. it would had been nice to be informed at the check in of the lack of windows as kids were looking forward to watch the airplanes. However the silence was welcome :)

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio con cama extragrande, cocina y sofá cama
review_title: Hotel didn’t follow through on specific requests, sofa-bed inhumane.
bad_review: We booked a king suite with a sofa bed. We had explicitly requested a high floor with a view of the airport. When we arrived, we were notified that our room was on the ground floor and facing a dark, dingy alleyway. We asked to be put on a higher floor but they were “fully sold out”. Ok. We checked out the room, which was actually nice, and folded out the sofa bed. I have no idea where they purchased it from but it was INHUMANE!!! I laid down on it and I felt springs poking my back and the mattress itself was very thin and uncomfortable. Needless to say, we took our business elsewhere.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
good_review: The hotel is conveniently located about a 10-minute drive from Los Angeles Airport and offers a complimentary airport shuttle service. The shuttle runs every 15-20 minutes, without the need for prior reservations, making it extremely convenient for travelers.
bad_review:
Check-in is available from 3 PM; however, during my stay, we arrived at 3:55 PM only to be informed that our room was not yet ready. We had to wait for almost an hour until our room was finally prepared, which was quite dissatisfying.The room type we booked was a King Suite, with a spacious 37-square-meter area that included a separate bathroom and kitchenette.
In the bathroom, the sink setup was basic, with the hairdryer and amenities placed underneath it. There were no drawers for storage, and the countertop space was limited.
The kitchenette, on the other hand, was well-equipped with utensils and cooking tools. It was convenient for making coffee and preparing simple meals, which was a positive aspect of our stay.
Overall, despite the convenient location and the inclusion of a complimentary airport shuttle, the delay in check-in and the shortcomings in the bathroom design were disappointing. However, the kitchenette provided a satisfactory experience for our needs.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
review_title: Had to call housekeeping and request towels.
good_review: Good room, comfortable and great size.
bad_review: Bad house keeping no fresh towels, no water to drink

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: good hotel, but they do not refund deposits
good_review: Staff was nice, friendly and helpful. Room was nice, comfortable and clean.
bad_review: They did not refund the deposit, and not gave me reason why not.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: We do not know how the breakfast was because it was closed at 9.30am! I tried to get something to eat at 9.45 and they suggested to wait until the restaurant open at 11am. I also missed the breakfast which was included in the price due to this abnormal breakfast time (until 9.30am).
bad_review:
I left my leather jacket in another hotel earlier in our trip in the US and I asked that hotel to ship it to Hilton House before we arrived. When I checked at the reception in the morning they did not find the package, for almost an hour. Then I checked with the other hotel who gave me the USPS tracking number so I could print it and show at the reception that it was indeed delivered. After that they found it within 2 minutes!
It was not too much more time that we had to leave for the terminal as our aircraft was about to leave. I almost missed my jacket at Hyatt House LAX.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Unless you are staying here to fly out of LAX, look elsewhere
good_review: The property was a newer built facility which is always nice however, that’s where the things I liked stopped.
bad_review: We were given the room right outside the elevator next to the ice machine facing the airport so we were disrupted by every plane that took off. The pillows were uncomfortable, the bed was uncomfortable, the planes were loud but the thing I hated most was the parking. $23 to park but you can’t leave or $46 if you wanted in and out privileges. What? Everything is done by you! No valet- it’s all self park so what’s the difference? Also, the $46 spots were normal size but the $23 dollar spots were so narrow that they barely fit a motorcycle. We watched a family get out of their car, then the dad parked it and crawled out the back tailgate because he couldn’t open his door once he pulled into the spot. The breakfast in the morning wasn’t good either. I wouldn’t book here again.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
review_title: An excellent modern style airport hotel

bad_review:
First - place has lots of weird people and I didn’t feel secure walking by myself in the hallways or elevator. also the Shuttle driver that dropped us off at location warned us NOT to walk outside or around the building area at night. I think the hotel should add security personal around its premises . 
Second- we had an early flight to catch and the room had a lot of noise both from airport runway and from the late night “party” going on with loud beat music and MORE on the room next to us. Sorry but this place is not a good idea for families with kids and teenagers.
I am actually surprised that the reviews I read before booking this place did not mention the noise and the insecurity felt in and around the building.

good_review: Besides my incident during this stay the room & employees were very nice.
bad_review: I didn’t like that someone was able to get into my room with their key card. I reserved this room from April 4th to April 6th. I also don’t like that me & my 8 month old baby were alone in our room and during my stay on the 5th a man I did not recognize as someone I know or as a employee for this hotel walked into my room with no problem. I was very startled and did not know what to do, after he realized he had walked into the wrong room he turned around and walked out. The door to my room was closed, this man was able to swipe his card to get into my room with no problem. I reported this incident to the front desk at check out, which was on the 6th, but still have received a email regarding my issue with this stay.

bad_review:
Poor service at the penthouse restaurant. The food was ok, the wine list was minimal. If you’re going to have a lot of luggage, this property does not have bell staff to help you with it. When our cab arrived with us and 5 suitcases, the bellman from the Sonesta hotel next door found us a cart and loaded our luggage for us! we didn’t know he worked for the other hotel. 
We stayed in a room with walk-in shower for physically challenged, I would suggest that shower doors be installed as the shower curtains are not installed so that the water runs into the drain but rather out on the wood floor, which is a huge slipping hazard. Noise from planes starts very early in the 
morning, but it’s quiet at night until around 6am

bad_review: Because the hotel is close to the airport, it’s far away from several destinations. It cost us $44 to take an Uber downtown from Inglewood on a Saturday at 1pm. review_title: Não adianta reservar pelo aplicativo se o hotel cobra o que quiser na hora de passar o cartão!
good_review: Atendia o propósito que é ficar perto do aeroporto! Mas muito confortável a cama!
bad_review: Reservei pelo booking um apartamento para uma noite no valor de US$ 266,10 já com as taxas! O pagamento no momento da chegada! Quando chegamos para apenas dormir, cobraram o valor de US$ 466,00, simplesmente colocaram eu e meu esposo em um quarto acho que presidencial! Que era uma casa! Porém já víamos mortos! Chegamos às 23:00 pra sair do hotel às 3:00, só tomar banho e cochilar! Mas achei uma falta de comprometimento com o aplicativo booking e principalmente com o cliente! Que faz reserva e tudo, e quando chega é ENGANADA pelo hotel! Absurdo!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
Café da manhã muito farto e completo .
Quarto grande e cama muito confortável.
Localização excelente para devolução de carros alugados e embarque em LAX.
bad_review:
O Chuveiro poderia sair mais água , mas nada que tenha comprometido o conforto.
Poderiam aceitar o pagamento em Cash uma vez que o uso do cartão de crétido , no meu país , imputa taxas e impostos que eu não precisaria pagar !

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
Hôtel bien proche de l’aéroport,petit déjeuner très bien 
Pratique pour rendre la voiture de location.
bad_review: Hôtel un peu cher

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Bon petit déjeuner,emplacement bien par rapport à l’aéroport et rendre la voiture de location.
bad_review: Hôtel bien mais un peu cher.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: Personnel du restaurant

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Buon rapporto qualità prezzo , vale la pena
good_review: Posizione , stanza grande , macchina del caffè , parcheggio gratuito
bad_review: Pulizia solo su richiesta , metri di polvere sui mobili ,

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
good_review:
Tres bon emplacement pour l’aéroport 
Accueil parfait 
Possibilités de laisser laissez les bagages après le check out et de profiter de l’hôtel 
Chambre spacieuse et bien équipée
Bon petit déjeuner (gaufres un peu sèches )
bad_review:
Le pool-house n’était pas très propre serviettes sales sur le sol et transat et verre qui traînaient 
Les serviettes propre sont arrivées un peu tard vers 12 h
Jacuzzi sale et mousseux

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
Habitación con cama extragrande.
Studio with Two Queen Beds and Accessible Tub
good_review: Zeer net hotel. Mooie ruime kamers. Vriendelijk personeel en goed ontbijt voor gemiddelde Amerikaanse standaard.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: alles so wie erwartet, gerne wieder!
good_review: Das Frühstück war absolut ok, die Räume sehr ruhig und sauber, Lage nah am Flughafen sehr praktisch, wenn man direkt weiter möchte. Ich würde auf jeden Fall wieder kommen!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
Proche de l'aéroport 
Personnels attentifs et courtois 
Bon rapport qualité prix 
Super vue sur les pistes 
Chambre spacieuse

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Gute Anbindung an den Flughafen, guter Ausgangspunkt für eine Stadterkundung mit dem Mietwagen, große saubere und moderne Zimmer, nette und hilfsbereite Mitarbeiter!
bad_review: Das Frühstück entspricht dem amerikanischen Standard und war nicht besonders hochwertig. Wir haben dahingehend aber auch nichs anderes erwartet. Im Frühstückraum war es zu den Stoßzeiten extrem voll und laut. Wir haben das Frühstück zum Schluss ausgelassen.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
good_review: Top zum übernachten am Airport… schöne ruhige Zimmer…. Gutes Frühstück mit aussenbereich, der Pool ist in Ordnung und ausreichend. Gym ist Top
bad_review: gerade so am ertragbarere Preislimit

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Siiti ja toimiva, hyvä hintalaatusuhde lähellä lentokenttää
good_review: Todella siisti hotelli, hyvä palvelu, ilmainen ja helppo shuttle-bussi lentokentälle alle 10 minuuttia.
bad_review: Äänieristys ei kovin hyvä, kuuli keskustelun / television äänet naapurihuoneista.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: LA最後の日快適な睡眠を得られました！
good_review: とても清潔でオシャレなホテルでした。スタッフもとても親切でした。
bad_review: コーヒーメーカーや冷蔵庫のある所に照明があれば良かったと思いました。

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
review_title: Für die erste oder letzte Nacht perfekt
good_review: Wir wollten nach einem langen Flug erstmal ankommen, dafür war das Hotel perfekt! Mit den Shuttle waren wir in kurzer Zeit da und das Zimmer war riesig. Kaffeetrinken im Zimmer, wenn mann sehr früh wach wird👍Frühstück war sehr lecker
bad_review: Der Pool auf dem Dach war schön, allerdings könnte dieser Bereich mehr gepflegt sein. Leider gibt es direkt vor dem Hotel kein kurze Haltemöglichkeit um das Gepäck zum Beispiel im Mietwagen zu verstauen🤷🏻‍♀️

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: shuttle bus标识不够显著容易错过

bad_review: heikko aamiainen

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
good_review:
קרבה לשדה תעופה, חדר גדול, מודרני, נעים, 
די שקט, קרוב להחזרת הרכב, 
שאטלים חינם לשדה התעופה.
נקי מאוד. 
בריכה וג׳קוזי חםםםם על הגג.
ארוחת ערב טובה מאוד ומומלצת!
bad_review:
חנייה מאוד יקרה!
חדר יקר!
ארוחת בוקר😞🤦🏻‍♀️😞

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio con cama extragrande, cocina y sofá cama
good_review: In wenigen Minuten mit dem Shuttle vom Flughafen aus zu erreichen. Mehrere Restaurants in der unmittelbaren Umgebung. Sehr große Suite mit kompletter Ausstattung.

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio con cama extragrande, cocina y sofá cama
good_review: gutes feinschmeckendes Frühstück, grosse Ausfall//Zimmergrösse sehr gut/ speditives Checkin
bad_review: Es war alles bestens

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Le meilleur hôtel à côté de l’aéroport. Propre, moderne et confortable. Le petit-déjeuner est correct.
bad_review: Rien

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: 作为机场酒店来说还可以吧，比较安静，也算干净。倒得早，提前安排了入住，前台态度挺好。
bad_review:
房间在一楼，感觉很幽闭，房间采光不好，灯也不亮，整晚都是厨房的油烟味儿。
早餐管饱，质量一般。

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
bad_review: parking poc indicat

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Für eine Nacht am Flughafen okay
good_review: Schön renoviertes Zimmer. In Flughafennähe und nicht zu laut. Kostenloser Shuttle.
bad_review: Frühstück eine Katastrophe in absolut ungemütlichem Raum. Pool eher unattraktiv.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Höhen und Tiefen, aber insgesamt ok.
good_review: Das Hotel liegt sehr günstig zum Flughafen und den Mietwagen Firmen. Wir hatten unser Auto dort abgegeben und waren in 5 Minuten per Fuß im Hotel. Am nächsten Tag sind wir entspannt mit dem Shuttle Bus zum Terminal gefahren. Internet ist gut. Liftsteuerung meiner Meinung nach vorbildlich. Die Zimmer sind sehr geräumig und schön eingerichtet. Gut war auch der Blick auf die Start- und Landebahn. (12ter Stock)
bad_review:
Es gab keine Stellmöglichkeit um ein Fahrzeug entspannt zu entladen. Es gab zwar Kofferwagen, die man sich holen konnte, aber die mußte man weit schieben um irgendwo auf der Straße im Verkehr die Koffer auszuladen.
Im Restaurant im Penthouse habe ich zu meinem Gericht kalten Reis erhalten. Auch nach Reklamation war dieser nicht warm zu bekommen.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: rapport qualité prix super ! personnel au top, les chambre sont super spacieuse, bon voila pas de fenêtre mais comme dan
bad_review: petit déjeuner pas de fenêtre qui s’ouvre (mais c’est comme ça en Amérique le plus souvent)

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: De gym, het uitzicht, de netheid.
bad_review: Het ontbijt was zeer basic.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: מיקום טוב להעברת לילה בטיסת המשך , חדרים נוחים וגדולים, ארוחת בוקר טובה.
bad_review: החדר חשוך מידי ,התאורה הקיימת אינה מספיקה

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
la struttura si trova molto vicino all'aeroporto ma, se si ha la macchina, è molto comodo anche per visitare Los Angeles.
Le camere sono ampie ed accoglienti.
bad_review: La colazione purtroppo lascia molto a desiderare.

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio con cama extragrande, cocina y sofá cama
good_review:
Perfektes Hotel für jeden Planespotter. Schöne saubere und geräumige Zimmer. 
Super Pool auf dem Dach des Hotels und eben noch alles neu.
Für die Plastiknörgler. Es gab Frühstück auf wiederverwendbaren Plastikteller mit richtigem Besteck.
bad_review:
Wenn man spät Nachts ankommt und am Ende seiner Reise ist, weswegen man einige Koffer, Kühlbox etc bei sich hat und es gibt nur einen oder zwei Gepäckwägen, die natürlich im Dauereinsatz bei diesem großen Hotel sind, sorry, aber dann ist das ein Zustand. Hier sollte man sich verbessern!
Parkgebühren im mit vom Hotel genutzen Parkhaus sind viel zu hoch. Wenn man das Auto nicht mehr benötigt, sollte man direkt beim Parkhausanbieter ein Ticket ziehen. (Bitte klären ob man jederzeit rein- und rausfahren kann?)

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
review_title: für einen Kurzaufenthalt ok. Der Flughafen liegt direkt vor der Tür.

acommodation: Studio with Two Queen Beds and Accessible Tub
good_review:
Ideal für kurze Aufenthalte! Gute Lage, ein 
schöner kleiner Pool auf dem Dach und Whirlpool
beides mit herzlichen leicht salzigem Wasser.
Gute Anbindung an Flughafen und an ÖPNV.
ABER, Ohne vorheriger Hinweis landeten wir in einem fensterlosen 
Zimmer. Gut ausgestattet und sauber, aber ohne 
Tageslicht? Und das ohne einen Hinweis? 
ABER nach der sofortigen Vorsprache an der
Rezeption haben wir einen noch größeren 
Raum bekommen mit ganz viel Tageslicht und
das ohne den Aufpreis:-)
bad_review:
Aufpassen, dass man nicht in einem fensterlosen
Raum landet, es sei den es ist einem das
Tageslicht egal.
Das Frühstück ist relativ bescheiden.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Perfect voor een nacht tussen twee vluchten.
bad_review: Prijs eten / drinken

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: nous avons passé un très bon séjour au sein de cet hôtel
bad_review: rien

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Emplacement près de l aéroport bien situé piscine sympa chambre confortable petit déjeuner correct
bad_review:
Le petit-déjeuner pourrait être plus copieux pour 1 hôtel hyatt
Le restant tout est bien

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: באזור שדה התעופה עם שאטל לטיסה
bad_review: לא מאורגנים. המון זמן המתנה לכל שאלה. אובדי עצות.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: excelente cafe da manha. cama ótima.
bad_review: na lanchonete do hotel, poderia ter algo melhor pra comer a noite.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: La camera ampia e letto comodo
bad_review: Colazione , camerieri del ristorante della cena

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
good_review: L'accueil le sourire et la compréhension
bad_review: Le PDJ et le dîner sont trop fades. Le parking est un peu compliqué à comprendre.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con 2 camas grandes y cocina
good_review: Direkte Nähe zum Flughafen ermöglicht kurze Wege, kostenloser Shuttlebus zum/vom Hotel macht die An-/Abreise angenehm. Zimmer und Bad waren sehr sauber.
bad_review: Uns wurde ungefragt ein FENSTERLOSES Zimmer zugeteilt, das so nicht gebucht war. Umzug in ein anderes Zimmer war nicht möglich, offensichtlich war das Hotel überbucht, was sich auch beim gnadenlos vollen Frühstücksraum zeigte! Das Frühstücksangebot war dürftig, der Kaffee schlicht ungenießbar! Für den stolzen Gesamtpreis eine Frechheit!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Очень понравился сотрудник стойки регистрации Алекс. Он был невероятно вежлив и действительно помог. Мы получили великолепный номер. В номере очень чисто, есть все необходимое, очень удобная кровать. Удобный трансфер в аэропорт. Еще раз спасибо Алекс за вашу отзывчивость.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y bañera adaptada - Adaptada para personas de movilidad reducida
good_review: Die Ausstattung, es ist alles modern, zimmergröße,die Decken sind hoch
bad_review:
Da gibt es leider viel zu berichten, Frühstück war katastrophal, sehr wenig Auswahl (Eier, Kartoffeln und Philadelphia, Waffeln, Müsli), das ist aber nicht alles, ich meine uns war eh klar das wir in Amerika sind und die Amerikaner essen beim Frühstück pancakes mit Speck, das schlimmste..es ist ein großes Hotel und d Frühstückraum war so klein, und sie hatten meistens Pappbecher Gabel usw.
Echt peinlich..ich meine es ist doch Hyatt es hat einen Namen..leider zu viel ausgegeben für so wenig Service.
Was ich noch hinzufügen muss, wir haben Wasserkocher verlangt hatten sie nicht, was ich auch verstehen kann, weil manche Hotels haben es manche nicht, dann habe ich halt höflich gebeten, dass sie uns heißes Wasser bringen sollen.
Sie waren so unfreundlich, wir mussten dann wieder runter und alles selber besorgen.
..bleibt weg von hier

acommodation: One-Bedroom Queen Suite with Kitchen and Accessible Tub - Disability Access
review_title: Parfait pour un court séjour à proximité immédiate de l'aéroport LAX
good_review:
Emplacement idéal par rapport à l'aéroport et pour rendre la voiture de location. 
Petit déjeuner inclus en self service tout à fait correct mais avec parfois des difficultés à trouver une table libre ... 
Parking couvert disponible pour environ 30 $ par jour
bad_review:
Rien. Eviter les heures d'affluence au petit-déjeuner
Pas de restaurant dans l'hôtel pour diner mais très bon restaurant dans l'hôtel voisin.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
good_review:
Die moderne und sehr stimmige Einrichtung, die Größe des Studios und die perfekte Sauberkeit.
Frühstück war auch super.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
Buchung wurde abgelehnt ohne Info
wir hatten plötzlich bei Anreise keine Unterkunft mehr sehr sehr negativ 
Grund unbefriedigend
bad_review:
siehe vor
kein Aufenthalt trotz Buchungsbestätigung möglich

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio con cama extragrande, cocina y sofá cama
good_review: Prijs kwaliteit van de kamer (suite) was goed. Parkeren was ook makkelijk naast de deur. Dicht bij de vluchthaven wat voor ons belangrijk was.
bad_review: Locatie ligt buiten de Sightseeing locaties. Ontbijt was in een woord, slecht.

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
bad_review: Om 15.00 was het inchecken, wij moesten met meerderen mensen bijna 2 uur wachten. Maar je moet er wel om 11.00 uitzien. Goede kamer maar druk met kinderen. Ontbijtbuffet is om 9.30 al zogoed als leeg. Waar betaal je voor? Voor ons dus nooit meer.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
Habitación con cama extragrande y bañera adaptada - Adaptada para personas de movilidad reducida
good_review:
Locatie dichtbij de luchthaven en autoverhuur. Minder geschikt om als uitvalsbasis te gebruiken om LA te bezoeken. Voor Amerikaanse begrippen uitgebreid, gratis, ontbijt. Goed restaurant erbij.
Prima kamer, super schoon
bad_review: Niets

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Wunderschönes Hotel mit Pool und Bar auf der Dachterrasse
good_review: Das neue moderne Hotel, liegt direkt am Flughafen Los Angeles. Die Zimmer sind perfekt ausgestattet. An der Hotelbar kann man den Tag gemütlich zu Ende bringen. Der Pool auf der Dachterrasse ist wunderschön und man kann sich dazu noch an der geossen Bar einen Trink gönnen.Das angebotene Frühstück war sehr gut. Rundum ein „Super Hotel“!

acommodation: Suite Estudio con cocina y sofá cama - Cama extragrande
good_review:
O único quarto disponível tinha um barulho alto de máquina que incomodava bastante.
Quando reclamei disseram que a outra alternativa seria um outro quarto de qualidade inferior.
Aceitei porque precisava dormir, mas não me ofereceram nenhum desconto por ter ficado no quarto que dormi.

Habitación adaptada para personas con discapacidad con bañera accesible - Cama grande
good_review: El personal es muy amable y el hotel es precioso. La decoración de la habitación es muy bonita y es espaciosa y muy cómoda.
bad_review: Para poder cenar en el restaurante del hotel hay que realizar reserva con antelación porque está muy lleno. Pero la comida y bebida de muy buena calidad.

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
review_title: Un lugar acogedor y perfecto para un fin de semana.
good_review: Me gusto mucho que tenga alberca y los restaurantes son excelentes !
bad_review: Me dieron la habitación más pequeña al lado del aire acondicionado del edificio, toda la noche un ruido insoportable tuve que bajar 3 am para pedir que me cambiaran por qué la habitación vibraba del ruido, al final si me cambiaron de habitación y quede complacida.

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio - 1 cama extragrande
bad_review: Uno de los días no hicieron la limpieza de la habitación

acommodation: Habitación adaptada para personas con discapacidad con bañera accesible - Cama grande
bad_review: Baño pequeño

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: muy buen hotel para estancias en la
good_review: la ubicación, en un buen barrio, seguro, y al lado krypto arena. preciosas instalaciones, en especial, la zona de piscina, aunque no nos dio tiempo a disfrutarla más.
bad_review: quizá la habitación podría ser un pelín más grande.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review: La habitación en general es agradable, digamos que todo funciona. Colocan toallas suficentes, y algunas amenidades son buenas. El cafe es bueno. El restaurante también sirven muy buena comida y los precios me paracen justos.
bad_review: Se terminó el gel de ducha en el baño y no lo rellenaron por dos días. Incluyeron en el precio de la habitación una tarifa extra de 65 dolares por noche por temas de seguridad

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: La ubicación del hotel es perfecta, puedes ir caminando a muchos lugares de interés, es muy cálido y lleno de detalles
bad_review: El sistema de calefacción tiene un ruido constante

acommodation: Suite Junior con cama extragrande
good_review: Amabilidad del Personal, Habitaciones muy cómodas

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
review_title: cómodo, súper buena atención, moderno y céntrico
bad_review: los pasillos algo oscuros y gimnasio pequeñito pero lo demás era tan bueno que lo compensaba

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
good_review: La ubicación fue perfecta para ir dos noches al crypto.com arena, el estacionamiento y valet muy conveniente aunque caro, personal muy amable al check in
bad_review: El lavabo generaba un olor horrible! Venía de las tuberías o del agua, pero solo olía al abrir el agua del lavabo, no lo reporté a recepción.

acommodation: Habitación adaptada para personas con discapacidad con bañera accesible - Cama grande
good_review: El hotel en general es una pasada las habitaciones muy bien, el estilo impecable. Todo genial
bad_review: La ubicación en downtown, los ángeles tiene un ambiente difícil por la noche en ese barrio, si vas acompañado no hay problema pero choca

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Hotel confortable y personal muy agradable
good_review: Tener café expreso en la habitación y la invitación cada día en el bar a café expreso
bad_review: Nada

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
bad_review: que no incluya un desayuno

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review: La ubicación muy buena y el personal muy agradable

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
bad_review: No nos atendieron bien en el restaurant no nos dieron una mesa para comer, nos pusieron en un lugar incomodo

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review: El hotel es espectacular, todas sus áreas y el diseño excepcional. Los restaurante y área de piscina es fuera de serie.
bad_review: La pieza es muy pequeña, la puerta del baño no es funcional. No debería ofrecerse para 4 personas.

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio - 1 cama extragrande
review_title: Deliciosa estancia en un hotel que es una joya
good_review:
El equipo/personal es excelente, son muy amables dan muchas facilidades con todo (información, soporte, check in-out), idiomas (español si lo necesitas). Ubicación muy especial y céntrica, sencillamente es un lujo/sorpresa encontrar este hotel.
Los espacios interiores son muy 'chic', todo un acierto!
bad_review:
NO es que no nos gustara, pero en nuestro caso, somos una familia de 4, niños todavía pequeños y necesitamos estar en 1 habitación. Pese a que el hotel se muestra amable y adaptable, te pueden poner una cama supletoria, eso reduce el espacio. No es grave, pero en estos casos, claro 2 habitaciones que sería la solución lo complica y encarece. Nuestra solución fue apretarnos un poco y felices. Como digo el personal del hotel se presta a solucionarlo.
El parqueo por día no está incluido y no es barato

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review: Su ubicación es excelente, el personal es agradable y varios hablan español. Me preguntaron si tenía planes, yo no sabía que jugarían los lakers ese día y me guiaron como hacerlo más rápido. Todo muy limpio.
bad_review: Creo que podría haber más variedad en los platos del restaurante. Pero la ensalada Cobb estuvo muy bien!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: buena opcion cerca del staples center
good_review: hotel bonito, con buena decoracion y bien ubicado cerca al staples center
bad_review:
el desayuno no esta incluido y es caro
la cama es muy vieja y el colchon estaba muy hundido, no era una cama comoda

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review: el estilo del hotel es bonito
bad_review: no servían los black out de las ventanas automáticos y llos colchones de la habitacion muy suaves

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
bad_review: La pieza era muy pequeña

acommodation: Habitación adaptada para personas con discapacidad con bañera accesible - Cama grande
good_review: El edifico está muy bonito y está en ubicación céntrica. Todo el personal es súper amable. Las instalaciones están bien pero uno de sus elevadores se descompuso y se juntaba mucha gente esperando pacientemente hasta su turno y si se juntaba con la gente con maleta era enojo por parte de ellos alegando que usáramos las escaleras y mi esposo le contesto que sufría artritis. Eso sí me disgustó mucho y se tardo en que arreglaran ese elevador (quien sabe cuando). Tome en cuenta que si usted hace su reservación vía booking, puede tener sorpresas al llegar al mostrador, por qué no es tan solo los impuestos que te muestran en booking lo que va a pagar sino que son impuestos sobre impuestos además de 150dlls de depósito ( ese dinero se lo van a regresar, pero mientras tanto no los tendrá hasta después de días) Busque en su web site si lo decían pero no dice. Así que considere que le van a cobrar mucho más. La comida es muy buena en sus restaurantes. Otra cosa, en el cuarto que nos tocó la cama tiene un marco de madera y ese marco es muy molesto (el de la cama que nos toco estaba alto) al subirte o bajar de la cama así que si usted o la persona que viaje con usted tiene movilidad reducida o es una persona mayor, téngalo en cuenta.

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
good_review: todo muy confortable, variedad en los alimentos y personal bastante amable. la ubicación un poco retirado de las atracciones pero el lugar es hermoso con mucha historia

acommodation: Habitación adaptada para personas con discapacidad con bañera accesible - Cama grande
review_title: Una mala experiencia puede pasar pero no te lo esperas!
bad_review: Que explotara el baño y dejara todo sucio, con mal olor y antihigiénico

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
bad_review: Que no tengan café en la habitacion

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
el Hotels es una preciosidad , la habitación es muy cómoda , me hicieron un upgrade xq necesitaba frigorífico en la habitación para la insulina y nos dieron un junior suite sin Car do rio
los productos del baño muy buena calidad y huelen muy bien 
los desayunos impresionantes .
el personal muy atento , sobre todo Mani .
hacen pool party varios días a la semana .
la ubicaron excelente con muchos sitios de interés cerca .
bad_review: nada

acommodation: Suite de 1 dormitorio - 1 cama extragrande
review_title: El hotel del terror … por un momento pensé que está en American Horror Story
good_review: No es un buen lugar. El restaurante está bien para la zona.
bad_review: Muy mala ubicación. Muy rústico. Las fotos engañan. Muy caro para lo que brindan.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
good_review: La atención del personal, la ubicación e instalaciones limpias
bad_review: Existió un problema con el agua , sin embargo, dieron solución inmediata y otorgaron algunas amenidades a los huéspedes para compensar.

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
review_title: Vuelvo a LA para quedarme en el Figueroa
good_review: Decoración, Bar, Restaurantes, Servicio, ambiente muy grato.
bad_review: Parking muy caro, debe incluirse en costo de habitación

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
good_review: es linda mucho movimiento bien ubicada
bad_review: la primer noche no puedimos dormir del olor a cloaca en la habitación era el último piso … la verdad que muy feo al día siguiente nos pasaron a otro cuarto más abajo ( ellos no puedo creer que no sepan que tiene olor a cloaca ahí !!!) lamentablemente tuvimos que dormir así toda la noche !!! la segunda habitación Perfecto

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
bad_review: cobros y garantías no claros distintos a los indicados

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
bad_review:
Muy mal ubicado. Lejos de todos los atractivos turísticos de Los Angeles. 
La habitación es muy antigua aunque remodelada y muy pequeña. 
El gimnasio siempre estaba lleno de gente y es muy pequeño.

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
good_review: I had booked through booking.com for my daughter. I had no clue that my card hadn’t been charged and that my daughter would have to pay while checking in. This cause many inconveniences as I was confused and thinking that I was being double charged. This annoyed the staff, I could tell in their tone. Nonetheless, I told them they were correct in that I was never charged after looking at my statement. My daughter ended up getting a room with a view to a wall. This is unfortunate since it was our first time booking a room at Figueroa. The check-in was not smooth, got a bit of attitude from the staff, and received a room facing a wall. Our experience could have been better. Nonetheless, thank you.

I won’t stay there again. since we could not get early check-in, even though I asked six months ago when I reserved a room. I don’t like that. The bathrooms has a gap so if you cannot use the toilet comfortably.￼

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: A practical option if you want to stay downtown but overrated
good_review: Rooms are spacious and mostly renovated. Staff is polite.
bad_review: However important things are missing to compensate for the 5 star rating on booking and the price. The rooms are not soundproof at all (could hear both conversations from the room next door and the music from the pool of the restaurant-I was on the 10th floor), they have no fridge, no bathrobe or slippers, space in the breakfast area is not guaranteed for guests as it's small, gym is very small and underequiped, and the reception services are limited (for example no phone chargers, no plug adapters, wouldn't help with a courier request, made several invoicing mistakes and communication was very long by email prior to arrival). The restaurant is clearly understaffed as the wait to be served can be up to 40 minutes, and their behavior reflects that as well, asking guests to wait because "honey, they have too much work".

The hotel vibe is cool, chill, but the restaurant staff is not getting that memo.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: the prices were high. I ordered a pasta from the restaurant and honestly when I got it, I thought it was a sample, until I realized that it was my meal. Even the couple seated next to me commented on how small it was. The bowls are deceiving as they are more like a soup bowl with a rim, so it looked like a smaller portion than what it was. It wasn’t even filled to the top of the soup bowl. it was along the bottom, but it costed over $20 for it. It didn’t ruin my trip, but it was kind of annoying. Also the front desk is so small and there were two people helping one man while everyone stood there waiting. I stood in the “line” that was forming behind the first person and had my luggage and they finally grabbed the next person in line. I waited and when it was my turn, a man walked up from the restaurant and just kind of stood on the side and the gal that was at the front desk, looked up to him and asked if she could help. She totally didn’t acknowledge the line that was there, or me with my luggage. They need to have some sort of system so that guests aren’t ignored. She didn’t even look up from helping the first guy, to see who was standing there, while her and the other guy were assisting the first guy. its like when you stand in a grocery line and then the cashier goes to open up a new line and takes the last person in the row who just got there. How about take the first person who is waiting?

Excellent facilities! The hotel has a rich history and the hotel has been updated with modern finishes for a comfortable stay. There are restaurants onsite and tourist sites such as the Grammy museum, Crypto arena and Grand Central Market are all close by within a 5-20 minute walk. There are some malls nearby and access to the Metro if you prefer to take public transport around. 
The hotel also provides complimentary coffee for stays - guests can redeem for a basic black coffee or milk based coffee (latte, cappuccino), greatly appreciated!

I don’t understand why the fact that it cost money would prevent someone from letting me know there was actually a place to eat breakfast, so I was only able to eat breakfast at the hotel two times. 
I want to say that the maid service was exceptional. My room was cleaned perfectly every night of my stay, and the maid did such an exceptional job. I cannot express my gratitude enough. She obviously takes great pride in her work.

review_title: Amazing hotel, especially for an airport hotel, highly recommended for short layovers
good_review: Location is amazing for international and internal flights - walkable to all terminals - the brekasfast is lovely, lots of variety and very up market brekfast area with waiters - lobby and ground floor of hotel is lovely, really high class for an airport hotel - top floor gym, very well equipped with amazing views, fridges full of water and towels - superb hotel!

good_review:
This was my second stay at Hyatt Regency LAX. I really like that it is in walking distance from the terminals. But there is also a shuttle to reach the hotel. The check in was easy (important after a 12 and a half hour flight). I received again my requested upper floor room. There is a bar and a small market. There is also the possibility for a breakfast buffet in the morning. A Subway and coffee shop are in walking distance.
The room was fine, you can choose your temperature with the AC and it was quiet. It is a great place to stay for a flight the next day. There is also an outdoor swimming pool.

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande y vistas a la ciudad - Planta superior
review_title: Stay was great but left a sour taste due to the behaviour of the driver as described above
good_review: The location to the airport was excellent. Room was very large in comparison to everything else we had stayed in while holidaying for a month in the States. Small bar area where we ate was great and the staff wonderful and accommodating. We did not eat breakfast there. Cleanliness of hotel was wonderful
bad_review: I would like this passed on to the Hyatt Regency Management as I was disgusted with the erratic behaviour of the courtesy coach driver from the hotel to the airport on Friday 16/6/23 at approximately 4.05pm. He had grey curly unruly shoulder length hair. His driving was scary - the young woman seated opposite me mouthed "holy crap", he suffered road rage where he was continually honking the horn and waving his arms in the air. Erratic driving. What really offended me was he got out at our stop at Terminal B at the airport with his hand held out for a tip. He had a wad of money in his hand as if indicating what he expected. My partner handed over a $100 bill (not realising it was a $100 bill) to which I snatched it out of his hand and said "there is no way you will be tipping him that for god sake". The driver's response was "I have change" to which I said I wanted $95.00 change. I then realised I had $5 in my wallet and kept telling him (while his back was turned as he was still trying to find change for the $100 bill) that I had $5 and I felt there was no way he deserved that. I had no intention of giving him a tip as for me a tip is recognising great service. He was appalling and should be sacked. Absolutely disgusting behaviour and Management need to be aware of this

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y bañera adaptada - Adaptada para personas de movilidad reducida
good_review: The hotel is very close to the airport and, since I had a 6am flight, it made a lot of sense to stay there for my very short stay. The room was spacious and clean. The staff was extremely nice and professional. All in all, this property has a relaxing and airy vibe that will suit anxious travelers. I am not one of them, but I almost felt on vacation, even though I was on a business trip! Also, the airport shuttle runs every 10-15 minutes, which is extremely convenient.
bad_review: The free wifi was spotty at best, which was surprising for such a modern hotel. And this hotel also has a policy of charging $100 for early check-in, like more and more properties. I think this is not right and if a room is ready for a guest to check in, then they should be allowed to have it when they arrive. As a very frequent business traveler, I have sometimes had to wait in the lobby for a room to become available, and I completely understand that. But to charge someone extra, just because their flight arrives at a certain time is simply not right…. (And I worked for 5 years in a hotel as a receptionist, so I have LOTS of opinions about how a hotel should be run! LOL)

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
Initial problems at check in as the hotel had cancelled our booking! However, our room was still available and we were checked in quickly.
The room was excellent - we were overlooking a busy road junction and, just beyond, the airport, but there was no external noise noticeable in the room at all!
Facilities were very good.
We ate in the bar area on the evening we arrived, and had breakfast the next morning - both meals were very good.
But the highest of our praises go to the staff. Every single one of them that we met were a credit to the hotel - from the guy on reception sorting out our cancelled booking, to the restaurant staff, houseeepers, check out staff and valet parking crew...a fantastic team of people providing great service. We won't hesitate to book this hotel again next time we need to stay near LAX!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y sofá cama
review_title: Good hotel, good breakfast, would stay again!
good_review:
We’re over 65 and wanted to break the long flight home from London to Brisbane, Australia. We spent 2 nights here. The room was a great size with King bed (comfortable)and also a sofa. We enjoyed the view of the runway. There are was a little noise from planes but didn’t stop us from sleeping. 
Breakfast was ok, a few hot dishes including scrambled egg, cereal, fruit etc. 
the staff were great, always friendly and willing to help. We had a few drinks at the bar and ate there both nights. Food was good but expensive. 
There was a Starbucks next door which was good for a morning latte!
We had a late flight home and there was no problem leaving our bags when we went out for the day!
bad_review:
The automated message from Booking.com gave us the wrong phone number to call for airport shuttle and said you had to call for shuttle to pick up at airport. (This was very confusing)The hotel message said which shuttle to get on and didn’t say you had to call shuttle. The airport message was correct. When we arrived by airport the shuttle dropped us at back of hotel (which hotel message said would happen) Better signage to show way to back entrance would have been helpful and easy to do!
Lower prices for meals would be great!

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
good_review:
While showering the hand bar, which was not properly secured, came out of the wall, causing me to fall and hurt my knee, which ended up bruising and painful for about 1 week. The incident was reported immediately to staff on duty at the front desk (Diego Andrada), at which point he sent "engineers" to verify the problem, which they did.
Diego asked if I could wait a few minutes to contact management to deal with me for compensation.
After waiting a bit longer, Diego suggested that I not wait any longer as management was not available, but to email to him my concerns, which I did on August 10 along with a photo of the disattached bar.
After receiving no reply I sent an email once agian with still no reply.
This is obviously not acceptable and certainly expect to receive compensation for this issue.
I thank you for your help and ask for a reply to this message.
Peter Schwarz

Also, when I travel, I don’t usually need room service; I ask for clean towels. At Hyatt, it was like asking the housekeepers for dining delivery when asking for fresh bath linen.

Habitación con cama extragrande y bañera adaptada - Adaptada para personas de movilidad reducida
review_title: Had a great time nice comfortable room.
good_review: The location worked out well close to airport and Sofi Stadium. Also close to rental car location.
bad_review: I was not sure where to enter Hotel at first. Definitely need a larger sign and better entrance from Century Blvd. They didn't come clean my room or empty garbage. Room stayed clean but would have liked garbage emptied since can was so small.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
good_review: Easy to find the hotel. There was a Starbucks and Coffee shop with Pastries next door within walking distance. Nice size rooms, bed was very comfortable, slept like a baby or maybe jetlag from flying in from Singapore. Charging phone facilities was spot on. Reception staff Brandon was nice. He checked us in. Check out was easy and fast too. Breakfast was excellent.
bad_review:
Rooms - Bad Lighting, the room was pretty dark even with all the lights on. Our room faced the car park wall so no natural light could come thru. With the dark interior room look pretty dark.
Bathroom - no fan ventilation, bathroom door could not close smoothly all the way unless you force it a bit. Look like flooring was uneven. Wish there was another handle on the other side of door.
Bathroom sink area was small could not place night ameneties, wish it was bigger Alot of wasted space. More towel hooks or towel bars would be nice.
Housekeeping - overall the room was clean. However, we checked in at night around 9.30pm, one of the double bed sheets had red ants. About a dozen red ants. We killed it ourselves. Not sure where it came from. It just shows up like magic.
Secondly, the next morning Housekeeping staff did not knock and introduce themselves before coming in. I was in the bathroom, my girlfriend went down to the car so it wasn't double lock. I was washing up and I hear the door open and a man's voice, hello! I shouted that I was in the bathroom and he left. I quickly wiped my face and opened the room door and he was outside. I told him I did not want any housekeeping facilities. He did not quite understand and had to repeat "No need thank you" maybe more training on the staff part and a "Do Not Disturb" sign on the door handles or red light for no entry or something would be appropriate....
Car park entry - Confusing on the first entry. We had a reservation and we put in our tel number a few times and finally the banner went up. A few times we had to reverse our car as some other guest could not figure out how to get in.

good_review:
L emplacement proche de l aéroport,
 la qualité des chambres.
bad_review:
Le petit déjeuner, une honte pas au niveau d un tel établissement.
Le fait de ne pas faire la chambre pendant 4 jours.
L accueil du 1er jour.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y sofá cama
review_title: Neues Hotel, Super Restaurant im Haus, aber katastrophales Housekeeping
good_review:
Frühstück war für amerikanische Verhältnisse wirklich gut
-Rührei
-Obst
-French Toast
-Vernünftiger Orangensaft
-Guter Tee
-Cappuccino aus einem Vollautomaten nur gegen Gebühr, Filterkaffee gratis
Auf dem Dach gibt es ein Restaurant was überraschenderweise wirklich Top ist. Es gibt neben einer recht modernen Einrichtjng eine vielfältige Karte die auch für Vegetarier sehr gut ist. Super Veggie Tacos und viele gesunde Gerichte. restaurant schließt leider um 10pm
bad_review: Die Zimmerreinigung war einfach nur katastrophal schlecht. Wir haben zwei Nächte dort verbracht, einmal zu Beginn des Urlaubs, einmal auf dem Rückflug. Wir mussten bei beiden Aufenthalten das Zimmer wechseln, weil die Zimmerreinigung nicht gegeben war. Bett dreckig, Badezimmer gar nicht nicht gereinigt, im nächsten Zimmer wieder eine nicht gereinigte Toilette, Tisch dreckig, ich könnte noch weiter machen... Geht einfach gar nicht. Front Desk hat 20$ Rabatt angeboten...

Personal

acommodation: Habitación Doble Silver
review_title: Hotel bonito pero con algunas carencias de diseño.
good_review:
La decoración, la cama muy cómoda, el lobby.
Casi todo el personal muy amable. Agradable que hay café en el lobby en las mañanas. Bonito el rooftop con la piscina.
bad_review: No tiene una cafetera en el cuarto,un bar muy surtido si, poco sitio para colocar la maleta y todo es a través de una App. O código QR que nunca me funcionó...poco amable en recepción cuando solicité ayuda para comprar una medicina porque me sentía mal...me dijeron que lo pidiera en la app (que como turista no tengo) o que fuera caminando...

bad_review: La limpieza de la alfombra no es la mejor, pero en general bien.

acommodation: Deluxe Platinum con cama extragrande

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
good_review: La habitación e instalaciones fue los que mas nos gustó.
bad_review: la ubicación fue lo que menos me gustó.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
good_review: La decoracion del hotel es muy buena, el perosnal de recipcion muy amable y el ambiente los fines de semana esta espectacular, la habitacion es muy comda y la ubicacion esta bien.
bad_review: la habitacion que me dieron tenia una vista al estacionameinto de la cuadra de espaldas, que no tenga estacionamineto propoio no me gusto en lo absoluto ya que te cobran el valet en 60 dolares la noche lo que se me hizo exageradamente elevado el coso y en la pagina dice que es de 45 dolares y la ahabitacion es un poco obscura

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
bad_review:
la falta de un buen espacio para desayunar 
para acceder a la piscina hay q solicitarlo en front desk

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
good_review: lindo lugar, relativamente cerca de todo
bad_review: precio alto, limpieza promedio

acommodation: Alojamiento Bronze con balcón y cama extragrande
good_review: El roof. La habitación es amplia.
bad_review: La habitación con vista obstruida. El costo elevado. Que no había desayunos y tuve que salir a buscar. Cobro en el estacionamiento y caro.

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
good_review: El diseño del hotel y las exhibiciones de arte en el lobby.

acommodation: Alojamiento Bronze con balcón y cama extragrande
bad_review: HUBIESE SIDO INTERESANTE VISITAR SU RESTAURANTE TAO, PERO REQUERIA RESERVA PREVIA.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
review_title: Bueno para los que les gusta salir de noche.
good_review: me gusto mucho la terraza y la decoracion del hotel en general. La ubicacion a mi personalmente no me favorecio.

acommodation: Habitación Doble Silver
good_review: Limpio, cómodo, personal amable y un robot muy divertido

acommodation: Habitación Doble Silver
good_review:
El personal muy amable y eficiente 
Muy bien ubicado y alojarnos aquí tuvo algunos “plus” no esperados como taxis de cortesía y la hora de los quesos y vinos

acommodation: Habitación Silver - 1 cama extragrande
bad_review: De 4 piezas a una nunca le hicieron limpieza a la habitavión y no tenían excusa. Debido al rooftop y restaurante del 2do piso en las noches se hace imposible ocupar el ascendor y te encuentras con borrachos dentro y fuera del hotel. el entorno es horrible ya que está rodeado de bares y por las mañanas salir del hotel era un asco al encontrarte con la vereda orinada, con vasos y botellas.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze - 1 cama extragrande
good_review: Ubicación perfecta y hotel nuevo con instalaciones modernas
bad_review: La piscina estaba mala y las habitaciones son pequeñas

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
bad_review: No habían muchos lugares cercanos abiertos para comer en la noche

acommodation: Habitación Silver - 1 cama extragrande
good_review: El café de la mañana y las vistas del ático.
bad_review: El colchón de la cama de la habitacion era demasiado blando, te hundías y hemos acabado con bastante dolor de espalda.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
good_review: El hotel era bonito y todo muy nuevo.
bad_review:
Tuvimos problemas con el vuelo y nos aseguraron que no nos iban a cobrar la primera noche ya que les avisamos que llegaríamos un día más tarde de lo previsto por un problema técnico en el avión. Era nuestro viaje de novios y la verdad que no nos pusieron ningún problema pero una vez hicimos el check out todo cambió y no hay manera de que contesten a booking para que me puedan reembolsar la primera noche. No contestan al teléfono ni a los correos que les mando.
Desde luego que no volveré a reservar nunca más en esta cadena de hoteles.

acommodation: Deluxe Platinum con cama extragrande
good_review:
Lo bueno fue que te daban cafe gratis y el baño.
La ubicación fue horrible, esta lleno de personas en situación de calle, drogados y con un olor en las calles espantoso todo sucio, fue muy decepcionante ya que fue mi cuarta vez en esta ciudad y esta zona de Hollywood no es bueno para hospedarse.
bad_review:
La habitación si bien era amplia cuando llegue, me dieron una en el piso 3 que la vista era una pared yo pague una con vistas a la ciudad, me queje y ahi me dieron una en el 6 piso que estaba mejor pero las 2 habitaciones tenían los muebles todos con manchas deteriorados y el colchón estaba vencido.
En la noche no se podía dormir hasta las 3 de la mañana por los ruidos de discotecas.
Cuando pedí quedarme el ultimo día mas tiempo porque mi avión salía tarde, me asignaron una habitación para discapacitados me salió 442 dólares por 6 horas.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
bad_review: Que me ha robado el hotel . Haciendo cargos en mi cuenta y no devolviéndome el importe retenido en la tarjeta

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
good_review: cerca de todo y bonito el hotel
bad_review: no limpia los cuarto. y el vale parkin fatal. me robaron mi parrilla del carro y nunca me mostraron la cámara de seguridad

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
good_review: La ubicación y el hotel es muy bonito
bad_review: Me realizaron dos cobros y aun no veo reflejado mis depósitos, uno fue de 150 dolares y al día siguiente sin mi autorización realizaron un cargo de 180 dólares, estoy muy molesto por esta situación

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
good_review: El hotel está limpio y es agradable su decoración . El personal es atento.
bad_review: El barrio está terriblemente venido a menos. El hotel tiene pocas opciones para desayuno y almuerzo.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
bad_review: estuvo todo bien

acommodation: Habitación Doble Silver
good_review:
El precio que me cobraron no fue el mismo consignado en la reserva. Agregaron gastos que no estaban incluidos y termine pagando lo
mismo que un hotel superior

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
good_review:
La ubicación es buenísima y las instalaciones también.
El checkin se hace online y cuando llegas lo tienen todo listo. Tardas dos segundos.
La terraza es muy chula también!

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
review_title: No tiene buena Relación calidad precio .
good_review: No me gusto mucho en realidad. El rooftop estaba cerrado para una fiesta privada cuando llegue. Tampoco pude ir a cenar a Tao porque siempre estaba ocupado con eventos privados que te dejaban ingresar si pagabas 100 dólares después de las 10 pm.
bad_review: La atención del personal. Por ser un lugar bastante turístico no se esforzaban demasiado en ayudarte y guiarte en tu estadía. El personal no es muy atento. No había café en la habitación, ni agua.

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
review_title: La relación Precio Calidad deja que desear.
good_review:
La ubicación y la piscina ambientada. 
Cuartos modernosos aunque uno tenia escritorio de trabajo minimo.
bad_review:
No tiene Escritorio para poder trabajar desde el cuarto.
La piscina cierra a las 17 , porque después se hace Restauirant. Adicional, como funciona unadisco a la noche, cuando uno va temprano a la piscina, esta todo sucio (los 3 dias fui paso igual) 
El restaurante cierra a las 22:30 porque luego se hace disco. Se limita todo.
El Parking 60USd, carísimo y se debe pedir con 30 minutos anticipación (para este precio es irracional la demora).

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
review_title: Muy mala experiencia, no lo recomiendo a nadie.
bad_review: El personal que atiende es pésimo y de muy mal carácter en general.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
good_review: ubicación , servicio , instalaciones . personal amable . excelente hotel .
bad_review: el colchón de la cama no tiene una base firme . esto no da la comodidad requerida para descansar .

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
Habitación Doble Silver
good_review:
El personal super amable y con ganas de ayudar en todo momento, Cesar de 10 y sus compañeros también.
La ubicación es muy buena si quieres estar en la zona de Hollywood.
La habitación muy cómoda y moderna.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
review_title: Aceptable pero no era lo que esperaba
good_review: Tienen instalaciones modernas y esta bien ubicado.
bad_review: Siento que el personal no fue tan amable (a excepción de una persona q no recuerdo su nombre), incluso, cuando dejamos el hotel, Justo había un desfile en calles aledañas y nuestro taxi al aeropuerto tuvo que estacionarse lejos de la entrada y nosotros con 6 maletas no recibimos ayuda de nadie ni intención de ello. Me pareció súper mal.

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
good_review: todo su ubicación , su museo y su terraza , demasiado recomendado.
bad_review: que no dan desayuno.

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
review_title: NO VALE SU COMPARACIÓN CALIDAD - PRECIO
good_review: su ubicación y algunas áreas su diseño
bad_review: el personal es de lo peor, no tienen sentido de servicio, están enfocados exclusivamente a el público de la noche, tratar con gente ebria y en estado inconveniente. Son maleducados, las instalaciones a detalle están sucias, todo huele a marihuana y el gerente lo maneja digamos a su perfil, como si fuera un night club y se empeña más en su estilismo que en el buen funcionamiento del hotel.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
good_review: el diseño, la galería de arte digital, la limpieza, las instalaciones en general y la ubicación

acommodation: Habitación Doble Silver
bad_review: dejaron la habitación sin limpiar por 2 días

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
good_review: Terrible hotel, please don't stay here. Two days we did not clean the room. The first time because we were not told that we had to request it daily. The second we requested it and they told us that the cleaning people had gotten sick. They had no staff. The hotel has terrible noise from the outside. We were on the 7th floor and you could hear everything. THE WINDOWS DO NOT HAVE THERMOPANEL WHICH MAKES THE SOUND LISTEN COMPLETELY. On the last day after we did not clean ourselves, we asked for a minimum change of towels and the person entered the room and threw our purchases in the trash. $ 1,000 worth of creams and facials in the trash, we had to go down to report and they searched for our belongings in the trash. THEY DO NOT SPEAK SPANISH. Little and nothing is understood. The hotel is expensive for the lousy service they offer. It is the worst hotel we have stayed in in all our travels. Please. DO NOT STAY HERE. They will regret it if they do.
bad_review:
Pésimo hotel, por favor no se queden acá. 
2 días no nos hicieron el aseo del cuarto. La primera vez por que no nos dijeron que había que solicitarlo diariamente. 
La segunda lo solicitamos y nos dijeron que se habían enfermado las personas de aseo. No tenían personal. 
El hotel tiene un ruido terrible en el exterior. Estábamos en el piso 7 y se escuchaba todo. 
NO TIENEN TERMOPANEL LAS VENTANAS LO QUE HACE QUE EL SONIDO SE ESCUCHE COMPLETO. 
El último día luego de no hacernos el aseo, pedimos mínimo un cambio de toallas y la persona entró a la habitación y nos tiró las compras a la basura. 
1.000 dólares en cremas y tratamientos faciales en la basura, tuvimos que bajar a informar y buscaron nuestras pertenencias en él basura. 
NO HABLAN ESPAÑOL. Se entiende poco y nada. 
El hotel es caro para el pésimo servicio que ofrecen. Es el peor hotel que nos hemos quedado en todos nuestros viajes. 
Por favor. NO SE QUEDEN ACÁ. Se arrepentirán si lo hacen. 
————————————-

acommodation: Habitación Silver - 2 camas grandes
review_title: Dream Hollywood was truly a dream
good_review: Trendy, upscale, and clean property in the heart of Hollywood with incredible service and security.

acommodation: Deluxe Platinum con cama extragrande
bad_review:
smell in the room. 
also no fridge

acommodation: Habitación Bronze - 1 cama extragrande
good_review: Our go to hotel when we stay in the Hollywood area! Close to everything! Bars, Nightlife, Amazing Eats! You can literally walk around the corner and pick your poison when it comes to vibes and fun to have.
bad_review: The valet on this last visit was terrible. Took an hour to get our car when we checked out

acommodation: Habitación Silver - 2 camas grandes
review_title: It is not the same "upscale" Dream Hotel Hollywood that used to be
good_review:
the location is convenient
the lobby if nice
valet personnel is excellent!
bad_review:
the rooms are a bit old now and they need some sort of refurbishing 
no more the same nice amenities in the room ( like slippers)
small bottled water is complimentary only at the check in- after that the front desk charge you for it

acommodation: Habitación Bronze - 1 cama extragrande
review_title: Perfect location, very friendly staff, would book again.
good_review:
Location was fantastic, although it meant the vallet could get a little busy in the evening and weekend. Room was better than we expected. Shower was big and spacious and the bed was really really comfy. 
Wine and cheese hour was a bonus and we got a bottle of champagne in our room to celebrate our honeymoon.
bad_review:
Could have done with a shower matt in the shower as it got slippy, and more places to hang a towel up. 
Also parking at $60 was insane but the vallet guys were great.

acommodation: Habitación Gold - 1 cama extragrande
bad_review: Some staff at front desk are not helpful 😔

acommodation: Habitación Silver - 2 camas grandes
review_title: Not the nice Dream Group hotel anymore - just a mediocre Hyatt chain hotel now
good_review: The valet parking guys are exceptional!
bad_review:
The room definitely needs to be refurbished a bit - there are signs of times there ( the fake leather of the bad frame was all torn apart - the furniture of the room damaged)
Also on regular weekday night ( tue and wed) lots of people going in and out from the lobby and parting on the rooftop and bar of the hotels so very very very noisy

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
good_review:
I really liked this hotel. Special touch with it being our honeymoon we had a bottle of champagne in our room and a view of the Hollywood sign. Room was amazing and there is a free car service with either 3 or 4 miles of the hotel. 
I would say that despite the negatives below I would stay here again, I just wish I was aware of some things before I arrived :).
bad_review: The staff were not overly friendly. Ceaser and another gentleman were lovely but we mostly felt like a nuisance asking for the car service and met with quite cold demeanours and felt judged. The pool area was lovely but on a weekend it is hard to get a spot as there are only 18 sunbeds and folks who rented out the cabanas both afternoons we went to the pool were very disruptive and getting heated.

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
bad_review: Double charged for bond still waiting for refund after checking out

acommodation: Habitación Bronze - 1 cama extragrande
good_review: Loved this hotel, was in a great location very clean modern and staff were lovely

acommodation: Habitación Silver con balcón - 1 cama extragrande
good_review: Room was very small but well appointed; shower was nice and I loved the mini bar selection. 'Hollywood sign' view not super great but we were overall happy. Rooftop looked great but was closed.

acommodation: Habitación Silver - 2 camas grandes

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
review_title: Great stay. Would stay there again
good_review:
The hotel staff is amazing and helpful and the welcome is good. 
The room is modern and big enough and housekeeping does a good job cleaning and organizing the room. (last night they didn’t clean the room). There is a smart tv, iPad for music, and a safe as well. They will bring whatever you need in one phone call (slippers, shaving kit etc..)
I’d recommend having brunch at the highlight room on the top floor or visiting it at night for a party.
bad_review:
Only minor thing is that the carpet in the room is dirty and has spots on it. 
I’d recommend having brunch at the highlight room on the top floor or visiting it at night for a party. 
Note that this hotel is in Hollywood (very close to Hollywood BL) so expect it to be 1- loud (thin walls, and is adjacent to a busy restaurant/nightclub “TAO” that will blast music that you can hear from your room until right after 2am)
2- busy hotel and area (people and cars. at busy times ie weekend nights it takes ~20 minutes to arrive by car for a distance of 1km) 
3- The hotel only has valet Parking and it costs $60. It also takes time to bring the car (~10-15 minutes). Next to the hotel there is off street parking that is $40 overnight if you negotiate with them (ask for unlimited ins and outs)

acommodation: Habitación Silver con cama extragrande
review_title: Hollywood Dream Hotel: Prime Location, Comfortable Stay, and Exceptional Staff
good_review:
Upon arrival, I was greeted by a friendly and accommodating staff. They went above and beyond to ensure my needs were met and provided helpful information. The staff even informed me of nearby self-parking options, which saved me some money compared to opting for valet parking. This level of attentiveness and willingness to assist set a positive tone for my stay.
One aspect that pleasantly surprised me was the early check-in. While the official check-in time was stated as 4 pm, the staff kindly arranged for me to check in at 1 pm. This flexibility and willingness to accommodate guests' needs made me feel valued as a customer and added to the overall positive impression of the hotel.
One of the standout features of the Hollywood Dream Hotel is its prime location. Situated in the heart of Hollywood, it offers convenient access to various attractions and entertainment venues. This central location allowed me to easily explore the vibrant surroundings, maximizing my time in the area.
Furthermore, I appreciated the presence of Karl Langerfield cosmetics in the room. This upscale addition was a nice touch, catering to guests who appreciate luxurious amenities. The beds were exceptionally comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep and enhancing the overall comfort of the stay.
Additionally, the hotel's convenient coffee bar downstairs was a welcome feature. It provided a hassle-free option for grabbing a quick coffee or tea, allowing me to start my day on a positive note without venturing too far.
bad_review:
Moving on to the room itself, I booked the King Silver category. Although the actual room did not match the opulent aesthetics depicted in the promotional pictures, it still provided a comfortable and inviting atmosphere. The absence of openable windows was a drawback, as it made the room feel slightly confined. However, I would recommend selecting a room with a balcony for those seeking a more open and airy experience.
While the rooftop lounge was disappointingly only open on weekends, the hotel's lobby made up for it with its daily offering of complimentary wine and cheese. This thoughtful gesture added a touch of sophistication and provided a pleasant way to unwind after a day of exploration.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
review_title: Good except for Essex dinner order experience
good_review: Proximity to Hollywood proper; in general, most of it was good experience
bad_review: I get that not many guests order food to their rooms. But, still, the fact that it's advertised as an option in the room, all hotel staff should have knowledge of the status of its availability from their 3 promoted restaurants. I tried for an hour to use the QR code (based again on info provided in the room) to order dinner from Essex only to find out upon my departure that Essex no longer provides food ordered directly from the hotel. You may think "after 10 min, you should've given up, rather than waste an hour," but I did call both Dream staff and the restaurant and both told me there should be no technical probs with using the QR code on my phone. The QR code DID take me to their menu, and I was able to get as far as selecting items, but I would always be taken back to the beginning and was given an error code 500 on my phone. Since staff insisted it should work, I kept trying to no avail. I ended up ordering Door Dash at likely extra expense for del fee, etc. just to try the menu items that looked appetizing. I should've guessed something was "off" since the QR code menu offered items that were not options thru Door Dash. Anyway, I doubt you have many travelers complaining about this sort of thing, so I'm sure my concerns will be laughed off as unimportant. With all respect would not be surprised as in this millenium it has been "pay more for less." We are now being asked to give tips on just about every electronic order now and this is after inflation is already killing us - and we're not talking about extra or above and beyond service - we're talking about being asked for tips from workers who are basically doing bare minimum at their jobs and handing us a bag over the counter.

I felt that they don’t really communicate with each but I wouldn’t say don’t stay in the hotel - it’s just feedback would def return if I wanted to stay in the Hollywood area again.

They were extremely helpful the entire duration of my stay. The pool and rooftop dining area has gorgeous views, definitely check it out!
bad_review: It's a little annoying to have to leave the hotel to go up to the pool. It can be confusing if you don't know how to get up there or don't remember when they tell you when you first check in. I stayed in a suite the first night and was surprised that it did not have a minibar and the layout was kind of weird.

acommodation: Habitación Bronze con cama extragrande
good_review:
- Great location in West Hollywood
- Rooftop "Highlight Room" is a popular and well known spot in Hollywood. Next door to the hotel is Tao 
- Loved the lobby decor, rooms were ok nothing overly spectacular. Views from the bedroom window were bland
- Bathrooms were lovely and appear to be recently refurbished
bad_review:
I think the hotel was a little pricey but maybe that's just LA as a whole! 
I had an issue with a deposit charged to my account despite being told by hotel management that I would not be charged a deposit. This had put me out of pocket and I was disappointed, understandably. However Director of rooms (Kelly) went above and beyond to ensure the rest of my stay was pleasant and for this I am extremely grateful. It made all the difference having a compassionate, clearly well experienced individual resolve the matter. Despite the hiccup, I will definitely stay here again :)

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
review_title: DEMASIADA ILUSIÓN PARA NUESTRA ESTADIA EN HOLLYWOOD
bad_review:
Despersonalización total hacia los clientes... Hablamos en persona con la Manager Olivia a las 14 hs. de nuestra primera estadía, comunicándole que aún a esa hora ambos cuartos ocupados por nosotros, no habían sido limpiados, a lo cual respondió muy amablemente ¨Ok, lo coloco ya en prioridad ¨ (señalando la computadora de su escritorio). A lo cual con mi amigo le dijimos que no había apuro, que salíamos y volvíamos después de cenar. 
Con gran sorpresa, de regreso a las 23 hs, al entrar a los cuartos, ambos seguían en el mismo desorden como lo habíamos dejado desde la mañana. Al teléfono con el front desk, le trasmitimos lo que había sucedido. No tenía idea de lo que le hablaba, ni rastro del mensaje prioritario de la Manager. Encima responde: No problem!! I´ll send you new towels!!! 
Qué NINGÚN PROBLEMA!!!, FUÉ MI RESPUESTA INMEDIATA Y AUTOMÁTICA. !!! ES UNA VERGÜENZA!!!! Qué pasa si cuando nos toca pagar al check out, nosotros los clientes decimos: No problem!!! no pagamos????
Uno paga por un servicio, y este tiene que ser acorde al precio. Aquí definitivamente no lo fué !!!
EL HECHO FUÉ QUE LA MAÑANA SIGUIENTE DEJAMOS MUY TEMPRANO EL HOTEL HACIA EL AEROPUERTO, ESPERANDO ALGUNA EXPLICACIÓN Y/O CONSIDERACIÓN POR PARTE DEL ENCARGADO DE TURNO... PERO NO!!!! OTRA VEZ, EL SEÑOR QUE NOS COBRABA NO TENÍA LA MENOR IDEA DE LO OCURRIDO.
Parece que todas las energías estaban colocadas en el PRIDE PARADE, y nosotros los HETERO NO SOMOS TAN IMPORTANTES. SERÍA UNA CLASE DE DISCRIMINACIÓN ESTA???????
LA DEJO COMO INQUIETUD!!!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a Hollywood Hills

acommodation: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Hollywood Hills View

good_review:

I'm not really a WEHO type of guy, for lack of a better description, but my son really enjoyed the area!

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
