good_review: Our room was spacious and had fabulous views over Los Angeles. the beds were comfortable, the gym was well equipped and clean. we thoroughly enjoyed the swimming pool which also had lovely views.
bad_review: No complaints but the water station on the 12th floor wasn’t that accessible.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
review_title: Cool hotel with a great pool in the best part of a West Hollywood
good_review: The pool was epic as was the location
bad_review: Just a few check in issues but it worked out in the end

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a la ciudad
review_title: Great location, great hotel, but not sure they care too deeply about their guests!
bad_review: Bar closed at 10pm, and for majority of the time the hotel was given over to non-paying guests, which meant that we couldn’t get near the pool for pool parties, again given over to people with day passes, and with extremely loud music the entire day. Worse still though was the fact that my husband was involved in an armed robbery (involving guns) outside the front door of the hotel, on the hotel grounds, and the hotel management did not either come to his aid immediately after the robbery or follow up during our entire stay. For a hotel on Sunset strip with such a high profile and such a long, rich history the security levels for guests was minimal, despite them being aware of numerous such robberies in and around that location in the weeks leading up to our stay. Not sure I would risk staying there in the future.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
bad_review:
In the room, there was no water and no liquid.
It was annoying that I had to ask for water at the reception.
I didn't know if that was the normal policy of the hotel, or if they have just forgotten to put some water in the room.

acommodation: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Hollywood Hills View
good_review: There is no coffee maker in the room or water

acommodation: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Hollywood Hills View
bad_review: No coffee or water inside the room

acommodation: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Hollywood Hills View
review_title: Great location and service but over priced.
bad_review: Beds are not comfortable, the carpet needs deep cleaning and I expected a bigger room for 4 people. yet its the same for 2 and at a higher price.

acommodation: Habitación con vistas a la calle - 2 camas grandes
bad_review: Only received housekeeping service every 3 days. Towels were old and thin and did not provide enough for a family of 4 so constantly had to call for more. Overnight parking is extremely expensive given the cost of the hotel room.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a Hollywood Hills
good_review:
Fabulous hotel with rock and roll heritage.
Massive comfortable rooms.
Super clean.
Exceltional customer service, happy hour.
The breakfast isnt included, but has a super yummy vegan option.
bad_review:
The lighting in the room is odd, lots of little atmospheric lamps, no big light, so hard to get ready.
The pool wasn't relaxing. The rooftop pool really sold it for me, but it was always very busy, and had a lot of kids. Nothing against kids, but i was expecting ibiza chill vibes, and it was public pool vibes.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
good_review: location, roof top pool, fridge in the room
bad_review: rooms are a bit small and very cold, the heater never worked, beds are comfortable but comforter is thin, shower towels are thin too

acommodation: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Hollywood Hills View
good_review: Loved the pool - sadly the pool bar was not open at all during our stay as it was in February. We did bring our own beverages nearby and brought them up to the pool :) Always a pleasant experience dealing with any staff we came in contact with. Clean rooms with plenty of room. Had a city view room with two queen beds and a small sitting area - loved it! Free snacks in the lobby were such a treat and came in handy. As we had no rental car we walked a lot and the hotel location was great for this - proximity to breakfast places, pharmacy, beer/wine stores, was convenient. Just ask for a coffee maker in your room and they'll provide a pod-type one along with cream/sugar.
bad_review:
We were offered a better view room for a small upcharge as we were early for our check in and our room was not ready yet - $10/night. (FYI - the nightly cost of this was brought down from $40/night and several 'no I won't pay that much per night' for an upgrade moments) Not sure if this is common practice? 
Also was pressured/sales pitched to take a bus tour by the individual that checked us in - which we declined as we had already booked a tour. 
We were with 3 other couples who all received different cash valued coupons for the local restaurant/store. I think these values should be standardized??

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y ducha adaptada - Adaptada para personas de movilidad reducida
good_review: roof top pool, beautiful view, great staff
bad_review: would have loved a coffee machine in the room

acommodation: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Hollywood Hills View
good_review: Like snacks and water stations. Good coffee.
bad_review: Pool bar not open. Also, booked for 4 peaple, always short of towels. Coffee pods not replenished.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Great hotel, good location, amazing customer service
good_review: Loved everything about the Andaz. Unique, funky, comfortable and amazing customer service.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
review_title: Nice hotel but below-par for a Hyatt and expensive for what you get.
good_review: The room size is good- though we paid for an upgrade and this a sales pitch when you check in. Being able to buy a barista coffee was nice.
bad_review: The hotel entry is poor and was under construction to update the landscaping. The hotel is located on a very busy road and the hotel itself is very close to the road. Reviews mentioned this hotel is well located but we had to Uber everywhere- unless you want to walk for 30+ minutes there is not much nearby. I couldn’t believe the Andaz is a Hyatt hotel for the price we paid. I did my research and this was not what I was expecting

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: looking forward my next stay again
bad_review: bar hours shall be open late like to midnight..

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
review_title: Nice but very expensive for what it is
bad_review: it’s really expensive for what it is. Andaz is nice but I expected something a lot fancier for a Hyatt. the outside of the hotel is basic and not particularly welcoming. it was under reno when we arrived. Breakfast pricing is eye watering. The location is so so. it felt a bit like being in the middle of nowhere. The highway is busy and noisy at night. We had to drive to get anywhere.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
review_title: Hotel with cool history, epic views from roof, and comfy beds. Housekeeping here is awesome!
good_review: Awesome rooftop with epic view, super friendly housekeeping and bar staff. Beds were comfy and housekeeping continued to bring us any supplies we needed each night quickly. Wish the rooftop bar was open in winter, a few heaters up there and it could be a hopping hangout!
bad_review: We didn't use valet service because there were so many reviews about damage to cars or excessive mileage when cars were returned. This was confirmed for us when we checked out and the gentleman in front of us had an issue with his car and the person working the front desk told him "we're still checking the cameras". The first set of valets when we arrived were so rude and mocked my spouse, he refused to leave his key with them. All the rest of the valets were pleasant and friendly, but we did NOT park our car on the premises. There are two lots easily walkable from the hotel that are half the price. No damage to our car.

acommodation: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Hollywood Hills View

good_review: great location & views. large windows and friendly staff
bad_review:
beds too soft (felt old) and bathroom outdated. rooftop bar unstaffed every time we went up there. parking overpriced when it’s just $25 nearby for overnight plus other hotels charge $20

Valet service was horrible. I was left without a valet cart to unload my car, after the staff at head desk said he would come out to help me. I got flustered as no one helped me and I had 2 elderly family members with me. I left a Starbucks drink in a carry tray on the passenger side floor. Next day when I picked up car, the drink had spilled and sat all night. Still lots of fluid on floor and now stinking. I asked front desk to help me and they told me to file complaint with valet manager. WHo? I don't know who that was and there were many people waiting for valet and they didn't care about me.
Next day, new man at front desk. I told him what happened as I changed to self park. He was lovely, apololgized and comped our breakfast.

My daughter who lives in West Hollywood paid $20/hour to park in the hotel lot. She was only at the hotel for a couple of hours. It would have been great if the parking staff would have told us about the $2/hour lot.

acommodation: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Hollywood Hills View
bad_review: Check-in time is late (4 p.m.) and the pool bar closes at 5, just an hour after check-in. Also, the small rooftop pool (the main reason I chose this hotel), was too chilly for an evening swim. Summer is over and most CA hotel pools are heated. It was very disappointing not getting any enjoyment out of the pool. The hotel was understaffed and my check-in was delayed (by 4 p.m. this should not be the case). The rooms lacked any style. The "restaurant" menu offered only a short list of bar food items. The food was average at best. After staying at the beautiful and well-appointed Maui Andaz, this experience was an expensive regret. Next time in West Hollywood, I will stay at the Mondrian where the rooms have style and the pool is heated.

acommodation: Habitación con vistas a la calle - 2 camas grandes
review_title: Hire actual adult humans with brains and perhaps even a conscience and things might improve.
good_review: The property is fine if you’re interested in being on Sunset. It’s loud and faux hip, but fine.
bad_review:
As my profession requires almost constant travel and I’m more likely found in an upscale hotel than at home, it’s a lot to say that I’ve never had such a rude, disrespectful and idiotic experience with staff at a hotel. Although this isn’t exactly an upscale hotel. Nevertheless-
I visited with a group that reserved and prepaid for our reservations months in advance. Because the trip involved a special occasion, one of the prepaid reservations was for the Penthouse Suite.
After requesting a slightly early check-in in advance, and confirming the request in person a few hours in advance, we arrived around 2pm to find the room wasn’t ready. That was ok, if slightly disappointing as we were told it would be fine.
We waited until the published check-in time of 4pm, only to be told it still wasn’t ready. At 4:45pm we were scheduled to leave for an event soon and had not showered. The front desk told us the room had some “problems”, including spilled shampoo on the carpet (??)
Their solution was to provide a key to a regular room so we could shower before departing for the event. Obviously disappointing , but trying to roll with our schedule, we were assured the room would be available when we returned from the event.
We returned to the hotel around 11pm and were informed the suite wasn’t going to be available at all due to “problems” of an unknown nature.

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
review_title: see property likes. amazing stay. amazing staff!
good_review:
clean fresh fun location excellent food quality service all really good. the room was large modern yet functional with good lighting. This was my second stay primarily because my go to property the edition was not only twice as much for room but also for any food intake. Moreover they were never very accommodating. In fact in the London property where they have tiny candles on the front desk my belongings caught fire and they did nothing for me or about it. Not even a coffee for heavens sake in spite of me writing to management repeatedly about the fire hazard and the damage/loss it caused me.
I switched to andaz for a one night stay and arrived early from Palm Springs and a gentleman at the front desk with exceptional charm named John took care of us. The room wasn’t ready so he had the manager upgrade us immediately checking in. Thereafter we were repeatedly asked how we were enjoying our accommodations. So I returned. . . This time a week.
Once again exceptional front desk service. John was there remembered me ( my sneakers- he is clearly a sneaker head too). They accommodated with a coffee machine - important for me because I wake up at 4:30 for exercise and without coffee I am not adequately fueled. I received a gorgeous huge room with a view of sunset. The gym is more than adequate and extraordinarily clean and fresh. The market and the coffee bar also high quality amazing food and service every time. At breakfast and for dinner at the bar one night.
Mid week I received important documents and did not have my laptop. Was working from my iPhone. I asked for a business center they said we don’t have but what do you need…? I said I needed papers printed then scanned and sent back with notations. Stuart from the front desk immediately gave me his email and said send to me I will get it done. Never ever mentioning charges of any kind. We got it done!
Another night towards the end of my stay my mobile was running low on battery.

acommodation: Suite con cama extragrande
good_review: The room was very well decorated. The hotel has a modern look and feel to it. The room was very large with good value for the price. The bathroom was awesome (walk in shower, bathtub, separate toilet, double vanity sink). The location was great, with lots of restaurants at walking distance.
bad_review: I was very disappointed by the view from the room. The pictures on the website and on Booking showed stunning views from the room. I had even paid extra for the "view" option as listed in the room details. We ended up in a room having as a view the other building in front of the hotel, with the nice view only showing from a very specific angle of one of the windows, so you would never have the nice view just by walking around in the room, but by specifically going to the window and looking from an angle. Overpromised underdelivered. This was for a honeymoon stay so we expected the magical views as advertised but ended up with a very depressing, gloomy view. Also, no coffee machine in the room, no booklet of instructions on how to connect to wifi or what number to dial to call the front office (had to guess it was "0"). No complimentaty water bottle in the minibar. Very big TVs but cannot cast iphone or ipad content to it, so pretty useless. No possibility to use your own apps like Netflix or HBO on your device to cast it on the TV and no such app directly on the TV. So the TV was pretty much useless with a useless OS. "Connecting your device" to the TV through using the menu option on the TV only allows you to use your device as a remote confroller (changing channels and volume) which is the most useless type of usage you can have, since there is a physical remote controller for that. There is some chromecast option stuff but too complicated to set up and not compatible with Apple device. In 2022 most TVs allow you to just cast your content but not the TVs on the hotels with their poorly designed OS.

review_title: Prima hotel op een goede locatie in WeHo. Lekker zwembad op het dak. Kamers aan de dure kant
good_review: Het zwembad, gelegen op het dak van het hotel was fantastisch en had een prachtig uitzicht over de stad!
bad_review: De prijs/kwaliteit verhouding was niet ok, kamers vrij duur. Aan de straatzijde was geluidsoverlast van de drukke weg. De badkamers waren niet erg modern. Geen water op de kamer, lege minibar. Bedlampjes die niet uit konden

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review:
os quartos estão bastante velhos e são muito barulhentos 
pedi para me levarem um dental kit ao quarto e demorou quase uma hora. depois de ter ligado 3 vezes

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
review_title: ottima base per visitare la città
bad_review: personale

acommodation: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Hollywood Hills View
good_review:
Hotel moderno e con carattere. Camera spaziosa e silenziosa, letto comodo (eravamo in due e avevamo un matrimoniale king a testa) e bella l'illuminazione (lampade Artemide e comoda la lucina segnapasso che si accende automaticamente quando scendi dal letto).
Ottimo il servizio parcheggio con chiamata dell'auto via SMS (il servizio si paga caro, ma non ci sono alternative migliori in zona), personale gentilissimo e posizione top sulla Sunset strip (scendi e trovi tutto quello che vuoi).
Carina la piscina sul roof top con vista sulle ville di west hollywood.
Per la maggior parte delle persone é un'esperienza tendente al costoso (me compreso), ma ne vale la pena e ci ritornerei.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a Hollywood Hills
review_title: Fui mal tratada e o hotel não compensa.
bad_review:
O custo-benefício não compensou. 
Além de nunca terem entrado no quarto, nem mesmo pra trocar as toalhas que não secavam, nos deixaram pra fora do quarto por duas vezes por problemas na fechadura. Além disso, explanaram de forma muito rude a conta, ao final, quando questionados.
Por fim, poucas opções para tomar café (tudo caríssimo!), e o estacionamento, apesar de imenso, não deixam ser utilizado se não por uso de valet e a pagamento de 60 dólares a diária. 
Não recomendo e não voltarei!

acommodation: Queen Room with Two Queen Beds and Hollywood Hills View
good_review: Gostei de tudo neste hotel, instalações excelentes, quarto confortável e silencioso( 1209), funcionários simpáticos e prestativos. Valet é pago, 60 dólares a diária, paguei pelo conforto, tem manobristas eficientes. Fiquei em um quarto de frente e com a vista maravilhosa para Los Angeles. No hall de entrada tem Snacks à vontade, barrinha de cereal, mini batata frita (Lays), jujuba, água, café! Um dos melhores hotéis que já me hospedei. Pedimos delivery ( pizza) à noite, sem problemas. Meu filho perdeu um AirPod no andar do quarto, e os funcionários se mobilizaram e conseguiram achar. Super seguro, com sistema de cartão no elevador. Enfim, perfeito! Parabéns a administração do hotel e toda a equipe
bad_review: Gostei de tudo!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y ducha adaptada - Adaptada para personas de movilidad reducida
review_title: muy caro para lo que es
good_review: no me gusto en donde está ubicado
bad_review: no es muy amigable, sobre todo las personas del front desk

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
good_review: Große, schöne und coole Zimmer. Tolle Lage in Hollywood. Würden wieder kommen!
bad_review: Es gibt nichts zu bemängeln!

acommodation: Suite Deluxe con vistas
good_review:
Lage in WeHo ist super, spektakulärer Blick aus
dem 11. Stock!
Personal sehr freundlich!
bad_review:
Hat definitiv schon bessere Tage gesehen, Minibar
leer, kein Roomservice im Angebot, Poolanlage sehr 
abgearbeitet! Müsste dringend eine Renovierung 
erhalten.

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con 2 camas grandes
review_title: rien a dire l’hôtel et le personnel PARFAIT !! je recommande vivement :)
good_review:
L’hôtel est très bien situé , 
la piscine est superbe ,
le petit déjeuner est super bon 
la chambre est propre .. 
le personnel est remarquable !! 
je recommande vivement !! :)
bad_review:
- manque de lumière dans les chambres
- climatisation trop froide dans les couloirs et au petit déjeuner

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con 2 camas grandes
review_title: NIE wieder Andaz, L.A. hat auch ehrliche Hotels
good_review: Lage, ansonsten dieses Hotel nie wieder, lesen sie bitte aufmerksam weiter….
bad_review: Sehr laut zur Straße! Achtung, dieses Hotel betrügt!!! Wir hatten auf der Rechnung 3x Parken für 60 Dollar (ohne das wir ein Auto hatten) und das Frühstück wurde doppelt pro Tag gebucht. Nach Beschwerde wurde alles runtergenommen und wir haben bezahlt, was richtig war. 24 Stunden nach unserer Abreise hat man sich das Geld über den Block einfach wiedergeholt. Auf Mails wird nicht reagiert! Laut Google Bewertungen sind wir nicht die Einzigen, dass scheint eine Masche des Hotels zu sein!

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
bad_review: Wir konnten erst nach 17:00 unser Zimmer beziehen und bekamen als Kompensation das Frühstück, das wir dann aber doch auf der Rechnung fanden, was beim Checkout zu einer unangenehmen Diskussion führte.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a Hollywood Hills
bad_review: les chambres sont vieillottes, la salle de bain ridicule, cassée, le personnel peu aidant et peu aimable, et la vue colline est en réalité une vue sur parking!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a la ciudad
good_review: A vista é incrível, o quarto é fantástico, espaçoso, confortável! Enfim, tudo perfeito!

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes
good_review: Gas stations, places to eat and shopping centers nearby. A quiet neighborhood near a hospital, clinics and well-kept housing estates. About an hour's drive from the entrance to Sequia Nat. Park. Good standard of the hotel and very nice service.
bad_review: Unfortunately very close to the highway. Rooms with windows facing the highway are noisy at night.

review_title: Great stay. Will be my choice when traveling to Fresno.
good_review: Location was perfect. Great breakfast and room was spacious.
bad_review: No complaints

good_review: Great location for our trip to Yosemite, less than 2.5hr. drive from there. Close to a outdoor shopping mall where they have great Asian food. Good breakfast.
bad_review: The A/C in the room is very laud, feel like a truck running its engineer outside my window downstairs all night long. We have to turn it off for a while to get some peace. Didn't get good rest.

bad_review: the breakfast was bad, cold food no microwaves, not organized. there was also a pair of women’s underwear left in our room. pool was dirty

good_review: The room was not clean especially the floor. The janitor should do a better job.

good_review: the room was awesome; we had a queen suite so it was spacious. it was clean and comfortable. the fitness center was great. the breakfast was amazing!
bad_review: the front desk staff wasn’t overly friendly, but maybe it had been a long day. we learned that the police had been there to remove a drug addict from the bathrooms by the pool. speaking of pool, it didn’t have a hot tub.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes - Planta alta
good_review: we have been to a couple of Hotels in Fresno so far but this was by far the best one. Very clean, good fitness room and pool , good breakfast

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: We enjoyed staying at the hotel. Good location. Rooms were clean, as all Hyatt place. Included breakfast was the same everyday, but it was good. For breakfast you will have a good choice of food, bagels, toast, philadelphia chees, butter, jam, boiled eggs, bananas, oranges, apples, yogurt, muffins, cereals, in a box you will have scramble eggs with the choice of bacon or sausages, also breakfast potatoes, tea, oatmeal, coffee, orange juice, fruit cup, milk you will not be hungry for sure. There was a free parking. Beds and pillows was comfortable. All the staff in the hotel was very nice. Great hotel for a family vacation.
bad_review: Everything was great!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: close and convenient to where I was working in Fresno
bad_review: I had to change rooms a couple of times due to various issues. I wish the weekday breakfast started at 6am

good_review: Location. Modern facility and look. Nice bike and walking trail. Safe surrounding and relatively quiet. Restaurants nearby.
bad_review:
The Kleenex box was empty when I checked in. Also, there was only one regular coffee pack.
Breakfast hot meal was disappointing. For a hotel of this caliber and price, please serve your hot meals on nice trays buffet style.

review_title: Shiny looking, but not what it seems.
good_review: Hyatt Place gets a 10 for amenities!! A wonderful place with a gym and a proper breakfast!
bad_review:
Walls are thin, I could also hear people stomping about above me. 
My heater/fan made an annoying rattling noise that could not be quieted unless I shut it off. 
Road noise was ridiculous, it sounded like a rumbling speedway out there, which isn’t true. Grateful for earplugs. 
Front desk staffing was minimal and they seemed annoyed when I came to check in.

 When I reached the hotel on Friday March 26, however, the staff at Hyatt Place informed me that there were no spare mattresses and they could not do anything to help me. acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
Visiting home from out of town with two little ones (one being immune compromised) is stressful enough. The trip was an emergency and very sad. The hotel stay was the highlight.
I always bring disinfectant wipes for counters and such and my own blankets and sheets for the babies, but I noticed as I was wiping down how sterile everything felt. After wiping many surfaces. I looked at my wipe and NOTHING! Not even dust. The floors were just as clean. Blankets, pillows, and all bedding smelled freshly washed, so changing them out was not going to factor into this hotel stay. 
I was able to relax, even if it was for one night. 
Thank you Hyatt!
bad_review:
Parking was a bit challenging with a huge truck. I recommend parking in the far spaces.
The staff was amazing by helping me get my big beats of a truck out of a tight spot.

Habitación Doble - 2 camas
good_review: El lobby super cozy. como estar en una casa. realmente muy agradable. cafe y te complementario riquísimo. el personal muy atento.
bad_review: habitacion muy pequeña.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: La habitación del hotel es muy cómoda y el personal muy amable. Las instalaciones son de muy buen nivel y tiene una muy buena ubicación para llegar a Walk of Fame o a transporte público. Volvería.
bad_review: El desayuno podría ser un poco más completo que solo café o té, o bien ofrecer café por las tarde también. Pero igual bien.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: Pieza muy pequeña

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Un buen recuerdo de nuestra estancia en Los Angeles
good_review: El lobby, el café de las mañanas, la decoración y la limpieza. Aunque hemos visto comentarios negativos, nos limpiaron la habitación sin tener que solicitarlo
bad_review: El tamaño de la habitación y que no hubiera armarios, aunque el último día descubrimos dos cajones grandes bajo la cama.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Buena ubicación pero habitación muy pequeña y sin ventilación.
good_review:
Buena ubicación, cama cómoda, limpio, el Rooftop muy agradable y la piscina muy bien. El personal muy amable y atento. Hay café y te por las mañanas en el lobby.
Nuestra habitación era muy silenciosa pese al bar del tejado donde el fin de semana había bastante jaleo.
bad_review:
La habitación es muy pequeña, ni siquiera cabe un armario ni un escritorio. No hay nevera ni microondas.
La ventana de la habitación no se abre y no hay ventilación en el baño con lo que se queda todo húmedo y no se puede ventilar. Hay un aire acondicionado que solo puede calentar o enfriar, no se puede ventilar y además saca el aire de la habitación, no del exterior. 
El único parking es valet ($55 por noche en Oct 2023), pero hay bastantes parking públicos cerca del hotel.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: Que no tenga desayuno incluido

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Habitación cómoda, bien comunicado para visitar la ciudad y ambiente agradable en el hotel. El rooftop perfecto para tomar una copa.
bad_review: Ruidoso por culpa del hotel de al lado.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review:
Habitaciones pequeñas, con poco espacio si viajas con varias maletas.
No dispone de armario, se cuelgan en perchas en la paredes.
Te cobran una fianza excesiva y no te informan de las cosas que están incluidas en el precio con lo que no sabes si te van a cobrar por usar servicios como la terraza superior o piscina.
Mucho ruido exterior por la música que ponen, sobre todo en fin de semana que dificulta el descanso.
En la recepción no se molestaron en hablar en castellano a pesar de que en la información de la página pone que hablan los dos idiomas.
Los alrededores del hotel son muy inseguros por la noche, incluso entraron en el Hall del hotel algún indigente.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: El ruido de la música

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Nuevo, moderno, cómodo, bien situado y bonito.
bad_review: Algunos días hay eventos donde quizás hay demasiada gente de fuera del hotel, ocupando por ejemplo la piscina

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a Hollywood Hills
review_title: Bien localizado, con puntos a mejorar
good_review: La localización está muy bien, cerca del paseo de la fama. Las instalaciones son modernas y cómodas. La piscina muy agradable.
bad_review: La limpieza es mejorable, debajo de la cama y suelo había bastante suciedad. La habitación es pequeña, no tiene armario. Se oye mucho ruido de los bares del hotel. El precio es alto muy alto y la fianza que hacen dejar por noche también.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: El hotel es muy lindo. Hay un poco de ruido pero corta relativamente temprano.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Personal muy atento ayudar en todo sentido, la limpieza en general muy buena, me alojaría de nuevo en un futuro.
bad_review: No tenia una refrigeradora pequeña, ni cafetera, la habitación muy pequeña.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: La habitación estaba limpia y en buen estado. La piscina excelente en la azotea es lo mejor que tiene el hotel.
bad_review: La habitación era pequeña y no contaba con clóset o armario donde dejar la maleta y la ropa. El estacionamiento era muy costoso (US$55 diarios) pese a encontrarse en el subterráneo del mismo edificio, obligando a pagar por servicio de valet parking. El personal de recepción no me pareció del todo amable. El entorno del hotel no se percibía seguro por las noches.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas individuales y vistas al atrio
review_title: Recomendable si no vas con maletas
bad_review: Dormitorio pequeño no tiene closet, no hay donde dejar las maletas

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas
bad_review: desayuno debe ser en la terraza

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
la ubicación es muy buena, estas en Hollywood y si piensas moverte constantemente queda relativamente cerca de muchos museos, parques, etc..
El hotel cuenta con un diseño muy moderno y es prácticamente todo nuevo, la cama es muy comoda y el baño tiene un buen tamaño, también cuenta con amenidades y un rooftop que puedes disfrutar durante la noche, el personal te atiende muy bien y siempre son muy amables.
bad_review:
La zona puede ser un poco ruidosa en la noche, pero nada de que preocuparse. 
Las habitaciones son un poco pequeñas, pero supongo que es por la misma zona en la que esta ubicada, si embargo la cama y baño son muy cómodos, el servicio de limpieza de tu cuarto realmente no fue totalmente de mi agrado porque no limpiaban tu cuarto simplemente te dejaban toallas limpias y te tendían tu cama.

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
good_review: Hab pequeña / personal poco poco poco amable

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
good_review: muy buena atención, muy limpio y bien ubicado. tiene un muy buen gimnasio
bad_review: que no considere desayuno … nunca por un precio tan alto solo incluye lugar para descansar …

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
bad_review: Precio

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas individuales y vistas al atrio
good_review: Excelentes instalaciones, moderno, limpio. Ubicacion mal (muy peligrosa la zona). Personal muy profesional. Sugerencia: incluir algo de desayuno en el precio o mas agua/café.
bad_review: Ubicacion. La zona es muy peligrosa. No salir después de las 10pm. Cuartos un poco pequenos, pero modernos y comodos. Desayuno con costo y el café y agua no estàn las 24hrs.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: location, precio, bar en roof y servicio
bad_review: no tiene mini bar

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
bad_review: Muuuuchisimo ruído, mucha gente acude al hotel para estar en el bar y en el rooftop. Mucha gente andando, entrando y saliendo por el tema bar.

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
bad_review: Le hace falta un armario

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
good_review: La ubicación del hotel buena al estar cerca de varios lugares para conocer y pude movilizarme fácilmente en el transporte público a otros lugares.
bad_review: La limpieza no es diaria en la habitación por las medidas frente al Covid y sólo dejan toallas y sábanas. Considero que su personal debería ser bilingüe inglés-español para facilitar la comunicación con los huéspedes. La garantía que piden la considero elevada, espero que pronto me la devuelvan.

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
good_review: Las instalaciones del hotel están muy bien, la terraza es una pasada, tiene muy buen ambiente y tuvimos la suerte de ver un grupo de música tocar en directo.
bad_review: No hay servicio de limpieza en las habitaciones, solo bajo demanda.

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
good_review: TE COBRAN 150 DOLARES ADICIONALES POR HABITACION Y NO VENIA ESPECIFICADO CUANDO HICE LA RESERVACION

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
good_review: LA UBICACION MUY BUENA, Y EL SERVICIO EXCELENTE!
bad_review: TE COBRAN 150 DOLARES DE SEGURO POR NOCHE EL CUAL NO VENIA ESPECIFICADO EN LA APLICACION, OJO CON ESE DETALLE!

acommodation: Habitación Doble con terraza - 1 cama doble grande
bad_review: Que no hagan limpieza de las habitaciones y su tamaños y la limpieza del establecimiento

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
good_review: El lugar es bonito y muy buena ubicación.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: No me quedó más en Hollywood Blvd
bad_review: Ubicación, homeless por alrededor

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Conocer Los Angeles y alojar en un buen lugar seguro y cercano a todo
good_review: El ambiente, muy juvenil y alegre a la vez todos muy profesionales
bad_review: Falta comida en la terraza

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Hotel muy bonito y completo, con estilo. La estética Preciosa, cama amplia y cómoda, televisor enorme y detalles en la habitación. El restaurante para cenas delicioso y buen ambiente
bad_review: Desayuno a parte, escaso y caro.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: Nunca aclara que el estacionamiento te lo cobran aparte ( 50 dólares por día )

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: El hotel es muy bonito, instalaciones nuevas y cómodas. El área de la piscina con bar y terraza es una maravilla. El personal es muy amable. Te dan una bebida de bienvenida. La cama es enorme y la habitación muy amplia.
bad_review: Hay que dejar un depósito de $150 por noche al llegar, lo que puede trastocar un poco tus planes. El hotel está situado muy cerca del paseo de la fama, y a pesar de ser zona turística, está bastante deprimida. No se siente muy seguro por la noche.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: muy lindo esteticamente,pero imposible descansar por las noches con la fiesta del bar de la terraza.
good_review: el disenio del hotel es muy moderno, pero tiene sus contras por ejemplo el banio tiene poca privacidad cuando hay alguien usandolo.
bad_review: la habitacion es pequeña para personas que viajan valijas. mismo teniendo dos carryon es dificil tenerlas en un lugar ya que no hay espacio para tenerlas. tampoco hay una zona dstinada a placard, closet. no hay espacio de apoyo como silla o banqueta. solo el cafe es complementario, el bar de abajo tiene precios elevados. lo que no me gusto para nada es que en la terraza haya un bar con fiesta todos los dias, era imposible dormir. se ve que es un "bar de moda" y hace imposible descansar. inadmisible para un hotel.

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
bad_review: Que te retienen 150$ por noche de depósito

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: La atención malísima

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
bad_review: Debería anunciarse que es un hotel para fiesta. Durante el fin de semana los bares de la terraza tienen música altísima hasta las 2 de la mañana. Nos dijeron que nos pondrían en una planta inferior para escuchar menos ruido pero se escucha igual. Es imposible dormir. Y una vez acaba la fiesta tienes que seguir escuchando a los huéspedes gritando por los pasillos sin ningún tipo de control por parte del personal del hotel. Es un hotel-discoteca y debería anunciarse así porque si no sales de fiesta, dormir es imposible. Muy caro para lo que ofrece. La piscina es muy pequeña y siempre está llena y el agua sucia (muchísimos pelos flotando). Las habitaciones pequeñas y sin armario, tienes que colgar la ropa en 5 perchas en la pared.

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas individuales y vistas al atrio
Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: La calidad del servicio y las instalaciones
bad_review: La ubicación. De noche hay que tener cuidado por que hay mucho homeless.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a Hollywood Hills
good_review: ubicación, precio. vista de la habitación hacia hollywood hills, cama super cómoda.
bad_review: los precios del restaurantes

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Buen hotel de fiesta, mal hotel de descanso.
good_review: es un hotel muy bonito y con mucha fiesta si estás en ese plan.
bad_review: Imposible dormir. Todas las noches fiesta.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review:
La ubicación es muy buena, a un paso del paseo de la fama.
En el hotel hay música con volumen muy alto, pero solo se escucha en la recepción. Habitación silenciosa.
bad_review:
El personal muy desagradable y que nos cobraron 150 euros de "depósito" por noche y no se nos informó en ningún momento.
Al llegar la persona que nos hizo el check in a penas nos miró a la cara. Nos pidió nuestros documentos, nuestra tarjeta y nos dio la llave de la habitación. No nos dijo nada del cargo de 450e (150e por noche) que se nos cobró en nuestra tarjeta. No nos dijo nada del wifi, nada de los horarios, ninguna información. Encima al parecer no encontraba nuestros nombres en la reserva y nos cuestionaba de que hubiéramos hecho bien la reserva. Finalmente se dio cuenta de que estaba poniendo mi apellido mal (no recibimos ni una disculpa por esto).
Al día siguiente, cuando nos dimos cuenta de que nos habían hecho el cargo de 450e+precio de la habitación+muchas tasas, bajamos a preguntar y nos atendió otra compañera. Nos dijo que eso era así y que no sabía por que no nos lo había dicho nadie (tampoco nos pidió disculpas por nada).
Habitación muy pequeña y sin armarios ni muebles para guardar la ropa o las maletas.

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
bad_review:
Me pidieron un depósito al llegar del cual no fui informado y el personal, en este caso el jefe (porque pregunté por él), no hizo nada para ayudarme. 
Por otra parte, la ducha de la habitación estaba bien pero era un poco incómoda para ducharse bien, puesto que era como una ducha de piscina

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas individuales y vistas al atrio
bad_review: no tenía desayuno ni pude acceder al restaurante

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas
bad_review: El cafe de la mañana.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: El baño de mi habitación tenía el desagote de la ducha tapado. Me bañe se inundo el baño, cuando baje a reclamar me respondieron que al otro día podían ir a chequear el problema. Un asco!

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
review_title: Pasable para una noche y ya
bad_review:
al llegar y le pasó a muchos... la habitación no estaba lista y eran ya las 17:37 de la tarde, como compensación nos dieron un vale para tomar algo en el bar...
por la mañana bajamos a pedir algo del desayuno y la chica que tienen alli dónde el bar o era nueva, ó no tenia experiencia... tardó en servirnos una hora... y vas de fin de semana es fiesta constante

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a la ciudad
good_review: Nicely decorated, rooftop is nice, happy hour and rooms cleaned daily!
bad_review: No microwave

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
bad_review: keine minibar

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Incredible hotel, 10 mins walk from the Walk of Fame, looks like another world compared to the area. Always clean, beautiful view, big and comfortable bed.
bad_review: My room was a little small, not much space for big suitcases like I did.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Nice place with free coffee in the morning and social events including free beer in some evenings

review_title: should have booked another hotel to stay at.
good_review: the only thing that stood out was the decently sized room. quite close to some tourist attractions but would not want to walk it.
bad_review: the roof top bar and floor bar was quite loud and hard to sleep through. the area was a few streets away from some homeless and quite sketchy to walk at night.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Unfortunately they have charged my credit card with the amount for the deposit twice. Until today there is no refund on my card and their customer service couldn't assist me in solving this problem. This is frustating :( it's been 3 months since check out...

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a la ciudad
good_review: The hotel was nicely designed. I did not get to go to the rooftop area or visit the restaurants but the bedroom was nice and the bathroom was very modern. The bed was super comfortable probably the best bed I have ever slept on; pillows were bounce back pillows and I had a lovely good nights sleep. The location is great; easy access to sunset boulevard, Hollywood walk of fame and Beverley Hills. The hotel staff were friendly and I received a voucher for complimentary drink upon arrival.
bad_review: The restaurant does not open on Mondays which was disappointing but I got to order food on Uber eats. The bedroom was small but I was a solo traveller so it was fine. A deposit is required per night which meant I had to spend more upon checking in so you would have to budget extra money but this is refundable when you check out. Food at the cafe was quite pricey in my opinion. I’m from London and it doesn’t cost £15 to buy a sandwich.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: The hotel is really nice, modern and the bed was exceptional.
bad_review:
We stayed during a weekend and even the room was in a high floor you were able to hear the music from the clubs outside all night. We even had to ask for earbuds.
For the price you pay I would expect at least to have breakfast included.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Good value for money and good location
good_review: Very nice hotel in east Hollywood. Good location to move around the city. We were surprised by the facilities very positively and would definitely consider staying there again when in LA. We’ve read many negative reviews about the hotels noise before arriving but we got a quiet room in a quiet part of the hotel and except one night where some other guests came back from a party and were noisy (nothing that wouldn’t happen in another hotel) we were very comfortable.
bad_review: The room was nice but the bathroom had no intimacy, it was literally a part of the room separated as bathroom. Its door wasn’t closing properly and we had to stick the cream tube in between to close it

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: I recommend ir if you want a nice hotel in LA
good_review:
Excellent value for money. The facilities are all you can wish for a stay in LA. 
Very clean. Good location.
Good menu.
bad_review: Nothing. All was great

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Lovely hotel in the heart of tourist Hollywood. The hotel is a bit of a party hotspot but being on the 3rd floor, the noise didn't bother us at all. The pool and rooftop bar are fantastic. The room was spacious, clean and comfortable. The hotel is in easy walking distance to the Hollywood Walk of Fame and even walkable to Griffith Observatory (quite a walk, but it's possible!)

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas
Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
good_review: The hotel is modern and clean, and the location is close to a lot in Los Angeles.
bad_review: The music from the clubs at night. There needs to be more customer service. Especially needing water or snacks from downstairs.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Love the look and the amenities. Front desk staff on check in were fantastic!
bad_review: Water machines in the fitness center and on our floor were not working. Also temp was too high in the fitness center

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: It's ok if all you're going to do at the hotel is sleep.
good_review: Overall, the hotel looks great as does the restaurant downstairs and the rooftop bar. The location is alright to get to the main spots in the city however, Hollywood itself is quite gritty and dirty nowadays, especially with the increasing housing problem. The bed and pillows were super comfortable.
bad_review: The hotel room is very small for the price range. There's very little space to open your suitcase even less two if you're accompanied and there's no wardrobe, so trying to sort out clothes was quite the hassle. There's no minibar to keep cool beverages in your room which isn't great with the LA heat.

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio

good_review: Very cool and chic. People are very friendly.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.

good_review: Room clean, good bathroom. Great common areas. Complimentary coffee in the morning for guests. Nice personnel overall. Great location.
bad_review: Our room was quite small. It barely entered the luggage and there is no much space. No wardrobe present. But the worse was the noise made by the opened bar downstairs and on the rooftop until 2 am every day. If you're looking for a party place, it's ok, but if you'd need to rest properly, I won't recommend it.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.

There was a nice cafe in the lobby area - the lobby was also a stunning design and place to sit and chill with a coffee. Highly recommend!

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.

The hotel is located in an area filled with homeless (tents everywhere). We felt unsafe just waiting a car outside. 
We had one night that our floor was vibrating from the high volume of the club downstairs. 
Every request takes ages to be fulfilled. The staff tries their best but are somewhat inexperienced, at times.

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
review_title: Point-blank on our stay: enjoyed modern rooms, comfy bed, large TV; minor letdowns - small water bottles, room size, $47
good_review: Modern, comfy rooms and bed, a large TV with Chromecast, all in a great location.
bad_review: The provision of tiny water bottles was a bit inconvenient, and the room size was on the smaller side. Additionally, the daily valet parking fee of $47 was a necessity for the safety of our car, albeit a bit pricey. On some nights, particularly from Friday to Saturday, nearby nightclubs played music until 2 AM, which could potentially disturb light sleepers, although during our stay from Sunday to Thursday, the music went on until midnight.

Rooms are small with no wardrobe or storage space - you literally get 1 drawer under the bed, the other drawer has a safe you can not remove - reply from staff was 'thats hollywood!' 
No coffee in your room, they offer it comp in the lobby until 10am and even if the flask is full they just throw it out at 10 on the dot
Staff service is hit and miss

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.

bad_review: The aircon was slightly over the top to the point I had to switch it off as I couldn´t seem to make it any less than freezing :-) It would be better if the rooms had wardrobes also and I think the food in the hotel is way overpriced with very limited options available.

Luckily i was able to cover it but I can see it really messing with some peoples holidays.

acommodation: Habitación - Cama extragrande - Atrio
review_title: The place to stay in Hollywood!
good_review:
The room was clean and cozy. The bed was comfortable. The pool area was adorable and the views from the roof were great! The whole hotel was decorated very nicely.
I saw many reviews about the hotel being loud. I was able to hear the club a little when I was right by the window but it wasn’t bad at all. I was on the 6th floor so if you are worried about noise I’d say ask for a room that isn’t on the 7th or 8th floor.
bad_review: Nothing about the property it’s self. Just the location seemed a little sketchy at times.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Had a great time! Will be back!
good_review: Very clean, nice decor, beautiful rooftop pool
bad_review: Rooms a little small. No where to put your stuff really (no side tables)

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y vistas a la ciudad
review_title: Overall a very positive stay and will definitely recommend the hotel to friends!
good_review: The location was great! Hollywood is not that great at night but the hotel's street was well light and always full of people! The room was very nice and modern! It did not have a wardrobe but was spacious enough for us to have our (large) suitcases open at all times!
bad_review: The options on the breakfast menu were a bit limited and the personnel did not seem to update the wall mounted menu. There was no mini fridge in the room - there was an option to request one but not very practical.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: The location is excellent to walk to the main spots in Hollywood and taking public transportation. The rooftop has a cool vibe. The only thing to improve would be to schedule the cleaning during the mornings. You have to advise, otherwise, they can do the cleaning very late in the day. Once I did, they put in the effort and did it, which I really appreciate. The only amenity missing is a restaurant for breakfast. However, the restaurant next door for dining is amazing and has direct access from the hotel! If you need to stay in this area, this Hotel is a great choice.
bad_review: Unfortunately, the surrounding area is very disappointing. This Hotel makes the exception.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Pleasant stay with all amenities we needed.
good_review: Modern clean hotel with nice pool and upstairs bar area. Free tea and coffee provided to guests in the morning. Was a nice perk of staying. Quick and convenient 24hr parking valet service.
bad_review: Area around the hotel is a little rough. The rooftop bar is open most nights until the early hours of the morning which caused some noise that could sometimes be heard from rooms. Valet parking of $55 per night seemed slightly excessive although likely to going rate in Hollywood.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Great location, very comfy but with a few hidden surprises that caught us off guard. Would stay again but with more rese

It is not stated anywhere on booking.com about it being a night life hotel, there was loud music and thumping until 2am one day making it very hard to sleep. 
Also their security deposit of $150usd a night seems a bit excessive.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.

review_title: Great looking hotel with amazing style but lacked warmth.
good_review: Property was amazing great style decore and facilities . Location was good. Pool and roof top were cool.

Then the roof top bar was not open for the next two days of our stay being Monday / Tuesday. Staff were professional and serviceable but not really warm or overly welcoming. Not sure we were the preferred demographic with teenage daughters but it was transactional and not as hospitable as other hotels we have stayed at in your portfolio or other high end competitors- maybe that’s the ‘cool LA. Vibe’ - I’m not sure. Would have also appreciated tea/ coffee in the room and a fridge/mini bar.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.

Another one entered and asked if we had been helped and she was great.

good_review:
Hidden fees 
$45 to park- did not see that when we were booking , very disappointing- they tell you once you are there, by then it was too late. Couldn’t park across the street - it would get ticketed between 2-4 am - then the isles were too narrow. Tough to get in and park. Need to keep track of number parking tickets sold- on a Friday night, there was a wedding, we watched 7 cars circling around to find a spot- we stayed in that night afraid to leave and not get a spot. For paying $45 a day, I should not have to drive around looking for a spot. Will anything change - no. Why because they can and they will- very disappointing !!!!
 
Everything cost money
No ice machines

good_review: The hotel and restaurant staff were great. The concierge, Phillip, was super and let us borrow chairs, umbrellas and boogie boards (and a wagon), for the beach. The room was nice and beds were comfy.
bad_review:
We were very disappointed with the pools. They are much smaller than the pictures and were packed elbow to elbow (and they sell day resort passes). The pools are behind locked gates with the nearest bathroom in the tower. We didn’t see any kids in wet swimsuits running to those bathrooms. Good for younger kids, but we didn’t use the pools, which was one of the reasons I chose the hotel. 
The food and drinks at the restaurants on site were very expensive, so we ate most meals off-site. The Sportsman seafood restaurant and Dockhouse grill were both good.

At 9pm sat down at a empty cabana to rest my broken foot from the walk to restaurant and a boy came up and told me I need to rent it. It was night and I was full clothed with a medical boot on. And the amount of food around the bottom of the bed skirt was insane. A muffin 1/2 a sandwich I have it all on video if you want it. I would have changed to a cleaner room but my foot was bothering me and it was to much trouble.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y balcón
review_title: Good for kids but at a high price
good_review: We stayed in one of the Marina Suites and the room was very roomy and comfortable, with nice amenities, comfy bed, good pressure shower. The balcony to the bay was very nice. For the kids the place is great: the swimming area does wonders, with beach, slides, attractions and activities. Hotel restaurant opened til late was handy when arriving past 9 after a day at an amusement park (just 5 min drive away, which is also great).
bad_review: The receptionist that checked us in was not friendly but I could let that go if he was at least helpful. But he didn’t explain a thing about what was charged to my card, about wi-fi, breakfast options, gym, nothing. As soon as he heard my accent he just mimicked few words and that was it. Plus the door to the bathroom in our room was derailed from the track and making noise through the nigh. We managed to fix it at some point, but considering the 400$ a night, I expected the hotel to check if there is any issue in the room before putting people in it. And no hand or face towels in the room, which was also weird.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con 2 camas dobles y vistas al puerto deportivo
review_title: Overall we loved our stay and would recommend
good_review: The breakfast @ the Red Marlin was amazing. The pools and slides were fantastic! Your valet and bell staff were excellent! The pelican food and drinks were outstanding. The activities were so much fun for our kids. Very family friendly!!!
bad_review: The lack of a coffee shop all day and night. The sensors in the bathrooms made it hard when you leave the bathroom light on for middle of the night kiddo necessities! And our bathroom the tub fill didn’t work only the shower. And the knob fell off frequently. When we checked out the front desk staff was rude when I found a $300 discrepancy on our bill. Customer service is a lost art and should be respected at all times, that is what brings vacationers back!

acommodation: Habitación Doble con vistas al mar - 2 camas grandes
good_review: Decided to staycation for Father’s Day and daughters bday. Staff, bell hop and valet were all very friendly. Initially checking in we were placed in the wrong room without a balcony as described, but this was quickly fixed for us! We ended up on the 16th floor with a beautiful view of Mission bay, the beach and Belmont park. The 3 pools and 3 slides were a hit with the kids. Both restaurants on the property had great food. Wish they had pizza on-site but of course delivery is always an option. All in all it was a great stay! Would def book again.
bad_review: Ice maker on our floor was out of service…and wasn’t thrilled about a $25 fee for a microwave when it was described as a “request”. Besides that no complaints! Our typical holiday weekend San Diego over cast weather sucked…But that’s not the hotels fault :) we’re just spoiled San Diegans.

acommodation: Habitación Doble con vistas al mar - 2 camas grandes
review_title: Overall nice hotel but pricey (not being able to use full facility hours)
good_review: It's an old hotel(from the outside) but the new renovation inside now is very nice. We were here maybe be 5/6 years ago and it wasn't this nice/new. People definitely come for their pool and water slides because it's rare. The pool area setting is very nice. The bedroom and beds are comfy. We stayed at the tower and it's just as nice as the suits but without a separated living room basically. Overall is nice.
bad_review:
There are so many "extras" hotel customers have to pay for, overnight parking is $45 dollars and resort fee is another $60/$70 dollars. Outside of the amount we see at the booking site, it's like another $150 dollars we have to pay. 
The hotel check-in time is 4pm. And check-out time is 11am. The water slides is closed at 5pm and opens at 11am. So for 1 night stays hotel customers they only get to use the water slides for "ONE HOUR"? That doesn't seem to be right. Most hotel check-in is around 3pm and check out at 12. So at least that's two more hours there if you have kids and coming for their water slides. I'm not saying this is not a nice/worth staying hotel, but the price range is on the higher side. I think 3pm check-in and 12pm check out will make you a fair hotel. (Instead of trying to cut your service and facility hours short)

The buffet style breakfast is very good with a good variety of foods to suit guest needs. We enjoyed the sausage and bacon, scrambled eggs and toast. There is also fresh fruit, yogurt, oatmeal, and cereal. An added bonus is Starbucks drinks on-site available 24 hours although I did not get to partake in this amenity during this visit. 
The staff is very accommodating and professional.

good_review:
We were there shortly after 3:00 PM (the check in time). Since we were a family we had reserved 2 rooms adjacent to each other. However, only 1 room was ready. We were told it would take about another hour to get the second room ready. After an hour we called the front desk and were told it probably would be about another 30 minutes. We were offered another room on a different floor. Not wanting to wait any longer since we had an upcoming event to be at that evening we decided to take it. We asked if they could offer us any compensation for the inconvenience. They comped our parking but said they were not authorized to do anything more.
Overall no problem with the hotel in general, but the check in and room readiness gets an F.

We have been traveling extensively for the last several weeks and have had a couple of terrible experiences/service. So, having Katalin and Nancy helping us at this facility was a breath of fresh air. Katalin was able to find rooms for us despite it being a holiday weekend and was very courteous and helpful in every way. 
The rooms and facilities were clean and comfortable. 
Every staff member we encountered during our stay from May 28-29, 2021, were courteous and helpful.

review_title: Not up to what I would expect at a Hyatt
good_review: The bed and pillows were great. Shower was good
bad_review: Paid $16 per day for parking. They allow the staff to park there so we had to park across the street in a garage that had a broken elevator. One evening the parking attendant told us the employee was in her car but on her phone so we had to go across the street because he wasn’t sure how long she would be. I’m is a boot for a broken foot so this was extremely inconvenient. I’m a Disney cast member at a resort. and I can assure the guest needs come first. This was disappointing for a Hyatt property. I understand the breakfast issue but a group of us stood for our muffin for almost 30minutes while she assisted another guest checking out. I would think at breakfast they would have more than one employee. I reserved a room at another Hyatt near the airport for my last night but decided to cancel not up to Hyatt’s

acommodation: Habitación con 2 camas grandes y sofá cama - Planta alta
good_review: Hotel staff or friendly polite and helpful and a parking attendant as well.
bad_review: We liked the hotel staff at the front desk and the parking attendant. We were disappointed that we were not informed that they hotel Room set up was not divided. Meaning that we were travelling with children and wanted him to have an area to relax. The divider in the Room was only a partial it did not slide or close. There was only one television that had to be shared which made it difficult for the kids to play their video games. There was no microwave in the Room although there was a refrigerator. The breakfast that was advertised was only a sack lunch with a muffin granola bar and choice of Apple juice or Orange juice. We understand the restrictions and guidelines however it would have been good to have known that ahead of time. They did have Starbucks brewed coffee available with Creamer and fanella flavouring They did have Starbucks brewed coffee available with Creamer, Sugar and flavored syrup. The hallways work pretty small it seemed compared to other hotels and when you walked you could easily hear other people conversating from their rooms. However, there was no noise that I noticed while in our room. We had to walk really close to the wall air someone else was coming in the opposite direction almost hugging the wall. On the floors not in the lobby or main areas.

good_review: I requested a first floor room which they didn’t tell us wasn’t available til arrival. I have claustrophobia so I use the stairs instead of the elevator. The stairs are not accessible by a room key as they are in other hotels. My husband would have to go to the second floor in the elevator walk down to the first floor to open the door for me to the stairs . The entrance was located outside of the building in the alley/driveway. I wish they would have considered my claustrophobia a more seriously.

good_review: The staff was great, as well as the location. Friendly, accommodating, convenient, and fast. All of our transactions were quick and smooth. The room overall was nice and comfy and fit our family. Separate space for me to do some work. Many nearby food places walking distance away. Lots of things can be improved, but I would still consider it a positive stay.
bad_review: The couch seemed old and not very clean. 1 member of my family had slept on the couch and came home with several bug bites. I cannot confirm if it's from the couch, but we speculate that it was since it's the only thing they had done differently from the rest of the family. No microwave in room. The price was a bit higher for the level of quality, I feel. Breakfast was extremely limited due to COVID regulations. I feel they still could have offered a better breakfast aside from cereal and yogurt and a muffin. Especially since a buffet is normally offered, they could have made breakfast plates in to go containers, but then again, no microwave.

good_review: La ubicasion y las instalaciones el personal súper amables y atentos 10 de 10

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y ducha adaptada - Adaptada para personas de movilidad reducida
bad_review:
valor, muy caro
baño muy chico

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
bad_review: TODO BIEN CALIDAD, LIMPIEZA, ATENCIÓN, UBICACIÓN ,GYM, ALBERCA

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
review_title: Un buen hotel con un personal de recepción pésimo
bad_review: El personal de recepción a la hora de hacer el ckeck in - no fueron nada flexibles y hicieron todo lo más complejo posible. MUY MAL SERVICIO

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review: Excelente servicio y muy rico el desayuno

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review:
Que te regalan botellas de agua ilimitadas todo el tiempo.
Personal amable.
bad_review: No se siente de 5 estrellas. No avisaron al hacer el check-in que el servicio de camarera y limpieza al cuarto solo se llevaría a cabo si avisamos antes. Después del segundo día avisé y lo hicieron y el tercero otra vez no porque no había avisado ese día, tienes que hacerlo cada día! ni por la basura pasan. Otra cosa: elevador del piso casi siempre sucio y pegajoso, aire acondicionado ruidoso y de mala calidad (no se ajusta la temperatura con precisión). Regadera con muy poca presión.

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
review_title: Good stay for a business trip and close to Gaslamp District. Not so much a romantic getaway.
good_review: Comfortable beds, very lackluster view if your rooms are facing the inner courtyard. I cannot speak for the outward facing rooms. Bathrooms are clean and spacious enough for a group. Large TV was a nice surprise.
bad_review: Lackluster view. Large support steel beam obstructing what little view I had. Make sure to be careful what rooms you book and ask for room details when you check-in. Gym was a bit disappointing.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review: We couldn't stay at the hotel due to the hurricane, however, the hotel did not charge us any cancellation fees even beyond the cancellation policy. I wish I could visit there but definitely next time.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review: The staff very friendly and helpful.
bad_review: The pool is much smaller than the photos show, but was fine for just hanging out in the water and having drinks

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: Bryan was nice and helpful at the front desk. Staff was friendly and restocked our room well.
bad_review: It is expensive for the location and the "market" was crazy expensive. Private event prevented us from having breakfast or time at the pool on our last day, and we had time to spare before we left the city for the day.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
bad_review: N/A

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: nice enough but not nice enough that I’ll automatically choose it next time
bad_review: considering it’s a 5* hotel and not cheap, it was pretty average

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
good_review: Great location. amazing steak house on site. good vibe. rooftop bar and pool were amazing
bad_review: some rooms are loud. you can hear the club next door or noise from the street

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Large comfy modern rooms, with great staff, but the location wasn't for me.
good_review: I stayed a couple of nights at the Andaz in SD, the room was large, bathroom was clean, the bed were really comfy and huge, plus the staff were great and informative. I didn't have breakfast at the hotel but there are some great places close by to grab coffee with good healthy breakfast choices. I requested a quiet room, so I didn't have a room that faced the road, whilst the view wasn't amazing, I had a good night's sleep w/ no disturbances.
bad_review: This hotel is probably a little tired and needs a bit of TLC in places - just general wear and tear issues. However, my main issue is no fault of the hotel and has more to do with the location and the homeless population in SD which is on its doorstep. As a woman travelling alone, I did not feel safe in this area, esp' in the evening. And if I were to visit again, I wouldn't opt to stay here.

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
good_review: clean, fancy and prime location for younger crowds
bad_review: I couldn’t sleep at night due to the noise coming from the streets, if you’re trying to relax and not go out, this isn’t the place for you

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
good_review: The rooftop pool was great for a relaxing stay
bad_review: Nothing

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Relaxing and conveniently located by everything.
good_review: I loved how comfortable the bed was. I felt like it was hugging me to sleep. I loved the air conditioning, the plasma screen tv, the fact that the snacks in the room were complimentary, as well as the waters in the mini fridge. I loved that the elevators and door to your room are activated only from your room key. I loved being able to see the view from the rroftop l, and that there was a comfortable sitting area and pool to enjoy. The bath tub we had was huge which was nice to soothe in. And we had a nice view. Overall, it was a nice experience especially since it was our first time in San Diego.
bad_review:
The parking was the only thing I didn't really like. You have to stop and pull over to the side of the sidewalk, but it is amongst oncoming traffic and the cars are parked all around the building making it difficult to pull over to check in. There is also no self-parking for guests who are checked in, only valet. Tye valet were noce folks, and I didn't mind the option to valet, but it was difficult since you had to stop in the middle of traffic for them to notice you. 
Also I felt that the price you have to pay to keep your car there overnight for each night you stay as a guest was way to pricey.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
bad_review: very expensive to stay and valet parking

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
review_title: I enjoyed the time I was there
good_review: they were very friendly and accommodating and by far the quietest hotel I’ve ever stayed in and there was a huge convention in town
bad_review: it was dark in the lobby and although the rooms have been updated the double occupancy rooms could use more bathroom space and privacy.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Great hotel to discover San Diego.
good_review: Super nice location in the city center, walking distance to bars and restaurants. Nice rooftop and very friendly staff.
bad_review: We had a room were in front it smelled really bad and though we told them two times they couldn't do anything about it. It would have been great to get another room as the hotel didn't seem to be full.

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
good_review: Very modern and clean hotel. Great welcoming with complimentary drinks.
bad_review: the only downside - but also its advantage - of the hotel is that it is very central and that’s why it is quite loud outside during the night because of the people partying in Gaslamp Quarter.

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
review_title: Wonderful, would definitely recommend to anyone!!
good_review: Staff was extremely accommodating with free upgrade to our room, rooftop staff and valet also very helpful and friendly! The room was really clean and very nice! Amenities are wonderful and overall experience was fantastic!

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
review_title: Comfortable and convenient stay, it was nice to be where all the action was, but way to noisy
good_review: Liked the convenience to the Gas Lamp area, Convention Centre and Seaport.
bad_review: Very Noisy.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande y ducha adaptada - Adaptada para personas de movilidad reducida
good_review: I did not request a HC room but was put in one. I was hoping to have a bath.

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
review_title: Good stay, but room too small for 4 persons and too expensive for the room we got
good_review: Swimming pool and bar on the roof, gym
bad_review: Room was nice, but being 4 persons (2 adults and 2 kids) we need 2 queen beds: we had 1 queen bed and 1 sofa-bed that in the end was reducing a lot the space of the room

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: was ok but don’t know if I would stay again based on price and value
bad_review: short hours of F& B - leaking bathroom faucet / phone in did not work

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
good_review: We didn’t eat breakfast. We did order dinner via room service. We were told 15-30 minutes and we waited 45 minutes. The food was pretty cold and one item wasn’t available and we were not told for 30 minutes after ordering. Very mediocre service.
bad_review: Food should have arrived hot and in the time stated. I stepped on a sharp wire in the carpet. I brought it to the front desk and the concierge took it and said he would let someone know, but there was no follow up. It only pierced my foot and thankfully I could remove it myself, but I would have expected some follow up.

acommodation: Habitación con cama grande

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
review_title: Convenient location, friendly staff, but more likely 4-stars, definitely not 5.
good_review:
The location in downtown San Diego was great. It is central to everything (freeways, Petco Park, the Gaslamp District, Seaport Village). The staff was very nice and attentive. And the room was clean. 
The rooftop bar, pool and atmosphere were top notch. The food was great.
bad_review:
I stayed in a room with two double beds. The room was on the second floor (room 231) and it had no view of anything. It looked out at some makeshift rock garden and the side of a building. This room was not commensurate with the 5-star designation that I thought I was getting. 
Additionally, the hotel is very close to the Salvation Army and there were many homeless people sitting on the sidewalk on the side of the hotel smoking various things. Not really 5 stars if you are afraid to walk on a street right next to the hotel.

Location is convenient for exploring downtown, especially the Gaslamp district that is within easy walking distance.

bad_review: The property is in the Gaslight district which means party on the streets on the weekend. We arrived with a group of people. All with children. The bathroom was the worst! It had a glass wall so you were in danger of walking right through it to the bed. Plus you could see whatever the occupant was doing inside. There was nothing comfortable to sit on. Just the bed. The only mirror was over the sink in the bathroom. And the room was small.

acommodation: Habitación con cama extragrande.
review_title: Poor Service, Poor cleanliness Great Location
good_review: The location was excellent for nightlife, the hotel rooftop was also good fun with a swimming more like a paddling pool and a great atmosphere. Good nights sleep.
bad_review:
The service was very poor, wife and I spent 7 nights / 8 days there, not once did we get a full housekeeping of the room, when we arrived reception explained thay have a eco policy not changing the sheets or towels every day - every 3 days. Which we agreed too with reassurance that if we needed anything they would do.
The room was cleanish, not much hanging or draw space. After 2 nights I asked if the room could get a service due to bins overflowing, sheets were soiled with sweat , Reception refused and we made a compromise to empty bins and it would get a service the next day. On the next day after seeing the cleaner on our floor for 4 hours I asked if she could do our room. Our room never got hoovered, sink, shower cleaned, restocked complementary treats. I had to ask for towels to be swapped- there wasn’t one thing they did without me asking. The tea, coffee and hit milk was nothing special I did highlight my dissatisfaction over it all.
We waited a long time to be served at the rooftop and in the end we would go to bar and get served.
Overall with the little things on top of each other I’ll give this hotel a miss.

Rooms are not isolated enough, you hear EVERY SINGLE NOISE from the street (people screaming, sirenes, traffic, helicopters, music, etc)
Rooftop restaurant is horrible, there is no indoor seating, it really looks cheap. Wait for food is about 30', service is extremely slow even though the staff was nice. Plan for one hour to have breakfast.

Also when using the shower for some reason when getting in or out the water poured out onto the floor idk if it was slow leaking out during the shower I would just notice it when coming in or out. The seal on the bottom just might need the be redone and the draining during/after the shower was really loud. One last thing is I notice what look like little blood spatter on the bottom window underneath the one that opens. I was also thinking it could be rust but didn't sound logical with it being on the window. I've been in housekeeping so I understand how it could have been missed due to that specific area being mainly cover by the pillar inside the room.

They also have no printed material in the rooms for WiFi or restaurant info and only give you a QR code on the back of your key fob envelope…which takes you to a website where the information and menus are outdated. Overall a really disappointing “concept”.
