acommodation: Habitación con cama grande
review_title: Absolutely terrible. Better off at a motel 6. Save your money.
good_review: We didn’t care for much about the hotel. Besides the view at the rooftop bar and the size of the shower.
bad_review: Everything. Our room smelt terrible. The view was almost offensive. When I booked the hotel it said it would be a city view, it ended up being a view of a bunch of rocks, hotel room windows and 2 steel flowers which was odd. We didn’t get any natural sunlight, it was very dark and depressing. Almost like being in a bunker. When we booked we where under the impression that there would be waters, drinks and snacks. We had one bottle of water for 2 people! And I couldn’t seem to find a ice machine or water fountain anywhere on my floor. Also online it said that there would be a free tote bag and some vouchers for food and drinks which I never received. Between the smell, the lack of water, the view of the room, the lack of things that where supposed to come with the room that was never seen and the condescending bartender at the roof I’m appalled that you guys charge so much for what you get. Never again! Oh and I also mentioned in the comments that it was my boyfriends birthday and I would like a bottle of wine at the room upon delivery (which I was willing to pay for) and never received or ever acknowledged. You guys are charging pendry/montage pricing for a motel 6 experience. I wasn’t gonna write a review or mention anything cause I didn’t want to waste the time but I saw this email pop up and I got upset all over again.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
good_review: Deborah at the front desk was fantastic. She was able to find a room for an early check in and she personally brought our bags to our room. When she arrived she asked if we were celebrating anything and I told her it was my friends birthday. She asked if she could send up a bottle of champagne which I happily agreed to😀 We saw her later in the day and she noticed we had other friends with us. She gave me a few more champagne flutes so they could enjoy it with us. She is a great asset to the hotel and went above and beyond to make sure we had special trip.
bad_review:
There was no server at the pool and the bar service was very slow even with 3 bartenders.
Also we ordered a fruit plate 3 days in a row and it kept getting smaller and smaller. We pointed it out today and were given a new plate with plenty on it so that made it for it.

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
review_title: Overpriced hotel with a lot of loud party guests. Room felt a little dirty.
good_review: The bed was comfy and I was happy to have a large tub.
bad_review:
The hotel was overpriced for what we got. The hotel, albeit a younger crowd, the hotel felt like it was an imitation trendy vegas resort with a lot of party-goers, it was extremely loud throughout the night. But the worse part was the cleanliness and overall accommodations. 
When we first arrived, the hotel room given to us was not even ready. When we got up to the room, the housekeepers were literally just about to go into the room and looked horrified when we told them that was the room assigned to us. We were quickly switched to a better location, but then as I was going through the towels that evening, I came across a damp and disgusting towel that was discolored and folded up with all the clean towels. It was so gross. From that point on I felt the room was not as clean as it should have been. The bathroom also had no amenities. For what we paid, we should have just gone to the US Grant Hotel, much nicer and cleaner.

acommodation: Habitación Deluxe con cama extragrande
good_review: The location was honestly the only reason we stayed.
bad_review: The lack of communication and professionalism exhibited when we initially attempted to check in at 3, we were told the systems were down and that's it was told to come back at 4 to manually check in. So me and my pregnant wife of 7 months go for an early dinner and return at 430 the same host then tells us we need to get in the que which he didn't state perviously an hr earlier. We put our name on and was told to wait. At 6 pm we still weren't checked in amd when I asked the host where we were in the waitlist he informed me it would be another hr or two. We waited another about 45 mins and as I was about to inform the front desk we were looking to cancel the manager Decided to come out of his office and check us in which she could've did the entire time instead of having one person at the front desk for the whole entire hotel which is beyond frustrating for me and my wife and everyone looking to check in.

good_review: Our large king bedroom was spacious and the bed comfortable.
bad_review: Staff is not wearing a mask in this hotel, which was a concern to us due to the actual delta variant outbreak. Upon checking in, I was asked by the front desk person to remove my mask to be identified, which did not feel like a reasonable request given the circumstances. Most valets are not wearing masks either while driving guests’ cars, which increased our concerns regarding Covid. The major issue was street noise: despite having a superior room at an elevated floor, we did not sleep well due to supremely high street noise. We were awoken every hour due to homeless people screaming, cursing, shouting at each other all night and cars racing. While noise is part of city life, this street is particularly messy at night and sound proofing of the building is obviously ineffective. Another detail: the curtain rod of one of the windows was badly rigged, which required repeated efforts on our part to open or close it. For all these reasons, our experience was disappointing.

The "destination" or "resort" charge of $30, which many hotels now apply, are annoying at best, and a rip off at worst. During my stay I leaned towards the latter, as the hotel was still in Covid mode and many services were trimmed or restricted, including the rooftop pool, which was open but no food/drink service.
However, in this case I am giving the hotel an overall good rating because I had a good room rate and the staff was great; but again, the destination charges didn't feel like good value for money on this occasion.

acommodation: Loft
Loft
good_review:
- The shower was obviously still dirty as there were two different kinds of hair in there.
- The toilet bowl had a film of dirt in it and a little hair.
- The desk had sticky residue and cup rings on it.
I am convinced this room was not cleaned properly and it is very concerning given that we are in a pandemic and they did not ensure extra measures were taken outside of having the remote in a plastic bag and putting a sticker that says sanitized on the hair dryer. I do not want to stay at this hotel ever again, I expected better and probably could have gotten better at a Motel 6.
Lastly, I called valet a little before 7 AM and was told he would be there with my car in under 10 minutes. I rushed to not be late since I figured he should be on time because it was early, not many people and no traffic. I waited outside in the cold with my bags for 15 minutes and decided to ask the front desk agent if valet was really on their way with my car, from the conversation it sounds like they didn’t even leave yet. I waited a few more minutes and the valet attendant finally arrived, no apology for having me wait, knowing they had no other people waiting, so they should have been there at the time they gave. The only person who offered good service was the female front desk agent who checked me in.

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
review_title: HÔTEL À FUIR ET A ÉVITER CAR PUBLICITÉ MENSONGÈRE DE HYATT. SÉJOUR RATÉ À SAN DIEGO POUR L’HERBERGEMENT
bad_review:
- Les tres nombreux SDF’s à l’autre angle de rue dans des tentes tout autour du quartier…Impossible de se promener en famille avec des enfants en toute sécurité tranquillité…
- La publicité mensongère de l’établissement Andaz San Diego - a concept by Hyatt ou de Booking qui fait croire à de multiples services inclus dans les frais de sejour exorbitants et qui est au final n’existe pas. C’EST UNE HONTE ET C’EST DU VOL. (pour exemple, l’entrée au USS MIDWAY que mentionne BOOKING dans sa page de réservation à 1 USD par Billet n’est absolument pas vrai et vous payez au final 26 USD par billet, donc quand vous êtes une famille de 4 personnes, cela fait une somme beaucoup plus important que 4$ !!!!!). Quand vous vous adressez à la réception de l’hôtel concernant l’ensemble de ces services, ils ne comprennent pas et ne savent pas de quoi vous leur parler !!!!!!!
- LE PETIT DÉJEUNER inclus dans la réservation du montant total de la chambre pour 4 personnes: Encore du VOL et de la PUBLICITÉ MENSONGÈRE car en arrivant au Rooftop ce matin, le personnel du Breakfast nous explique qu’il n’y a le petit déjeuner compris que pour 2 personnes. Mes enfants de 14 et 17 ans n’ont rien mangé. En plus, ce n’est pas un petit déjeuner avec buffet où vous vous servez mais une commande que vous passez par rapport à une carte sur laquelle les prix sont EXORBITANTS…À FUIR 
- La TRISTESSE de l’hôtel au niveau des animations avec soit disant un DJ’s sur le roof top mais il n’y a RIEN. TOUT EST MORT, ABSENT, TRISTE dans cet hôtel.
En conclusion, je suis en COLÈRE et FURIEUX DE M’ÊTRE FAIT ARNAQUÉ PAR BOOKING.COM ET CET ÉTABLISSEMENT ANDAZ BY HYATT dans lequel nous ne mettrons plus jamais les pieds 😡😡🤬

acommodation: Habitación Doble - 2 camas dobles
bad_review:
אין ארוחת בוקר, אין חנייה, מתקני המלון לא עבדו.
לא היה בר בערב פתוח ולא בצהריים שהיינו בבריכה . לא היה שירות חדרים וניקיון החדר. 
שילמנו הרבה כסף בתמורה למה שקיבלנו.

acommodation: Suite
bad_review:
Le service est totalement inexistant
Cet établissement n’est pas à la hauteur de ses prétentions

acommodation: Suite
bad_review: Ich habe noch nie in einem Hotel dieser Kategorie einen derart inkompenten, orientierungslosen Service erlebt. Inklusive fehlende Hygiene. Unglaublich. Nicht annähernd ein Hyatt/Andaz - Standard.
